title: Hermana de Miguel Uribe Turbay conmovió al revelar uno de los grandes anhelos del senador: “Su hijo lo está esperando”
creator: Licsa Gómez
content: En un conmovedor testimonio ofrecido a los medios de comunicación a las afueras de la Clínica Fundación Santa Fe de Bogotá, donde permanece internado el senador y precandidato presidencial Miguel Uribe Turbay, su hermana María Carolina Hoyos Turbay reveló uno de los sueños más anhelados del político.El testimonio de Hoyos Turbay se dio en vísperas de la celebración del Día del Padre en Colombia y en medio de un ambiente de profunda unión y esperanza, donde familiares, amigos y ciudadanos se congregan diariamente en las afueras del centro médico para elevar plegarias por la pronta recuperación del senador, víctima de un atentado el pasado 7 de junio en el parque El Golfito, en la localidad de Fontibón, Bogotá.Ahora puede seguirnos en Facebook y en nuestro WhatsApp ChannelRodeada de personas que se han sumado a jornadas de oración colectiva, la hermana de Uribe Turbay dijo: “De las cosas que más quería en su vida era ser papá. Y ahora Alejandro lo está esperando para poder celebrar el Día del Padre. Toda la solidaridad y el afecto de tanta gente es lo que nos mantiene en pie. ¡Fuerza, Miguel!”.María Carolin, que además preside la Fundación Solidaridad por Colombia, compartió también cómo la fe ha sido el soporte de su familia en estos momentos de adversidad. “Lo que hace que estemos en pie es tanta expresión de solidaridad de miles y cientas de personas quienes están orando por Miguel”, señaló en entrevista con Noticias Caracol.La hermana del...

title: Rain and gusty winds hit Delhi, bring relief from sweltering heat | Watch
content: Delhi witnessed heavy rainfall and thunderstorms with strong winds in the early hours of Sunday, resulting in a significant temperature drop and air quality improvement. The India Meteorological Department (IMD) issued severe thunderstorm and strong wind alerts for the city in one of its recent posts on X, asking people to stay indoors and avoid unnecessary travel, as flying debris and low visibility posed risks on the roads. According to another IMD post on X, "a moderate to intense spell of rainfall with thunderstorms and lightning, and squally winds reaching speeds of 80-100 kmph" swept across the national capital during the early hours of Sunday. Visuals from Krishi Bhavan, Rafi Marg, and Udyog Bhawan showed heavy rain accompanied by strong winds lashing the national capital, bringing much-needed relief from the excess heat. Two thunderstorms, along with hailstorm activity, were recorded at Safdarjung between 03.48 am to 03.50 am and 03.58 am to 04.00 am. The first one saw gusty winds reaching 82 kmph, while the second saw a peak wind speed of 104 kmph, the IMD said. However, the intense wind and rain also disrupted early morning traffic, with waterlogging reported in several low-lying areas. The national capital reeled under under intense heat as several parts of the city recorded a maximum temperature of over 43 degrees Celsius on Thursday.Earlier this week, the IMD had issued a warning that Delhi NCR may experience heatwave -like conditions with temperatures...

title: Volver a la humanidad
creator: Luis Fernando Pérez
content: Vivimos días oscuros. En Ucrania, la guerra parece no tener fin. En Gaza, la destrucción ha rebasado los límites de la razón y al parecer había necesidad de abrir otro frente contra Irán. En Estados Unidos, se incrementan los discursos de odio, mientras se fortalece una narrativa de exclusión que convierte el miedo en política y las instituciones miran absortas las acciones del ejecutivo. En Colombia, Miguel Uribe fue víctima de un intento de asesinato, en un hecho que remueve memorias dolorosas de violencia política , haciéndonos reflexionar sobre el rumbo que estamos tomando como sociedad. Y en Cali y el Valle del Cauca, nos pusieron a prueba el martes pasado con un embate terrorista que estremeció nuestras calles, pero contó con una respuesta clara y contundente del Alcalde, Gobernadora, y Fuerza Pública. Sin embargo, en medio de este panorama global convulso, la humanidad parece haber perdido el control sobre su destino. Yuval Noah Harari ha advertido que el problema más importante que enfrentamos es la falta de una historia común. Y es esa narrativa común la que necesitamos para sobrevivir, pues aun siendo más poderosos que nunca, no hemos aprendido a usar nuestro poder con sabiduría . La tecnología, el capital y el conocimiento que acumulamos no están siendo usados para proteger la vida, sino para dividir, dominar y destruir. El mundo actual se fragmenta en burbujas de verdad, en trincheras ideológicas, en una lógica de suma cero donde el...

title: Fórmula 1: George Russell saldrá desde la ‘pole’ en el Gran Premio de Canadá
creator: Héctor Julio Montero Rodríguez
content: El piloto británico George Russell (Mercedes) logró este sábado la pole position del Gran Premio de Fórmula 1 de Canadá al obtener el mejor tiempo en la clasificación en el circuito Gilles Villeneuve de Montreal. El vigente tetracampeón mundial neerlandés Max Verstappen (Red Bull) y el actual líder del campeonato mundial, Oscar Piastri (McLaren) , marcaron el segundo y tercer mejor tiempo, respectivamente. Esta es la primera pole de la temporada para el piloto de 27 años y la sexta en su carrera, gracias a una actuación que confirmó las buenas sensaciones de los Mercedes sobre el trazado canadiense, rodando 0.160 segundos más rápido que Verstappen. “Es increíble haberlo logrado, especialmente delante de este público fantástico. ¡Es probablemente una de las vueltas más emocionantes de mi vida!. En esa última vuelta iba cada vez más rápido, así que estoy verdaderamente muy, muy feliz”, declaró Russell. Dos semanas después del toque entre Russell y Verstappen en Barcelona, la salida de la carrera del domingo y especialmente la pelea en la primera curva se anuncia emocionante entre los dos pilotos , aunque con un riesgo añadido sobre Verstappen, que podría quedar suspendido una carrera en caso de realizar maniobras peligrosas. “Yo tengo más puntos en la Superlicencia con los que jugar”, bromeó Russell al ser preguntado por esa circunstancia. Para el británico, la del sábado es su segunda pole consecutiva en Canadá, luego de quedar también por...

title: Decomposed body found near road in Ghaziabad
content: A decomposing body of an unidentified man, believed to be in his early 30s, was found stuffed in an old plastic bag and partially eaten by community dogs near a road in Indraprastha Colony under Teela Mod police station in Shalimar Garden, Ghaziabad, on Saturday morning, police said. The incident came to light around 7:30 am when passersby noticed a foul smell and saw dogs tearing at a discarded plastic bag near the colony road. “Around 7:30 am, passersby called to report that a body was being eaten by dogs near the road leading to the residential colony in Tila Mod. Police teams were rushed to the spot. “The scene was secured, and the corpse was sent for a postmortem examination,” said Teela Mod SHO Kartar Singh. Police said the body, which was in a state of advanced decomposition, was tied up in a plastic bag. Initial observations suggest the man was aged between 30 and 32 years. The body did not bear any documents or possessions that could help in identification. “It is suspected that the person may have been killed elsewhere and his body dumped in the area. Efforts are currently underway to identify the deceased, and a case will be registered after the autopsy report arrives. We are investigating all possibilities, and further action will be taken once the postmortem reports come in and the body is identified,” added Singh. The body has been sent for autopsy to determine the cause and time of death. Police teams are checking missing persons’ reports in the area and are...

title: Dani Suárez se sincera; “qué bueno que le di en su madre al otro carro”
content: El piloto mexicano Daniel Suárez no defraudó a los aficionados en el NASCAR Mexico City Weekend y tras arrancar en el fondo tuvo una remontada legendaria para ganar The Chilango 150, la carrera que marcó el regreso de NASCAR Xfinity Series a la capital mexicana tras 17 años de ausencia. El regiomontano fue muy claro en conferencia de prensa y aseguro (entre risas) que si no hubiera chocado su auto en la mañana muy posiblemente no hubiera terminado primero, pues los frenos estaban fallando desde el inicio de la calificación. “Los pilotos de Cup tienen más experiencia, pero no en estos carros y yo tengo más de un año que no corro en estos carros. Creo que esa fue una de las razones por las que choqué y yo creo que los frenos no estaban bien, pero no sabía al cien por ciento qué estaba mal. Todo pasa por algo y Dios me quiere mucho y por algo le di en su madre a ese carro para que pudiéramos tener el otro y ganar la carrera y sino posiblemente me podía dar en mi mais en esta carrera, pero Dios me bendice”, relató. Dani Suárez también aseguró que no es fácil correr en México y se dio cuenta cuando en las banderas amarillas, él en los primeros lugares y la gente no paraba de gritar y de alentarlo para que no se dejara rebasar. “Es la primera vez en mi vida que yo en las banderas amarillas escuchaba a toda la gente gritar como si estuviera a un lado mío y este sentimiento es algo que se me va a quedar toda la vida y el apoyo de toda mi gente, de todo México...

title: Karnataka Weather, June 15: Rain and storms expected across the state on Sunday
creator: Ishwi Singh
content: Karnataka Weather, June 15: Thunderstorms and rain on Sunday as monsoon season continues. Stay updated with local weather alerts.Karnataka Weather, June 15: Residents across Karnataka should prepare for a rainy and breezy day on Sunday, with thunderstorms expected in several regions. The monsoon season is in full swing, and citizens are urged to stay updated with local weather alerts. Let’s look at the forecast below.Bengaluru Max Temperature: 27°C Min Temperature: 21°C Real Feel: 26°C Bengaluru is expected to remain cloudy and breezy for most of the day. Thunderstorms are possible in the afternoon and evening. Humidity will be intense.Mysuru Max Temperature: 27°C Min Temperature: 20°C Real Feel: 28°C Breezy with persistent rainfall expected throughout the day. The temperatures will remain pleasant. Tourists and local residents are advised to carry rain umbrellas and avoid water-logged areas.Hubli-Dharwad Max Temperature: 26°C Min Temperature: 22°C Real Feel: 28°C Wind and rain throughout the day. The breezy conditions could bring temporary drops in temperature.Mangaluru Max Temperature: 27°C Min Temperature: 23°C Real Feel: 28°C Mangaluru is set for a wet and stormy day, with heavy rainfall at times. Residents are advised to monitor weather alerts and avoid unnecessary travel during peak downpour hours.

title: Surging Corner Commits to NC State Football Staff During Visit
content: On Saturday evening, Winter Park High School (Fla.) three-star cornerback Jordan Jackson shut down his recruitment and became this month's fourth 2026 NC State football pledge. In doing so, he also became the Wolfpack's first 2026 addition at his position. ALSO READ: NC State Target Hayden Ainsworth Shuts Down Recruitment, Prediction Surfaces The 6-foot-2, 185-pound rising senior committed to the staff during his official visit with the Wolfpack this weekend and announced his decision via the following post on social media: Earlier this month, Jordan Jackson debuted at No. 1,159 overall, No. 99 among cornerbacks, and No. 144 in Florida on the 247Sports 2026 Composite. He racked up over a dozen offers in his recruitment before pledging allegiance to 13th-year NC State football head coach Dave Doeren and the Wolfpack. NC State now boasts eight verbal commits in the 2026 cycle. Doeren & Co.'s collection, consisting entirely of three-star prospects at this juncture, currently stacks up at No. 57 in the country, according to 247Sports, and No. 14 in the ACC. ALSO READ: Towering 2027 Tight End Sam Faniel Reports Offer From NC State Program Stay tuned to NC State Wolfpack On SI for more NC State football and basketball recruiting news.

title: Más de 200 policías llegan a Cochabamba
creator: Céspedes
content: Más de 200 efectivos policiales provenientes de Beni, Pando y Tarija llegaron a Cochabamba el sábado para reforzar las tareas en rutas que fueron desbloqueadas hacia occidente. El despliegue, que sumó un total de 350 agentes, tiene como objetivo garantizar que no se instalen nuevos bloqueos en las vías a occidente. A pesar de los avances, los bloqueos continúan en varias zonas de Cochabamba, según el último reporte de la Administradora Boliviana de Carreteras (ABC), a lo que se suma también un piquete en Chuquisaca. Mientras tanto, el esfuerzo de las fuerzas del orden ha permitido despejar las rutas hacia occidente, como las que conectan Cochabamba con Oruro, La Paz y Potosí, donde los bloqueos y actos de violencia fueron intensos en días anteriores. El jueves, después de más de 10 días de bloqueo, se logró desbloquear la ruta entre Cochabamba y Oruro, con un operativo que incluyó tanto a policías como a militares. “Las carreteras fueron desbloqueadas en días pasados y se mantienen expeditas las rutas de occidente”, indicó un informe oficial. A pesar de estos avances, se registraron momentos de alta resistencia.

title: “No tiene el derecho a ser eterno candidato nunca más”
creator: Céspedes
content: El ministro de Gobierno, Roberto Ríos, afirmó que Evo Morales “no está habilitado para participar en las elecciones de este año, no tiene sigla y tampoco tiene el derecho a ser un eterno candidato”. “El derramamiento de sangre y luto en el país sucedió porque existe una persona que, al margen de no respetar la Constitución, considera que tiene el derecho a ser un eterno candidato. En esta su ‘batalla final’ está trayendo consigo todo este dolor para la familia boliviana”, expresó Ríos, en una conferencia de prensa que convocó para hablar sobre la situación del país. Aseguró que “el Gobierno no descansará hasta restituir la libre transitabilidad en todo el territorio nacional y no escatimarán en hacer justicia para todas las personas que han perdido a sus seres queridos y para los oficiales asesinados por criminales”. Sobre el líder cocalero, el ministro insistió en que “no está habilitado para una candidatura, no tiene sigla y tampoco tiene el derecho a ser un eterno candidato”. “Los sectores afines a Morales tienen que ver y darse cuenta de todo lo que están generando, gente inocente y personas que, por hacer su trabajo, estamos siendo amenazados”, reclamó. El ministro de Gobierno, Roberto Ríos, denunció que Evo Morales ejecuta una “estrategia de poder” para generar “caos, terror y enfrentamiento” en Bolivia, con el objetivo de impedir el desarrollo normal de las elecciones generales de agosto de 2025. “Morales habla de una ‘batalla final’, pero no es...

title: Agropecuarios exigen liberar mercados, tecnología y biotecnología para la crisis
creator: Céspedes
content: La Confederación Agropecuaria Nacional (Confeagro) se reunió en Cochabamba, donde analizó la actual situación del sector por las medidas ordenadas por Evo Morales para que lo habiliten como candidato, y dieron algunas alternativas para lidiar con la actual coyuntura, dentro de las propuestas está la liberación del mercado, la tecnología y la biotecnología. En ese sentido, la Confeagro, a través de un comunicado, expresó su profunda preocupación y manifestó la molestia de miles de productores que hoy están siendo golpeados por una crisis que combina abandono, violencia e indiferencia. “Los bloqueos de carreteras promovidos por Evo Morales, con la complicidad, por inacción, del gobierno de Luis Arce, ya han cobrado la vida de bolivianos inocentes”, señala el documento y agrega que se repite la historia: vidas truncadas por intereses políticos. “Bolivia ya no aguanta más. Y lo decimos con claridad: no puede haber seguridad alimentaria, ni estabilidad económica, ni paz social mientras se bloquea a la cadena alimenticia que sostiene gran parte del país”, cuestionó. Asimismo, exigen que se libere el acceso a mercados, tecnología y biotecnología, sin más excusas ideológicas y que se regularice el abastecimiento de carburantes y se resuelva la falta de dólares. “Desde Confeagro y la cadena de abastecimiento, reafirmamos nuestro compromiso con la democracia, la producción y la paz, pero también advertimos: no seremos cómplices del silencio ni del miedo. Si...

title: ¿Cómo sacar cita para pasaporte en Perú?: consulta cómo sacar trámite en Migraciones
content: Patricia Benavides Guerra Israel - Irán Donald Trump Alianza Lima vs Sport Huancayo Inter Miami vs Al Ahly Día del Padre 2025 Dólar Perú Mundial de Clubes Inmunidad Parlamentaria Miss Perú Minedu Horóscopo ÚLTIMAS NOTICIAS POLÍTICA ECONOMÍA DEPORTES MUNDIAL DE CLUBES ESPECTÁCULOS SOCIEDAD MUNDO DÓLAR ESTADOS UNIDOS DATEC Últimas Noticias La adquisición de un pasaporte es fundamental si deseamos hacer un viaje fuera del país. Esto es lo que debes hacer en caso de que no tengas uno. Minedu anuncia la fecha de inicio de las vacaciones escolares de invierno este 2025 ‘El Monstruo’ reaparece en vídeo y acusa a la PNP: "Conversaron conmigo y recibieron plata" Si planeas viajar al extranjero y no tienes pasaporte o el tuyo está vencido, deberás tramitarlo o renovarlo a través de la Superintendencia Nacional de Migraciones . Para ello, primero tendrás que pagar el monto de S/98,60 en el Banco de la Nación o mediante la plataforma págalo.pe . Asegúrate de contar con un DNI vigente y sin multas electorales. Luego, debes sacar una cita electrónica, la cual debe ser impresa o mostrada de manera digital al momento de tu visita. Para solicitar la cita, ingresa tus datos personales y el número de recibo de pago en la página de Migraciones . Después, selecciona la sede y el horario que mejor te convenga. Es importante llegar 15 minutos antes de la hora indicada y llevar tu DNI, el recibo de pago y la constancia de la cita. En la sede, te tomarán una foto para el...

title: Bloqueos evistas bajan en Cochabamba
creator: Céspedes
content: Los puntos de bloqueos de los seguidores de Evo Morales bajaron este sábado a seis, cinco de los cuales siguen afectando a Cochabamba, mientras que en Potosí solo hay un sector bloqueado, en la zona de Sivingamayo, según reporta la ABC. Según la información, el día 13 de bloqueos, cuatro puntos de bloqueo están en la vía nueva hacia Santa Cruz a la altura de Chiñata, Tutimayu, Villa Tunari, Colomi y Sacaba. En la terminal de buses de Cochabamba las actividades se normalizan poco a poco, hay salidas hacia los departamentos de Oruro y La Paz, pero no así hacia Santa Cruz y Sucre. La localidad de Aiquile, capital de la provincia Campero del departamento de Cochabamba, está aislada desde que se iniciaron los cortes de vías, el pasado 2 de junio. Una vecina informó que los bloqueadores “evistas” interrumpen las carreteras hacia Sucre y la capital del Valle. «Hemos querido dialogar con los bloqueadores y no ceden», lamentó. En operativos conjuntos, las fuerzas policiales han logrado desbloquear todas las rutas hacia Llallagua, epicentro de los hechos de violencia de esta semana, que ya han dejado seis muertos, cuatro policías asesinados y dos civiles que fueron golpeados y torturados por los grupos violentos que buscan forzar la candidatura de Morales a la presidencia. Mientras, la ruta entre Cochabamba y Oruro también ha sido despejada y se mantiene la presencia policial para evitar que se instalen nuevamente los bloqueadores. El expresidente Morales, mediante su...

title: Thousands gather for Pinoy Festival in Burnaby as Filipino community reflects, rebuilds
Thousands gather for Pinoy Festival in Burnaby as Filipino community reflects, rebuilds
creator: CBC
content: Thousands of people filled Swangard Stadium in Burnaby on Saturday for the 2025 Pinoy Festival — a daylong celebration of Filipino culture that organizers say is the largest of its kind in Canada. The festival comes seven weeks after the Lapu-Lapu Day tragedy in East Vancouver, where a driver struck a crowd with an SUV, killing 11 people and injuring many more. Organizers say this year's Pinoy Festival has adopted the theme "We Rise" as a message of collective strength coming on the heels of what some describe as one of the darkest days in Vancouver's history. Festival spokesperson Ting Caturla said the decision to go ahead with Saturday's event was not taken lightly. Initially, the festival's theme was centred on celebrating and having fun, but after the tragedy it switched gears and adopted "We Rise." "We wanted to honour the victims and give people memories that we celebrate their lives." Caturla said security at this year's festival is higher than last year, with RCMP officers on site, traffic control, four first aid booths, and security stationed at all entrances. The annual festival, now in its third year, features over 180 vendors and community booths, a Zumba workout, cultural performances , and a solidarity parade, among other activities. B.C. Premier David Eby attended the festival and called it "a symbol of resilience" of the Filipino community. "This year it has particular significance," he said. "People are rebuilding and obviously we're all still grieving. But...

title: “Los usureros de los bancos se están enriqueciendo”
creator: Céspedes
content: El ejecutivo de la COD de Cochabamba, Edgar Salazar, anunció que su organización determinó exigir al Gobierno la condonación total de las deudas bancarias, rechazando la disposición emitida por la Autoridad de Supervisión del Sistema Financiero (ASFI) mediante la Carta Circular 1614/2025, que instruye a las entidades financieras ofrecer refinanciamiento o reprogramación de créditos a los usuarios. “Aquí no se trata de diferir, sino de condonar”, remarcó Salazar, señalando que la medida propuesta por la ASFI no responde a la situación económica que enfrentan los trabajadores. “Estamos declarados en estado de emergencia por las políticas económicas en el sentido de que sale un decreto 1614/2025 indicando que va a ver diferimiento para los adeudos que están en los bancos, los usureros de los bancos se están enriqueciendo en crisis siempre se enriquecen nunca pierden aquí no se trata de diferir o reprogramar aquí se trata de que tenemos que salvar a los bolivianos y todo boliviano como se mueve este país con la economía, con el aporte con el trabajo y muchos han recurrido a créditos” afirmó Salazar

title: La infraestructura que sostiene la Fórmula 1: así opera el 'paddock' digital del mayor espectáculo del motor
content: Las estrellas del Gran Circo están en Canadá, donde McLaren buscará mantener su extraordinaria racha en 2025 ante la ambición de los Verstappen, Ferrari y Mercedes de turno. La Fórmula 1 está más emocionante que nunca , y anticipa lo que va a ser una auténtica locura el próximo curso con la llegada de nuevas escuderías (Cadillac y Audi) y reglamento técnico revisado que podría poner patas arriba el actual status quo de la competición. La emoción de las carreras se basa, en gran parte, en los riesgos que asumen los pilotos al tomar cada curva, en ir un centímetro más cerca del muro que tus rivales. Pero cuando uno se aleja del paddock y se introduce en las entrañas de la F1, el riesgo es una odiosa pesadilla, casi una palabra maldita: una red de dispositivos, sistemas y personas permite que 24 carreras al año se disputen y retransmitan sin margen de fallo, en todo el planeta, con máxima exigencia técnica. Durante el pasado Gran Premio de España, en Montmeló, este escribano pudo visitar junto a otros compañeros el centro técnico itinerante que permite que todo eso funcione. Allí no se escuchan motores ni gritos del público, solo el leve pero constante zumbido de la computación de alto rendimiento. NEWSLETTER - DISRUPTORES Invitado por Lenovo, socio tecnológico global del campeonato desde 2022, tuve acceso al Event Technical Centre (ETC), una instalación portátil que viaja por todo el mundo acompañando al circo de la Fórmula 1. Allí se gestionan...

title: 900 camiones varados en Colomi y chóferes sin comida
creator: Céspedes
content: Más de 900 camiones están varados debido a los bloqueos en la comunidad de Colomi, en el Chapare cochabambino, denunció este sábado el dirigente Nelson Carrillo, de la Federación de Transporte Pesado Nacional e Internacional. El dirigente pidió ayuda para sus compañeros, pues varios están enfermos y se han quedado sin alimentos. “Tenemos serios problemas en Colomi, esta vez son 900 camiones, hay choferes de la tercera edad, otros enfermos y ya no hay nada que comer”, dijo en un audio enviado a La Razón. Explicó, además, que conversó con el alcalde de Colomi, Félix Veizaga, quien, según dijo, se comprometió a interceder para que sus funcionarios les lleven alimentos y medicinas. “Conversé con el alcalde de Colomi y me dijo que va a instruir a sus funcionarios que puedan cocinar y llevar una papa huayco y también al hospital. Esperamos que puedan ayudar a mis compañeros, creo que esta tarde tienen reunión, veremos los resultados”, dijo Carrillo. Transporte El transporte pesado está varado en Colomi hace 13 días debido al bloqueo de seguidores de Evo Morales, que exigen la habilitación del líder cocalero como candidato para las elecciones generales de agosto. En la semana, los choferes varados en esa zona cochabambina denunciaron que no tienen acceso ni a agua ni a alimentos y acusaron a Morales de obligar a los comunarios a cerrar tiendas y prohibir toda venta a los conductores. “Nos han dejado sin comida. Han prohibido a la gente de Colomi que nos...

title: هل تصل إشعاعات مفاعل ديمونة إلى مصر حال قصفه؟ رئيس الرقابة النووية السابق يجيب
creator: مصر
content: حذر الدكتور مصطفى عزيز، الرئيس السابق لهيئة الرقابة النووية والإشعاعية المصرية، من خطورة أي استهداف عسكري إيراني لمفاعل ديمونة الإسرائيلي، مشيرا إلى امتداد آثاره الإشعاعية إلى مصر سيعتمد على «اتجاه الرياح»، بالإضافة إلى سيناريو الاستهداف. وشدد خلال تصريحات تلفزيونية لبرنامج «كلمة أخيرة» المذاع عبر شاشة «ON E» على ضرورة تجنب استهداف المفاعلات النووية من الجانبين، مشيرا إلى استهداف جيش الاحتلال الإسرائيلي منشآت تخصيب اليورانيوم الإيرانية وتجنب استهداف مفاعل بوشهر. وأوضح أن منشآت مثل نطنز وفوردو وأصفهان في إيران مخصصة لمعالجة وتخصيب اليورانيوم، بينما مفاعل بوشهر هو الذي يستخدم اليورانيوم لإنتاج الطاقة، موضحا أن الخطورة الكبرى تكمن في الوقود الذي سيؤدي استهدافه إلى زيادة مستوى الاشعاع. وفيما يتعلق بتأثير الضربة الإيرانية لمفاعل ديمونة على مصر حال حدوثها، قال: «سيعتمد الأمر على اتجاه الرياح وقت الضربة، إذا كانت متجهة نحو مصر، ومن الممكن أن يحدث تخفيف لمستوى الإشعاع قبل وصوله للحدود المصرية، أو الأمر يعتمد على سيناريو الضربة». كما أشار إلى زيادة مستوى التأثير الإشعاعي في منطقة الخليج في حال استهداف مفاعل بوشهر الإيراني. واستبعد تكرار سيناريو كارثة تشرنوبل، قائلا: «مفاعل تشرنوبل انفجر وهو يعمل، لكن أعتقد أن أي دولة تدخل في حالة حرب ولديها مفاعل نووي، تقوم بإغلاقه كإجراء احترازي».

title: Israel conducts strikes in Yemen
creator: Nepal News
content: ISRAEL: An Israeli strike was conducted in Yemen on Sunday, The Times of Israel reported, quoting defence sources. The strike was reportedly a targeted assassination attempt of a Houthi leader. The Israeli Defence Forces (IDF) has not yet officially commented on the incident.During Israel’s strikes on Iran, Yemen’s Houthi rebels sided with the latter. Yemen’s Iran-aligned Houthi rebels said Tehran had a “legitimate right to defend itself” following Israel’s strikes, as per Al Jazeera.The Houthis said on Telegram that they backed “Iran’s full and legitimate right to ... develop its nuclear programme” and that “we strongly condemn the brutal Israeli aggression against the Islamic Republic of Iran and affirm its full and legitimate right to respond by all possible means”.Earlier on June 10, Israel’s military launched overnight strikes on Yemen’s port city of Hodeidah, which it claims is used by Houthi rebels to transport weapons, Al Jazeera reported.The Israeli army and Houthi-controlled media reported the strikes on Hodeidah, a key port for humanitarian aid imports, on Tuesday. An Israeli official said an “aerial and naval blockade” could follow unless Houthi rebels halt attacks on Israel.The strike hit two piers at the port, according to the Houthi reports. Israel’s military claimed responsibility shortly after, saying it used navy ships to fire missiles at seaports that the Houthis use for “military purposes”, as per Al Jazeera.Neither the Houthi nor Israeli reports...

title: Israel-Iran conflict set to dominate G7 summit
creator: BBC
content: This week's G7 summit in Canada will be dominated by war - only not one of those that the world leaders had expected. High on the agenda had been Russia's war against Ukraine and Donald Trump's tariff war against America's trading partners. Instead the three-day gathering in the Rocky Mountains of Alberta will inevitably be focused on war in the Middle East. Israel's decision to attack Iran will force the Group of Seven western powers to spend less time on other issues and instead discuss ways of managing the conflict. Like so many of their discussions, that will involve Britain, France, Germany and Italy - along with Canada and Japan - seeking to influence the United States. For although Israel might have launched these strikes without explicit American support, the US president is the only leader with real leverage over Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu. The G7 leaders, due to arrive in Canada on Sunday, know the global security and economic risks if this conflict escalates, dragging in other countries, sending oil prices soaring. Yet they may struggle to achieve a common position. Some, such as UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer and President Emmanuel Macron of France, have called for restraint and de-escalation. But others such as Japan's Prime Minister, Shigeru Ishiba, have condemned Israel's attack as "intolerable" and "extremely regrettable". For his part, Mr Trump praised Israel's strikes as "excellent". Hiding the divisions All this is a long way from what Mark Carney,...

title: मकर साप्ताहिक राशिफल: मकर राशि वालों का 15-21 जून तक का सप्ताह कैसा रहेगा?
content: Capricorn Weekly Horoscope, मकर साप्ताहिक राशिफल: ये सप्ताह आपके जीवन के कई क्षेत्रों में प्रगति लेकर आएगा। आप अधिक कॉन्फिडेंट महसूस करेंगे और पॉजिटिव बदलावों के लिए खुले रहेंगे। चाहे घर पर हो, काम पर हो या दोस्तों के साथ, आपका व्यावहारिक स्वभाव आपको आगे बढ़ने में मदद करेगा। शांत रहें और छोटी-छोटी जीत का आनंद लें। मकर राशि वालों का 15-21 जून तक का सप्ताह कैसा रहेगा-मकर लव लाइफ: इस सप्ताह, आपका प्रेम जीवन अधिक संतुलित महसूस होगा। अगर आप किसी रिश्ते में हैं, तो बातचीत में सुधार होगा और आप पहले से अधिक करीब महसूस करेंगे। अगर आप सिंगल हैं, तो कोई दयालु और समझदार व्यक्ति आपका ध्यान आकर्षित कर सकता है। खुले और सच्चे रहें। दयालु शब्द और छोटे-छोटे इशारे बहुत बड़ा बदलाव ला सकते हैं। अपनी परवाह करने वाले पक्ष को दिखाएं। जब आप ईमानदार और विचारशील होते हैं तो विश्वास बढ़ता है। एक शांत हृदय प्रेम के लिए जगह बनाता है।करियर राशिफल: काम आपके लिए पुरस्कृत लग रहा है। आपको नेतृत्व करने या कोई बढ़िया विचार साझा करने का मौका मिल सकता है। दूसरे आपके प्रयासों को नोटिस करेंगे और इससे नए दरवाजे खुल सकते हैं। केंद्रित रहें और व्यवस्थित रहें। किसी भी नई चीज में जल्दबाजी न करें। डिटेल्स की जांच करने के लिए अपना समय लें। ये सप्ताह अपनी सच्ची कीमत दिखाने और अपनी टीम के साथ मिलकर काम करने के बारे में है। आत्मविश्वास और धैर्य अच्छे परिणाम लाएंगे।फाइनेंशियल लाइफ: इस सप्ताह आपकी धन स्थिति अच्छी दिख रही है। अपने खर्च की समीक्षा करने और शायद बचत के लिए एक छोटा लक्ष्य निर्धारित करने का ये एक स्मार्ट समय है। अगर आप कोई खरीदारी करने की योजना बना रहे हैं, तो अपने बजट की सावधानीपूर्वक जांच करें। एक सोची-समझी योजना...

title: RSA vs AUS: దటీజ్ కెప్టెన్ బావుమా.. 100 ఏళ్లలో ఏ కెప్టెన్ సాధించలేని రికార్డులో ఒకే ఒక్కడిగా..
creator: Venkata Chari
content: South Africa vs Australia, WTC 2025 Final: దక్షిణాఫ్రికా క్రికెట్ జట్టుకు “చోకర్స్” అనే అపవాదు ఎప్పటినుంచో అంటుకుంది. ఐసీసీ టోర్నమెంట్లలో కీలక సమయాల్లో ఒత్తిడికి గురై ఓడిపోవడం వారికి పరిపాటిగా మారింది. అలాంటి చరిత్ర ఉన్న జట్టు, క్రికెట్ ప్రపంచంలో అత్యంత పటిష్టమైన ఆస్ట్రేలియాను వరల్డ్ టెస్ట్ ఛాంపియన్‌షిప్ (WTC) ఫైనల్‌లో ఓడించి టైటిల్ గెలుచుకోవడం ఒక అద్భుతమైన ఘట్టం. ఈ విజయం వెనుక కెప్టెన్ టెంబా బావుమా అసాధారణ పోరాటం, అకుంఠిత దీక్ష ఉన్నాయి. ఈ క్రమంలో దక్షిణాఫ్రికా డిఫెండింగ్ ఛాంపియన్ కంగారూల గర్వాన్ని దెబ్బతీసింది. ఫైనల్ మ్యాచ్‌లో నాల్గవ రోజున ఆసీస్ జట్టును 5 వికెట్ల తేడాతో ఓడించడం ద్వారా ఏ ఫార్మాట్‌లోనైనా తొలిసారిగా ప్రపంచ ఛాంపియన్‌గా నిలిచిన ఘనతను సాధించింది. 100 ఏళ్ల హిస్టరీలో ఒకే ఒక్కడు.. ఈ టైటిల్ విజయంలో, కెప్టెన్ టెంబా బాబూమా గత 100 సంవత్సరాల టెస్ట్ చరిత్రలో ఏ కెప్టెన్ సాధించనిది సాధించాడనడంలో సందేహం లేదు. అత్యంత అవసరమైన సమయంలో టెంబా ఇన్నింగ్స్ 66 పరుగులు, ప్లేయర్ ఆఫ్ ది మ్యాచ్ మార్క్రామ్‌తో మూడవ వికెట్‌కు 147 పరుగుల భాగస్వామ్యం విజయానికి కీలకంగా మారాయి. చరిత్రలో గొప్ప కెప్టెన్లు కూడా వారి పేరు మీద నమోదు చేయలేకపోయిన ఓ రికార్డ్, తన పేరుతో లికించుకున్నాడు. బావుమా కెప్టెన్సీలో ఇది అతని పదవ టెస్ట్ మాత్రమే. బావుమా గత వంద సంవత్సరాలలో కెప్టెన్‌గా తన కెరీర్‌లోని మొదటి పది టెస్ట్‌లలో 9 గెలిచిన మొదటి కెప్టెన్ అయ్యాడు. బావుమా పెర్సీ చాప్మన్ కంటే మెరుగ్గా.. బావుమా కాకుండా, తన కెప్టెన్సీలో మొదటి 10 టెస్ట్ మ్యాచ్‌లలో 9 గెలిచిన మరో కెప్టెన్ ఇంగ్లాండ్‌కు చెందిన పెర్సీ చాప్‌మన్. అతను 1926-31 మధ్య ఈ ఘనతను సాధించాడు. కానీ, బావుమా, చాప్‌మన్ మధ్య ఉన్న పెద్ద తేడా ఏమిటంటే బావుమా మొదటి...

title: Israel-Iran conflict set to dominate G7 summit
content: This week's G7 summit in Canada will be dominated by war - only not one of those that the world leaders had expected. High on the agenda had been Russia's war against Ukraine and Donald Trump's tariff war against America's trading partners. Instead the three-day gathering in the Rocky Mountains of Alberta will inevitably be focused on war in the Middle East. Israel's decision to attack Iran will force the Group of Seven western powers to spend less time on other issues and instead discuss ways of managing the conflict. Like so many of their discussions, that will involve Britain, France, Germany and Italy - along with Canada and Japan - seeking to influence the United States. For although Israel might have launched these strikes without explicit American support, the US president is the only leader with real leverage over Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu. The G7 leaders, due to arrive in Canada on Sunday, know the global security and economic risks if this conflict escalates, dragging in other countries, sending oil prices soaring. Yet they may struggle to achieve a common position. Some, such as UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer and President Emmanuel Macron of France, have called for restraint and de-escalation. But others such as Japan's Prime Minister, Shigeru Ishiba, have condemned Israel's attack as "intolerable" and "extremely regrettable". For his part, Mr Trump praised Israel's strikes as "excellent". All this is a long way from what Mark Carney, the new Canadian...

title: Dos diputados argentinos están varados en Tel Aviv en medio de los ataques de Irán
creator: Redacción LAVOZ
content: En un contexto de intensos bombardeos y cierres aeroportuarios, los diputados Maximiliano Ferraro (Coalición Cívica) y Damián Arabia (PRO), viven momentos de angustia, bajo la constante amenaza de misiles en la capital israelí. Es que ambos legisladores se encuentran varados en Tel Aviv en medio de la creciente escalada de ataques entre este país e Irán.Todo sobre otra jornada de ataques entre Irán e Israel.Ambos forman parte de una delegación de seis argentinos, que incluye a cuatro representantes de la sociedad civil, invitados por la Embajada de Israel para participar en actividades de cooperación e intercambio. Su llegada coincidió con el inicio de los bombardeos, dejándolos imposibilitados de regresar a Argentina debido al cierre de los aeropuertos.Qué está pasando en Tel AvivLa situación en Tel Aviv es de extrema tensión, con constantes alertas que obligan a los ciudadanos y visitantes a buscar refugio de inmediato.El diputado Ferraro relató a TN la dinámica: “Cuando suenan las sirenas y la alarma en tu teléfono, tenés entre cinco y diez minutos para bajar al refugio”. La delegación experimenta una rutina marcada por la amenaza, moviéndose entre su habitación, el lobby del hotel y una terraza en planta baja. En una sola jornada, recibieron dos “alertas máximas” en sus teléfonos.23:05 recibimos un nuevo mensaje de alerta máxima. Una vez más, bajamos al refugio.— maxi ferraro 🎗️ (@maxiferraro) June 14, 2025Los momentos de mayor incertidumbre se...

title: Cubs provide an update on Shota Imanaga's rehab from hamstring strain | Sporting News
creator: Nick Radosevich
content: The Chicago Cubs have given an injury update about lefty ace Shota Imanaga. Fortunately, it’s a good update. Imanaga threw four scoreless innings in a rehab start in Arizona. He struck out four batters without allowing a walk, per Marquee Sports Network’s Kyle Millinowisch. Pitching coach Tommy Hottovy said the team was hoping for three innings and 53 to 55 pitches out of Imanaga. Imanaga was so efficient that after his four innings, he went to the bullpen to throw an additional 15 to 20 pitches. “Things are trending in the right direction,” Hottovy said on Cubs Live! “I think now we’re at the point where he can start fine-tuning some things in his delivery, start fine-tuning some things with the pitch shapes. When you can do that, you’re trusting that the lower body is feeling good.” Follow The Sporting News on WhatsApp Imanaga, 31, was off to a good start before he strained his left hamstring on May 4 against the Milwaukee Brewers. He is 3-2 with a 2.82 ERA and a 1.10 WHIP in eight starts. Last season, Imanaga received votes for National League Rookie of the Year. He dominated Major League Baseball, going 15-3 with a 2.91 ERA and a 1.02 WHIP in 29 starts. His 6.2 strikeouts to walks ratio led MLB. He struck out 174 batters while walking just 28. The Cubs have missed Imanaga dearly, especially since Justin Steele is out for the season. Chicago’s starting rotation had a 4.41 ERA in Imanaga’s absence prior to Matthew Boyd’s outing against the Pittsburgh Pirates. Before...

title: Lật tẩy “đế chế” kem trộn livestream, phát hiện hơn 10 tấn mỹ phẩm không rõ nguồn gốc
content: Ngày 14/6, Công an tỉnh Tây Ninh vừa phá thành công chuyên án bắt giữ cơ sở sản xuất và buôn bán mỹ phẩm giả quy mô lớn, do đối tượng L.T.M.D (34 tuổi, ngụ phường Ninh Sơn, TP. Tây Ninh) đứng đầu, cùng sự tham gia của N.T.T (33 tuổi, thị trấn Dương Minh Châu, huyện Dương Minh Châu) . Theo thông tin từ Phòng PC03 – Công an Tây Ninh, trong thời gian dài, L.T.M.D cùng N.T.T thường xuyên livestream bán mỹ phẩm giá “rẻ bất thường”, thu hút hàng trăm nghìn đơn hàng khắp cả nước. Trước dấu hiệu bất minh, cơ quan chức năng đã xác lập chuyên án đấu tranh. Trưa 13/6, Công an tỉnh phối hợp với Chi cục Quản lý thị trường đã kiểm tra xe ô tô biển số 53S‐0664 do L.V.T điều khiển (huyện Châu Thành). Trên xe chứa 32 thùng kem trộn, tổng trọng lượng khoảng 1,2 tấn, không có hóa đơn chứng từ. L.V.T khai nhận đây là lô hàng của L.T.M.D, được thuê chở xuống TP Hồ Chí Minh để giao cho khách. Các trinh sát đã khẩn trương tiến hành khám xét nhà riêng và kho hàng của L.T.M.D tại phường Ninh Sơn, TP. Tây Ninh. Tại đây, công an bắt quả tang hai người đang gia công, sản xuất mỹ phẩm giả. Tang vật thu giữ bao gồm: 20 thùng nhựa chứa hóa chất mang nhãn mác nước ngoài; 10 bao hóa chất rắn (mỗi bao khoảng 50 kg); 200 kg kem thành phẩm; 100...

title: Отец Илона Маска прокомментировал победу Мерца на выборах
content: МОСКВА, 15 июн - РИА Новости. Канцлер ФРГ Фридрих Мерц со своей воинственной риторикой не нравится немцам, его победа на выборах оказалась "неверным выбором", заявил в интервью РИА Новости отец Илона Маска, бизнесмен Эррол Маск. "На выборах этот "воинствующий ястреб", Мерц ... стал канцлером, победив лишь с небольшим отрывом. Я не думаю, что он нравится им. Я думаю, что он - неправильный выбор для Германии . Но пусть попытает счастья, и посмотрим, что получится", - сказал Маск-старший. Канцлер ФРГ Фридрих Мерц 26 мая заявил, что Великобритания , Франция , США и теперь Германия сняли ограничения по дальности с военных поставок Украине , Киев может атаковать дальнобойным оружием цели на территории РФ . Позднее вице-канцлер ФРГ и лидер Социал-демократической партии Германии (СДПГ) Ларс Клингбайль заявил, что Берлин , вопреки заявлению Мерца, не менял своей позиции по поставкам оружия Украине. Официальный представитель МИД РФ Мария Захарова в свою очередь заявила, что Москва будет расценивать удар немецкими ракетами Taurus по любым российским объектам как участие Берлина в боевых действиях на стороне Киева.

title: 재소환된 SK '최종현 정신'...최태원 "경영 기본기에 집중하자"
creator: kjh0109@fnnews.com 권준호
content: 13~14일 SK 하반기 전략회의최종현 선대회장 영상 속 등장"본원적 경쟁력 강화하자" 공감AI 인프라 등에 대규모 투자 추진 2025년 SK경영전략회의에 참여한 SK 경영진이 화면을 통해 고(故) 최종현 선대회장의 육성을 듣고 있다. SK 제공 [파이낸셜뉴스] 13일 경기 이천 SKMS 연구소에서 열린 SK그룹 하반기 전략회의 현장. 고(故) 최종현 SK그룹 선대회장이 화면에 등장했다. 최태원 SK그룹 회장을 비롯해 최재원 SK그룹 수석부회장, 최창원 SK수펙스추구협의회 의장, 주요 멤버사 최고경영자(CEO) 20여명의 눈과 귀가 모두 최 선대회장 입에 쏠렸다. 최 선대회장은 영상에서 SK 고유의 기업문화 및 경영이념 'SKMS'를 강조했다. 최 회장이 올해 하반기 전략회의에서 자기반성을 통한 '경영의 기본기'에 집중할 것을 주문했다. 본원적 경쟁력을 강화하고 이해관계자들의 신뢰를 회복, 대내외적 위기 상황을 극복하자는 취지로 해석된다. 이와 함께 인공지능(AI), 첨단 반도체 등 국가 핵심산업 육성에 기여한다는 계획을 공유하고 향후 성장 사업에 대규모 투자를 집중하기로 했다. SK그룹은 지난 13~14일 경기도 이천 SKMS 연구소에서 경영전략회의를 열었다고 15일 밝혔다. 이번 회의에는 최 회장과 최 수석부회장이 직접 참석했다. 지난해 이들은 해외 일정 등으로 화상회의에만 참석했다. 이날 회의에는 최 선대회장이 영상 속에 깜짝 등장했다. 최 회장 등 SK 주요 경영진은 최 선대회장의 SK정신을 다시 듣고 결의를 다졌다. 이들은...

title: Фальков: Готов проект изменений в закон о новой модели высшего образования
content: "Готов проект соответствующих изменений в федеральный закон", - рассказал он РИА Новости . По словам министра, новая модель высшего образования во всех основных ее элементах поддерживается профессиональным сообществом и работодателями. Также ее хорошо воспринимают в обществе. Ранее Фальков сообщил, что с нового учебного года государство начнет регулировать количество платных мест в университетах. Это коснется всех вузов, специальностей и направлений подготовки. Министр отметил, что есть обстоятельный анализ по всем регионам и по каждому университету.

title: Mỹ kỷ niệm 250 năm ngày thành lập lực lượng Lục quân
content: Theo phóng viên TTXVN tại Washington, tối 14/6, dưới sự chủ trì của Tổng thống Donald Trump, cuộc diễu binh quy mô lớn kỷ niệm 250 năm ngày thành lập Lục quân với sự tham gia của 6.700 binh sỹ cùng hàng trăm phương tiện quân sự đã diễn ra tại thủ đô Washington. Đây được xem là cuộc diễu binh lớn nhất tại thủ đô Washington kể từ năm 1991 sau Chiến tranh Vùng Vịnh lần thứ nhất. Sự kiện quy tụ đa dạng các loại phương tiện quân sự, từ hiện đại như xe tăng M1 Abrams, xe chiến đấu bộ binh Bradley và Stryker, pháo tự hành Paladin đến các máy bay trực thăng Apache, Black Hawk và Chinook. Đặc biệt, cuộc diễu binh còn có sự xuất hiện của các máy bay cổ điển từ thời Thế chiến II như B-25, P-51 Mustang và B-17. Công tác chuẩn bị cho sự kiện được thực hiện hết sức kỹ lưỡng. Quân đội Mỹ đã triển khai đặt các tấm kim loại trên mặt đường tại những khu vực trọng yếu nhằm bảo vệ hệ thống hạ tầng thành phố. Nhiều tuyến đường xung quanh Quảng trường Quốc gia bị phong tỏa, trong khi vòng kiểm soát an ninh được thiết lập rộng gần 30 km. Để đảm bảo an toàn cho các màn trình diễn trên không của máy bay và lính dù, Cục Hàng không Liên bang đã áp dụng các hạn chế bay xung quanh Washington. Sân bay quốc tế Reagan...

title: Ex-Clippers Star Reacts to Caitlin Clark Making WNBA History in Liberty-Fever
content: After missing five games due to a quad strain, WNBA superstar Caitlin Clark made her return to the court today and absolutely stole the show. The Indiana Fever guard led her team to a 102-88 victory over the New York Liberty, handing them their first loss of the season. Clark had a historic performance, putting up 32 points, eight rebounds, and nine assists on seven three-pointers made. She is the first player in league history to reach these numbers or higher in a game. Clark had many celebrities, particularly current and former NBA players, reacting to her performance. Former LA Clippers forward Matt Barnes reacted to Clark's Instagram post after her monster game. "Killer!" Barnes commented under Clark's post. Barnes, a long-time NBA veteran, has continuously supported Clark throughout her journey from the NCAA to the WNBA, particularly with his podcast alongside fellow NBA veteran Stephen Jackson, All the Smoke . The 23-year-old took the sports world by storm during her time at Iowa, leading her team to multiple NCAA Championship appearances, gaining a large following for women's basketball. Clark is now averaging 19 points, six rebounds, 9.3 assists, 1.3 steals, and a block per game after recording her first 30-point performance of the season. The Fever now improve to 5-5, and sit as the No. 3 seed in the Eastern Conference. Indiana certainly missed Clark's presence, as the team went 2-3 in her five-game absence. With the superstar back from injury, the Fever are now 3-1...

title: Two dead, two injured after trailer crashes into car on Jalan Kuantan-Maran highway
content: KUANTAN, June 15 — Two people were killed and two others injured in a collision involving a car and a trailer lorry on Jalan Kuantan-Maran highway yesterday afternoon.The crash, which occurred at Batu 12 around 3:30 pm, is believed to have happened when the lorry, travelling from Johor towards Kuantan, lost control and swerved into oncoming traffic before colliding with a Toyota Vios.Kuantan police chief, ACP Wan Mohd Zahari Wan Busu said Norihan Mustafa, 57, a passenger in the back seat of the car, died at the scene.The lorry driver, 24-year-old Jayavarman Murugan, was taken to Tengku Ampuan Afzan Hospital (HTAA) but later died in the emergency ward.The car, which was heading towards Maran from Kuantan, was carrying three people. The driver, Mohd Ridzwan Ab Mubin, 59, sustained facial and shoulder injuries, while another passenger escaped with minor injuries.Both vehicles are being inspected by the Computerised Vehicle Inspection Centre (PUSPAKOM) and the case is being investigated under Section 41(1) of the Road Transport Act 1987, which covers dangerous driving causing death.The injured survivors are being treated at HTAA. — Bernama

title: 합산 팔로어 '300만' 스트리머, 삼성 3D 모니터 체험한 사연은
creator: kjh0109@fnnews.com 권준호
content: 삼성, '오디세이 언베일드 2025' 행사 인기 스트리머 캐드렐과 조지 클라키가 13일(현지시간) 영국 런던 삼성 킹스크로스 '오디세이 언베일드 2025' 행사에서 오디세이 3D와 오디세이 유기발광다이오드(OLED) G8 모니터로 게임을 즐기며 팬들과 소통하고 있다. 삼성전자 제공 [파이낸셜뉴스] 삼성전자는 지난 13일(현지시간) 영국 런던 '삼성 킹스크로스'에서 '오디세이 언베일드 2025'를 진행했다고 15일 밝혔다.이날 행사에는 제품 체험단, 현지 정보기술(IT)∙게임 분야 스트리머와 크리에이터로 구성된 100여명의 삼성 오디세이 게이밍 모니터 팬들이 참석했다. 행사장에는 지난 3월 출시한 무안경 3D 게이밍 모니터 '오디세이 3D'와 4K 240헤르츠(Hz)를 지원하는 '오디세이 유기발광다이오드(OLED) G8' 등 게이밍 모니터 신제품을 직접 체험할 수 있는 자리가 마련됐다. 이색 볼거리도 마련됐다. 합산 팔로어 300만명에 육박하는 인기 게임 스트리머 캐드렐과 조지 클라키가 참석, 게임 대결을 펼쳤다. 두 스트리머는 넥슨의 하드코어 액션 롤플레이(RPG) 게임 '퍼스트 버서커: 카잔'게임을 고화질 3차원 시청 경험을 선사하는 '오디세이 3D'로 플레이했다. 이어 오디세이 OLED G8 모니터를 활용, 사이오닉스의 레이싱 스포츠 게임 '로켓 리그'에서 대전을 펼쳤다. 이후 현장 참석자들이 스트리머들과 함께 게임에 참여할 수 있는 이벤트도 진행됐다. 스트리머 간 게임 대전 및 현장 참석자들과의 참여 이벤트는 오디세이 공식 트위치 채널을 통해 전 세계 생중계됐다. 실시간...

title: Dos policías fueron atacados con arma de fuego en el municipio de Gigante, Huila, durante un operativo
creator: Luciano Niño
content: El 13 de junio de 2025, durante un operativo nocturno en la vereda Bajo Corozal, en el municipio de Gigante, departamento del Huila, un grupo de uniformados de la Policía Nacional fue atacado con armas de fuego por los ocupantes de un vehículo sospechoso. El enfrentamiento dejó como saldo la muerte de uno de los presuntos atacantes y la captura de otro, quien fue hallado herido en las inmediaciones del lugar. El ataque ocurrió cuando los agentes realizaban una verificación de rutina al vehículo. Durante el intercambio de disparos, dos policías resultaron lesionados. Según informó la Policía Nacional, ambos fueron atendidos inicialmente en el hospital local de Gigante y posteriormente trasladados al Hospital Universitario de Neiva, donde se encuentran en condición estable, de acuerdo con el reporte médico preliminar.Ahora puede seguirnos en nuestro WhatsApp Channel y en Facebook“La Policía Nacional se permite informar que, en el marco de un procedimiento de patrullaje realizado en zona rural del municipio de Gigante, vereda Bajo Corozal dos uniformados adscritos a la estación de policía fueron atacados con arma de fuego por parte de personas que se movilizaban en un vehículo”, señaló el reporte policial.El segundo sospechoso, que fue encontrado herido cerca del lugar de los hechos, será presentado ante la Fiscalía General de la Nación para iniciar el proceso judicial correspondiente. Las autoridades pusieron en marcha las investigaciones para esclarecer...

title: Scottie Scheffler-Sam Burns relationship, explained: How PGA golfers met as teens, grew into close friends | Sporting News
creator: Daniel Chavkin
content: Being a professional golfer is a unique profession that requires a lot of travel and time on the road. As a result, many golfers become close with each other, which is exactly what happened with Scottie Scheffler and Sam Burns. The two golfers have developed as players simultaneously, of course with Scheffler reaching heights far higher than Burns thus far. While Scheffler has reached stardom, Burns has been been right next to him throughout, both on and off the course. Here's a breakdown of the relationship between Scheffler and Burns over the years. US OPEN HQ: Live U.S. Open leaderboard | U.S. Open TV coverage | Saturday tee times Scottie Scheffler-Sam Burns friendship Scheffler and Burns are close friends, and their friendship dates back to when they were teenagers, when they played junior golf together. As they graduated college and entered professional golf at the same time, the two have grown close, describing their faith as a big reason for their friendship. Now, Scheffler, Burns and their families spend a ton of time together on the road in tournaments, often living together at each host site. Scheffler's wife, Meredith, even credits Caroline Burns for getting Scheffler into chickpea pasta . Additionally, when they both made the 2023 USA Ryder Cup team, Scheffler and Burns would get paired together for rounds due to their chemistry. "Obviously, Scottie and I have played a lot of golf together, and we're excited to team up and try to go out there and get the first...

title: «Не выделялось»: совпавший с 79-летием Трампа парад ВС США разочаровал всех
content: В столице Соединенных Штатов подошел к концу парад в честь 250-летия Вооруженных сил страны. Подробнее о празднике на Национальной аллее Вашингтона рассказал корреспондент РИА Новости. «Несмотря на значительный ажиотаж вокруг парада, само мероприятие не выделялось яркими моментами... В параде принимали участие парашютисты, которые приземлялись на площадку у Белого дома, однако из-за деревьев многим зрителям их было не видно», — отметили на РИА Новости. В рамках торжественного мероприятия гостям продемонстрировали американские сверхтяжелые танки «Абрамс», бронеавтомобили «Бредли» и другие образцы известной военной техники. Отмечается, что многие решили покинуть Национальную аллею еще до завершения праздничного парада. Примечательно, что торжество совпало с 79-летием Президента США Дональда Трампа. Однако омрачило день рождения американского лидера не только отсутствие заинтересованности граждан в параде Вооруженных сил страны. В ряде крупнейших городов США 14 июня начались антиправительственные митинги — на данный момент Департамент полиции Лос-Анджелеса приступил к разгону демонстрантов.

title: Vulnerabilidad en iPhone, corregida con iOS 18.3.1, permitió infectar dispositivos con el ‘spyware’ Paragon
creator: Carlos Salazar
content: Madrid, 15 Jun. (Portaltic/EP) – Apple corrigió una vulnerabilidad de día cero con la versión iOS 18.3.1, lanzada en febrero, que permitió a actores maliciosos instalar el ‘software’ espía conocido como Paragon en dispositivos iPhone, concretamente en el de dos periodistas europeos. Los de Cupertino identificaron nuevos ataques ‘spyware’ en dispositivos iPhone a finales de abril, con lo que se enviaron notificaciones a usuarios en un total de cien países, en las que se alertó de la existencia de un ‘software’ espía mercenario en sus dispositivos y del riesgo que esto supone. Uno de los afectados fue el periodista, Ciro Pellegrino, quien también alertó de estas notificaciones ‘spyware’. En este sentido, investigadores de The Citizen Lab, laboratorio de tecnología y derechos humanos perteneciente a la Universidad de Toronto (Canadá), han concluido ahora en un nuevo informe que, tras investigar estas notificaciones, se trata del ‘software’ espía Paragon, y han comprobado que afectó al mencionado Pellegrino y a otro periodista europeo. Este ‘spyware’ se conoce como Graphite y tiene capacidades similares a las de Pegasus, desarrollado por NSO Group. De este modo, una vez que infecta el teléfono, el operador del ‘software’ espía puede acceder a todos los datos del teléfono, incluso leer mensajes cifrados. En concreto, la investigación ha detallado que este ‘spyware’ infectó el iPhone de los periodistas aprovechándose de una vulnerabilidad de iOS, que fue...

title: உ.பி.யில் பாஜக தலைவர் கொலையில் 16 பேருக்கு ஆயுள் தண்டனை
content: பாஜக தலைவரும், சமூக சேவகருமான பசுபதிநாத் வெட்டிக் கொலை செய்யப்பட்ட வழக்கில் 3 ஆண்டுகள் கழிதது, 16 பேருக்கு ஆயுள் தண்டனையை வாராணசி நீதிமன்றம் வழங்கியுள்ளது. உத்தரபிரதேச மாநிலம் வாராணசியிலுள்ள சிக்ரா பகுதியைச் சேர்ந்தவர் பசுபதிநாத். சமூக சேவகரான இவர், பாஜக நிர்வாகியாகவும் இருந்து வந்தார். இவரது மகன் ராஜ்குமார் சிங் (42). கடந்த 2022-ல் அப்பகுதியிலுள்ள சாராயக் கடையில் சிலர், தகராறில் ஈடுபட்டனர். அதை ராஜ்குமார் சிங் தட்டிக் கேட்டார். இதையடுத்து ராஜ்குமார் சிங்கை தாக்க ஒரு கும்பல் ஓடி வந்தது. இதைத் தொடர்ந்து தனது மகனைக் காப்பாற்ற பசுபதிநாத் ஓடினார். அந்த கும்பல், பசுபதிநாத்தை சரமாரியாக வெட்டிவிட்டு தப்பியோடியது. மகனைக் காப்பாற்றும் முயற்சியில் பசுபதிநாத் உயிரிழந்தார். இந்த வழக்கில் 18 பேர் கைது செய்யப்பட்டு வழக்கு தொடரப்பட்டது. இதில் 2 பேர் மைனர் என்பதால் அவர்கள், சிறுவர் கூர்நோக்கு இல்லங்களுக்கு அனுப்பப்பட்டனர். கடந்த 3 ஆண்டுகளாக விசாரணை நடந்து வந்த நிலையில் நேற்று தீர்ப்பு வழங்கப்பட்டது. குற்றம் சாட்டப்பட்ட 16 பேருக்கும் ஆயுள் தண்டனை விதித்து நீதிபதி தீர்ப்பு வழங்கினார். மேலும் அவர்களுக்கு அபராதம் வழங்கியும் நீதிபதி தீர்ப்பு வழங்கினார். குற்றம்சாட்டப்பட்ட 18 பேரில் 2 பேர் மைனர்களாக உள்ள நிலையில், அவர்கள் மீதான வழக்கு சிறுவர் கூர்நோக்கு நீதி வாரியத்தின் முன்பு உள்ளதாக அரசு வழக்கறிஞர் மனோஜ் குப்தா தெரிவித்தார்.

title: Thousands attend 'No Kings' protests across Minnesota
creator: Forum News Service staff
content: From Duluth to Rochester and throughout the northlands, throngs of protestors took to the streets on Saturday to protest President Donald Trump at "No Kings" rallies and marches on the same day a military parade celebrating the U.S. Army's 250th anniversary, marched through Washington, D.C. Saturday was also Trump's 79th birthday. ADVERTISEMENT DULUTH Thousands of protesters gathered at the corner of Lake Avenue and Superior Street to protest President Donald Trump. It was among similar events held across the country. Veteran Darryl Scott, of Duluth, carried the flag of the U.S. Marine Corps, in which he served from 1978 to 1984, and wore a red hat with white text that read, “Made ya look, Black Lives Matter.” As he marched down the Lakewalk, he stepped away from the rest of the crowd to stop at the Northland Vietnam Veterans Memorial. He paused, stood at attention and saluted the wall bearing the names of area service members who died in the war. Scott said he couldn’t stand the way Trump treats veterans or treated the late U.S. senator and prisoner of war John McCain. “It seems like the average enlisted man or serviceman takes their oath to the Constitution way more serious than a lot of these politicians,” Scott said. “The oath, to us, especially Marines, the oath is forever, and we swear that oath against all enemies foreign and domestic.” ROCHESTER An estimated 2,500 to 3,000 people showed up with signs to chant and march in Rochester’s “No Kings” event. ADVERTISEMENT...

title: 경기도 '남북한 통일결연식' 개최...따듯한 동행 이어간다
creator: 2ks@fnnews.com 김경수
content: 북한 가족 등 127명 참여 용인특례시 라마다용인호텔에서 열린 ‘남북한가족 통일결연식'에서 가족들이 기념 촬영을 하고 있다. 경기도 제공 【파이낸셜뉴스 경기=김경수 기자】 경기도가 용인특례시 라마다용인호텔에서 ‘남북한가족 통일결연식’을 개최했다고 15일 밝혔다. 하루 전 열린 결연식에는 남북한 40가족이 참여했다. 본 행사에 앞서 가족 간 상견례 및 오리엔테이션이 진행됐다. 프로그램으로는 △결연 사업 활동 계획 발표 △결연 가족 소개 △결연 증서 서명·교환 △결연 가족 에버랜드 체험 등이다. 이날 결연을 맺은 남북한 가족들은 향후 소모임을 통해 가족 모임과 친목의 시간을 가진다. 올해 고령·독거 어르신들에 대한 결연 가족의 봉사 활동이 새롭게 예정돼 있다. 이형은 경기도청 평화기반조성과장은 “북한 이탈 주민이 우리 사회 일원으로 자리매김하고, 행복한 삶을 살아갈 수 있도록 계속해 정착 지원 사업을 발굴하겠다. 아낌없는 지원과 관심을 기울이겠다”고 말했다. 한편 경기도 북한 이탈 주민은 지난 4월 말 기준 총 1만1155명이다. 전국에서 가장 많은 인원이 거주하고 있다. 전국 3만1443명의 35.5%를 차지한다. 2ks@fnnews.com 김경수 기자 ※ 저작권자 c 파이낸셜뉴스, 무단전재-재배포 금지

title: 3日間3パットなしは2人だけ サム・バーンズは“世界No.1の親友”に続けるか
В ДНР призвали родственников попавших в плен не передавать деньги ВСУ
content: ДОНЕЦК, 15 июн - РИА Новости. Уполномоченная по правам человека в Донецкой Народной Республике Дарья Морозова в разговоре с РИА Новости призвала родственников попавших в плен военнослужащих РФ не передавать украинской стороне деньги в надежде поскорее вызволить близких - средства вымогают ВСУ. "Наши ребята попадают в плен, ВСУ начинают вымогать деньги и звонить родственникам. Мы понимаем, что там есть признаки насильственного воздействия (на пленного - ред.). Хочу заверить граждан: никакие финансы не решат вопрос о возвращении из плена. Необходимо набраться терпения и ждать", - сказала Морозова . По ее словам, нередко граждане республики попадаются на шантаж со стороны ВСУ, продавая машины и квартиры, чтобы помочь своим родным, находящемся в плену. Если подобная ситуация возникла необходимо обращаться в правоохранительные органы, заключила омбудсмен.

title: 'We rose to the occasion': Norwell boys lacrosse rallies past Cohasset to win state title
creator: Patriot Ledger
content: BOURNE — No person in Massachusetts has ever made snow angels in June.Well, actually, scratch that. The Norwell High boys lacrosse team knows a guy.Matt Panttila was knocked down upon firing in his third goal late in the Division 4 state championship game against Cohasset when the junior attack landed on his back and performed a new celebration.“I saw it on Instagram, so I might as well do it," Panttila said with a laugh. "After, the ref came up to me and said, ‘Don’t do any more of that.’ ... But it felt amazing.”The rally continued as Panttila later scored for a fourth time to seal the Clippers' 11-6 victory at Mass. Maritime Academy in Bourne on Saturday. The win stamps Norwell's third title in the last four years.The Clippers won Division 3 crowns in 2022 and 2023 before dropping down to Division 4 last year. Norwell, the bracket's third seed, knocked off the rival Skippers (No. 1 seed; 21-3) to top last springs finish in the semifinals and send its seven seniors off with a third state title in their careers.“It’s an amazing experience for all of those kids," head coach Josh Stolp said. "I think they come to practice wanting to win another state title. Maybe it’s a little greedy, but that’s just how it is.” For Panttila, Saturday's four-goal burst was fueled by a little friendly trash talk at home. His older sister, Holly, a future Vanderbilt University student, powered the Norwell girls lacrosse team to a state championship win over Cohasset two days ago. “We were...

title: Saprissa admite error que le impidió cobrar a Alajuelense por Aarón Suárez, Ian Lawrence y Santiago van der Putten
creator: Fanny Tayver Marín, Milton Montenegro
content: Cuando se conoció a través del informe del fiscal de Liga Deportiva Alajuelense, Juan Carlos Tristán, que los rojinegros esperan que Saprissa les pague ¢36.515.575 por derechos de formación de Álvaro Zamora y Kenay Myrie, muchos empezaron a hacer números.No faltará quien haya pensado que la “S” debería “sacarse el clavo” con la Liga y cobrarle —si es que no lo había hecho— por Aarón Suárez e Ian Lawrence; inclusive hasta por Santiago van der Putten, quien estuvo unos pocos meses con los morados, porque se formó en Consultants.Pero eso hoy no es viable, y la realidad es que Alajuelense no le pagó ni un colón a Saprissa por ninguno de esos jugadores.¿Qué pasó? El gerente general de los morados, Gustavo Chinchilla acudió al programa 120 Minutos de Monumental y ahí explicó que un día lo llamó el directivo rojinegro León Weinstok para decirle de un caso, que era Kenay Myrie.El reclamo por Álvaro Zamora viene desde hace tiempo. Hace un año, el fiscal de la Liga informó a los asociados del club que entre los procedimientos de cobro de derechos de formación que se encontraban abiertos había uno en la Cámara Nacional de Resolución de Disputas (CNRD).Se trataba de una gestión en la que Alajuelense pretendía el cobro de ¢10.912.328,80, costas personales y procesales por derechos de formación de Álvaro Zamora Mata contra el Deportivo Saprissa.Mientras que en el informe actual, el fiscal indicó que se llegó a una conciliación y que esa cifra de...

title: Sin Institucionalidad no habrá seguridad real
creator: Claudia Blum
content: El país atraviesa serios desafíos en materia de seguridad. Y si a esto se suman los retos que atraviesa nuestra institucionalidad democrática, el panorama resulta alarmante, porque si la institucionalidad no funciona adecuadamente , aumenta la vulnerabilidad de la población frente a las acciones de los violentos. En nuestro país hemos padecido una extensa historia de violencia armada: un Siglo XIX de guerras civiles; un conflicto Liberal y Conservador en la primera mitad del Siglo XX que derivó en La Violencia recrudecida después del asesinato de Jorge Eliécer Gaitán; la aparición posterior de guerrillas como las Farc y el Eln , de grupos paramilitares como las AUC y otros actores ilegales enfrascados en un conflicto armado interno en el que miles de civiles sufrieron asesinatos, secuestros, desplazamientos, y todo tipo de crímenes graves. Aunque a comienzos del Siglo XXI el Estado fortaleció su capacidad de defensa y protección de la población, y hubo algunos procesos de desarme y desmovilización, la violencia ha continuado sustituyendo actores y formas, nutrida por el narcotráfico y la impunidad. El gobierno de Petro ha tenido discursos e iniciativas desacertadas alrededor de la ‘paz total’, bajo unos intentos de diálogo con todo tipo de actores violentos y criminales, pero con muy pocos resultados. Su empeño ha traído escepticismo ante el incremento de masacres, homicidios de líderes sociales y violencia en zonas rurales controladas por grupos armados...

title: Washburn: Boston Celtics are operating from a position of weaknesses this summer
creator: Celtics Wire
content: This summer is expected to be one of change for the Boston Celtics. The current roster is projected to cost in the region of $500 million once luxury taxes are included in the calculation. Now that Boston isn't expected to contend for a championship next season, it makes no sense to foot such an astronomically high bill. As such, Brad Stevens could look to inject some youth into the rotation while also ducking under the second luxury tax apron. Veterans such as Jrue Holiday, Kristaps Porzingis and even Sam Hauser are all rumored to be available on the trade market in the coming months. Although both would command significant trade packages, Derrick White and Jaylen Brown could also be attainable.Nevertheless, Gary Washburn of the Boston Globe believes Boston will negotiate from a position of weakness this summer. Other teams around the league are aware of the Celtics' current financial position and their desire to get younger. Therefore, they will be operating from a position of strength in any potential negotiations. Washburn's comments came via a recent episode of CLNS Media's "Big 3" podcast. You can watch the full podcast episode by clicking on the embedded video above. Watch the "Taylor Talks Celtics" podcast on:YouTube: https://bit.ly/3QnlPcSWebsite: https://bit.ly/3WoA0CfThis article originally appeared on Celtics Wire: Washburn: Celtics operating from a position of weaknesses this summer

title: Inter Milan's Mehdi Taremi stuck in native Iran, will miss Club World Cup amid Israel conflict
creator: Yahoo Sports
content: Inter Milan will play the 2025 FIFA Club World Cup without forward Mehdi Taremi amid the escalating conflict between Israel and his native Iran, according to ESPN . Israel struck Iran on Friday with a series of missile attacks aimed at the country's nuclear facilities and high-ranking military officials, with Revolutionary Guard head Hossein Salami among the casualties. Iran responded Saturday with its own deadly missile strike, triggering an expanded assault from Israel . The exchange of missiles has grounded all Iranian flights over the past two days, leaving Taremi unable to join his Inter Milan teammates in Los Angeles. Taremi had been playing for Iran's national team earlier this week, scoring a goal against North Korea on Tuesday in a World Cup qualifier in Tehran. Inter Milan is scheduled to open its Club World Cup campaign against Mexico's Monterrey on Tuesday. Reports from Italian media indicate Taremi will not join Inter for any Club World Cup matches, regardless of how the situation in Iran develops. The 32-year-old Taremi is in his second year with Inter after joining the club on a free transfer from Porto last summer. He recorded three goals and seven assists in 43 appearances across all competitions in his first season, which saw Inter reach the Champions League final.

title: Noida: Four linked to trader’s murder, fraud, theft; nabbed
content: Two men linked to the murder of a local trader and multiple fraud cases involving foreign currency were arrested by Noida Police after a shootout near Elevated Road in Sector 54 on Saturday, officers said, adding that the two accused were injured in the incident. Two other accused, including the kingpin, were arrested later from Ghaziabad and Delhi. Deputy Commissioner of Police (Noida) Yamuna Prasad said the encounter occurred during a routine police check when two suspects on a motorcycle refused to stop and opened fire. “While a team from Sector 24 police station was conducting routine checking near Elevated Road, Sector 54, two suspects on a motorcycle failed to stop when signalled by the police and instead opened fire on our team in an attempt to escape. ‘In self-defence, officers fired back, injuring both suspects who were subsequently overpowered and taken into custody,’ said Prasad. The injured men—Mukul Sharma, 25, of Vasundhara, Ghaziabad, and Akash Upadhyay, 24, of Noida—were taken to a hospital for treatment, police said. Officers recovered a stolen motorcycle, a .32-bore pistol, a country-made .315-bore pistol, live cartridges, two mobile phones, and two bags containing fraudulently acquired Canadian and UAE currency worth approximately ₹ 10.3 lakh from the two. Police said the suspects confessed during interrogation to killing Ompal Bhati, a 40-year-old currency trader from Sector 94, Noida, on Wednesday. They lured him to a rented property in Sector 12 under...

title: ФОТО. Футболистка Металлистка и вратарь Шахтера встречаются
content: Молдавская футболистка Вероника Кожухарь из «Металлиста 1925» опубликовала новое фото с отдыха в белом купальнике. Она позировала у бассейна, подчеркнув идеальную фигуру. title: KSW 107. Полищук разобрался с немцем Джабраиловым в первом раунде
content: 14 июня на арене «ERGO ARENA» в Гданьске-Сопоте (Польша) состоялся турнир по смешанным единоборствам KSW 107. Главным событием для Украины стал бой в полулегком весе (65,8 кг) между Алексеем Полищуком (13-5) и представителем Германии Исламом Джабраиловым (2-1). Украинец провел безупречный бой и победил своего соперника в первом раунде. Алексей Полищук провел техническое треугольное удушение соперника, после чего судья боя зафиксировал победу украинца нокаутом. Это четырнадцатая победа Полищука в профессиональной карьере.
