content: धर्मशाला। जिला कांगड़ा में पिछले पांच माह में साढ़े तीन लाख से अधिक पर्यटक पहुंचे हैं। इनमें 8,500 से अधिक विदेशी कांगड़ा घाटी में पहुंचे। मई माह में भारत-पाक बॉर्डर पर तनाव के बाद पर्यटकों की आमद में कमी आई थी, लेकिन इसके बाद से संख्या में लगातार बढ़ोतरी हो रही है।

title: తిరుమల శ్రీవారి దర్శనం.. అరుదైన రికార్డులు సృష్టించిన శుక్రవారాలు
content: వేసవి సెలవులు ముగిసాయి..బళ్లు మొదలయ్యాయి. దీంతో ఇక తిరుమల శ్రీవారి దర్శనానికి వచ్చే భక్తుల సంఖ్య తగ్గుతుంది అంటున్నారు. ఇక గత రెండు, మూడు వారాలుగా తిరుమలలో విపరీతమై రద్దీ నెలకొని ఉంది. శ్రీవారి దర్శనానికి ఏకంగా 24-26గంటల సమయం పట్టింది అంటే భక్తుల ఎంత పెద్ద సంఖ్యలో వచ్చారో అర్థం చేసుకోవచ్చు. ఈక్రమంలో ఆసక్తికర విషయాలు వెల్లడించారు. ఈసారి తిరమల శ్రీవారి దర్శనాలకు సంబంధించి.. శుక్రవారాలు ప్రత్యేక రికార్డులు సృష్టించాయని అంటున్నారు. శ్రీవారి దర్శనానికి వచ్చే భక్తులకు, శుక్రవారానికి ఏంటి సంబంధం అంటే.. సాధారణంగా ప్రతి శుక్రవారం తిరముల శ్రీవారికి ఆలయ పూజారులు అభిషేక సేవ నిర్వహిస్తారు. ఈ ప్రత్యేక కార్యక్రమం వల్ల.. శుక్రవారం నాడు దర్శన సమయం సుమారు 3 గంటలకు పైగా తగ్గుతుంది. అందుకే శుక్రవారం రోజున స్వామి దర్శనానికి వచ్చే భక్తుల సంఖ్య.. మిగతా రోజులతో పోలిస్తే కాస్త తక్కువగా ఉంటుంది. ప్రతి శుక్రవారం 60-65 వేల మంది మాత్రమే తిరుమల శ్రీవారిని దర్శించుకునే అవకాశం ఉంటుంది. మిగతా రోజులతో పోలిస్తే ఇది తక్కువ. అయితే ఈసారి మాత్రం అనగా మే,జూన్ నెలలోని శుక్రవారాలు ప్రత్యేక రికార్డు సృష్టించాయని టీటీడీ అధికారులు తెలుపుతున్నారు. మార్చి, ఏప్రిల్ నెలలో పోల్చితే.. మే, జూన్ నెలల్లోని శుక్రవారాల్లో కూడా రికార్డు స్థాయిలో భక్తులు దర్శనానికి వచ్చారని తెలిపారు. టీటీడీ అదనపు ఈఓ వెంకయ్య చౌదరి దీనిపై మాట్లాడుతూ.. ఈ సారి మే, జూన్ నెలల్లోని శుక్రవారాల్లో గతంలో కన్నా ఎక్కువగా అనగా సుమారు 10 వేల మంది భక్తులు అదనంగా శ్రీవారిని దర్శించుకున్నారు. ఉన్నతాధికారుల, సిబ్బంది సమన్వయం, పర్యవేక్షణ వల్లనే ఇది సాధ్యం అయ్యిందని తెలిపారు. ఇక మే నెలో చివరి రెండు శుక్రవారాలు అనగా మే 23న.. 73,374 మంది, ము 30న 71,721 మంది భక్తులు...

We hit 85 in our Raiders countdown to kickoff. Who wore it best and who's wearing it now
creator: Raiders Wire
content: We've reached 85 days until the Raiders season opener at Foxboro against the Patriots, With our countdown at 85 days we take a look at who currently dons the number in Silver & Black and who has brought it the most distinction.No. 85Who's wearing it now: WR Ketron Jackson JrJackson is an undrafted rookie out of Baylor. The 6-2, 200-pound receiver put up 1099 and seven touchdowns over four seasons of college ball, first at Arkansas and then at Baylor.Who wore it best: DL Carleton OatsOats joined the Raiders as a 21st round pick in 1964. He would play eight years with the Raiders (1965-72) apearing in 111 games withy 51 starts. He was part of the 1967 AFL Championship team that would lose to the Green Bay Packers in Super Bowl II. He was part of three other Raiders teams that made the AFL Championship game.This article originally appeared on Raiders Wire: Raiders countdown to kickoff No. 85: Who wore it best, wearing it now

title: Mundial: Copacabana sedia evento para torcedores de Flamengo, Fluminense e Botafogo
creator: Gávea News
content: Com a Copa do Mundo de Clubes prestes a começar, a cidade do Rio de Janeiro se prepara para viver um momento inédito no futebol internacional. Pela primeira vez, uma mesma cidade conta com três times participantes na competição, e, diante desse cenário singular, a Praia de Copacabana foi escolhida para sediar uma grande Fan Zone. O espaço foi criado com o propósito de reunir torcedores de diversas agremiações em uma arena capaz de comportar até 10 mil pessoas por dia. A estrutura da Fan Zone foi organizada pela mesma empresa responsável pela montagem da Fan Fest da Copa América de 2024. Com entrada gratuita, o espaço contará com transmissões dos jogos em dois telões de LED e diversas atrações culturais e gastronômicas. Os jogos exibidos terão transmissão da TV Globo e do Sportv, proporcionando aos torcedores cariocas uma experiência coletiva de entretenimento e apoio aos seus clubes. A programação tem início neste domingo (15), com destaque para o confronto entre Botafogo e Seattle Sounders, às 23h (horário de Brasília). Ainda no mesmo dia, outros dois jogos também serão exibidos: PSG x Atlético de Madrid, às 16h, e Palmeiras x Porto, às 19h. A agenda musical se destaca com o show de Suel, marcado para as 21h, também na abertura oficial da arena. Conforme o calendário da competição avança, outros clubes cariocas terão seus jogos transmitidos no local. Flamengo e Fluminense também terão espaço garantido na Fan Zone, com partidas...

title: ¿Juega Memo Ochoa?; esta es la espectacular alineación de México para enfrentar a República Dominicana
content: Luis Ángel Malagón fue el portero elegido por el entrenador Javier Aguirre para ser el titular de México contra República Dominicana en el partido inaugural de la Copa Oro 2025, en lugar del experimentado Memo Ochoa y de Raúl ‘Tala’ Rangel, los otros dos arqueros convocados por el ‘Vasco’. Jorge Sánchez, César Montes, Israel Reyes, Jesús Gallardo, Edson Álvarez, Erik Lira, Orbelín Pineda, Roberto Alvarado, Raúl Jiménez y Santiago Giménez son los otros futbolistas que conforman el primer 11 inicial de la Selección Mexicana en el torneo de la Concacaf. México enfrenta en la Copa Oro 2025 por primera vez en un partido oficial a nivel mayor a República Dominicana, que nunca había clasificado al certamen regional. EVG

title: Вильфанд: устойчиво теплая погода ожидается в СФО в начале следующей недели
content: МОСКВА, 15 июня. /ТАСС/. Теплая погода сохранится в Сибирском федеральном округе в течение выходных дней и начала следующей недели, показатель может достигать плюс 30-35 градусов. Об этом сообщил ТАСС научный руководитель Гидрометцентра России Роман Вильфанд. "Устойчивая теплая погода, которая связана с антициклонической деятельностью и выносом очень теплых воздушных масс из Узбекистана, Казахстана и Туркменистана ожидается на юге Сибирского федерального округа. И поэтому везде в Сибири будет температура выше нормы на 4-6 градусов. Это касается и воскресенья, и первой половины следующей недели. Показатель там зашкаливать будет за плюс 30-35 градусов", - сказал он. Метеоролог пояснил, что речь о высоких температурах идет о таких регионах как Новосибирская, Кемеровская, Омская, Томская области, Алтайский край, юг Красноярского края, Хакасия, Тува.

Una planta muy común en las sopas puede aliviar las náuseas con sorprendente rapidez
creator: Renzo Gonzales
content: Muchas preparaciones de sopa, principalmente en la culinaria peruana, llevan jengibre (Zingiber officinale) como ingrediente indispensable. Esta planta, también llamada kión en el país sudamericano, es más que una especie: su uso medicinal se remonta a cientos de años, ya que posee propiedades notables para calmar las náuseas.Investigaciones recientes corroboran la eficacia del jengibre en el tratamiento natural de las náuseas. Se ha demostrado que puede ser tan efectivo como algunos medicamentos anti-nauseosos, pero con menos efectos secundarios.Propiedades y funcionamientoEl jengibre debe sus beneficios a compuestos bioactivos, principalmente el gingerol y los shogaoles. Estas sustancias, presentes en el jengibre fresco y seco respectivamente, contribuyen a sus propiedades para aliviar malestares digestivos. El jengibre actúa al incrementar la sensibilidad digestiva y acelerar el vaciado gástrico, mecanismo que reduce las náuseas. Asimismo, gracias a sus propiedades antiinflamatorias, mejora la digestión y promueve la liberación de hormonas que regulan la presión sanguínea, por lo que proporciona un efecto calmante sobre el cuerpo.La rapidez de sus efectos puede variar según la gravedad y la causa del malestar. Para náuseas leves, el jengibre en té puede proporcionar alivio en 20 a 30 minutos. Sin embargo, para náuseas intensas, se puede tardar más o requerir tratamiento adicional.Seguridad y precaucionesLa seguridad del jengibre ha sido ampliamente...

title: ISrael serang ibu pejabat kementerian pertahanan Iran di Tehran – Media Iran
content: ISTANBUL: Serangan udara Israel awal pagi Ahad menyasarkan ibu pejabat Kementerian Pertahanan Iran di Tehran, lapor Anadolu Ajansi (AA) memetik agensi berita Tasnim. Serangan itu menyasarkan bangunan Kementerian Pertahanan dan Logistik Angkatan Tentera di kawasan Nobonyad, menyebabkan kerosakan kecil pada sebuah bangunan pentadbiran. Setakat ini, tiada kenyataan dikeluarkan oleh Kementerian Pertahanan Iran. Terdahulu pada pagi Jumaat, tentera Israel melancarkan serangan terhadap Iran, menyasarkan kemudahan nuklear dan peluru berpandu serta mengorbankan beberapa komander tentera dan saintis kanan Iran. Sebagai tindak balas, Iran melancarkan peluru berpandu balistik ke beberapa lokasi di wilayah pendudukan Israel, mengakibatkan kematian dan kecederaan serta kerosakan kepada bangunannya.

Unidentified woman steals $1,200 from assisted living resident; man arrested after urinating in public: Brook Park police blotter
content: BROOK PARK, Ohio – Theft: Elmdale Road A woman stole about $1,200 from a resident at East Park Retirement Community, 6360 Elmdale. The victim reported the theft May 20. He said he gave his credit card to the Brook Park woman, a friend of his fiancé, so that she could buy him a gallon of milk. He told the woman she could withdraw $10 for herself because she needed cash. The woman instead made two withdraws totaling about $1,200 from an ATM. She never returned the man’s credit card, which he subsequently canceled. The man said he didn’t know the woman’s last name. He said he waited six months to report the incident, hoping that she would return with his credit card. Public indecency: Smith Road A Brook Park man, 35, was arrested at about 9:30 p.m. June 3 after he urinated outside GNC, 5773 Smith. Someone called police after seeing the man walk out of Tavern 150, 5771 Smith. He was yelling profanities at people. When police arrived, they didn’t find the man. They saw someone fitting the man’s description inside Tavern 150 but he was not causing trouble. Then police spotted the man leaving Tavern 150. He walked to the front of the closed GNC store. He unzipped his pants and started urinating near the door to GNC. As the man walked back to Tavern 150, police approached him. He denied doing anything wrong. Police placed him in handcuffs. He smelled like alcohol. Driving without a license, possession of illegal drugs: Brookpark Road An Olmsted Falls, 39, man was arrested at about...

title: Las dos mega máquinas de 120 metros de longitud que se usan en la construcción de la obra más importante en el Perú
creator: Clara  Giraldo
content: En las entrañas de Lima, dos enormes máquinas de más de 120 metros de longitud trabajan a un ritmo constante, excavando túneles a una profundidad de 25 metros bajo tierra. Estas poderosas estructuras avanzan de manera silenciosa pero determinante, removiendo toneladas de tierra y depositándolas en la superficie sin detenerse. Mientras perforan el suelo limeño, su tarea va más allá de lo que cualquier máquina convencional podría hacer. La precisión y capacidad de estas máquinas son tan impresionantes como su tamaño.Estas imponentes estructuras están diseñadas para enfrentar uno de los desafíos de infraestructura más complejos y ambiciosos del país, conectando puntos clave de la ciudad bajo la tierra. Y aunque el trabajo que realizan es fundamental, ¿sabías que lo hacen sin que se vean a simple vista por los transeúntes que circulan por la superficie?El funcionamiento de las tuneladorasLas máquinas en cuestión son las tuneladoras ‘Delia’ y ‘Micaela’, esenciales en la construcción de la Línea 2 del Metro de Lima. Estas gigantescas máquinas, fabricadas en Alemania, no son simplemente herramientas gigantes; son auténticas maravillas de la ingeniería. Ambas están equipadas con ruedas de corte de 10.27 metros de diámetro, que giran a gran velocidad y están accionadas por potentes motores hidráulicos. Con esta rueda, perforan el suelo y remueven tierra y escombros a medida que avanzan.El trabajo de estas tuneladoras no se limita solo a excavar....

title: Delantero del Inter de Milán está atrapado en Irán y se pierde el juego ante Rayados del Mundial de Clubes
content: El delantero iraní del Inter de Milán , Mehdi Taremi , se encuentra varado en Teherán debido al conflicto entre Irán e Israel y será baja del juego ante Rayados de Monterrey del Mundial de Clubes de la FIFA , confirmó este sábado el equipo italiano. Taremi, de 32 años, viajó a su país para el partido del 10 de junio frente a Corea del Norte, en el que marcó un gol en el triunfo 3-0, por la clasificación para la Copa del Mundo de 2026 . Posteriormente, el atacante no pudo tomar un vuelo para unirse a la concentración del Inter en Los Ángeles (Estados Unidos), debido al estallido de los bombardeos entre Israel e Irán . Una fuente del Inter confirmó a la AFP que Taremi se encuentra varado en su país natal. El Inter comienza su andadura en el Mundial de Clubes enfrentando el martes al Monterrey en el estadio Rose Bowl de Pasadena, al este de Los Ángeles. Este duelo supondrá también el debut de su nuevo entrenador, Cristian Chivu , nombrado el lunes como sucesor de Simone Inzaghi, quien abandonó el cargo tras la goleada 5-0 sufrida ante el Paris Saint-Germain en la final de la Liga de Campeones. En la rueda de prensa de presentación, celebrada el sábado en la sede del equipo en Beverly Hills, Chivu afirmó que el Inter está listo para recuperarse de la doble decepción de haber perdido el título de la Serie A y la final de la Champions League . El exjugador rumano, de 44 años, recalcó que sus jugadores pueden sentirse orgullosos de esta campaña. "No...

NEET: 3 students from Delhi make it to top 10
content: With the National Testing Agency (NTA) announcing the results for National Eligibility cum Entrance Test (NEET-UG) on Saturday, three residents of Delhi have starred in the top 10 performers. Mrinal Kishore Jha secured an all-India rank 4 (AIR 4 ) with a percentile of 99.9998189. He was followed by Avika Aggarwal, 17, who bagged AIR 5 with a percentile of 99.9996832. Aggarwal, also the top female performer in the NEET-UG entrance test this year, said she could not sleep the previous night as the result was due. A resident of Faridabad, Aggarwal went to Savitri Public School in south Delhi’s Sangam Vihar for higher secondary studies. “I could not sleep at all last night. Then today, around 9am, my teacher called and woke me up. It was phenomenal when I got to know that I was also the female topper in the country,” she told HT. Aggarwal said her strategy for the preparation of the entrance exam included studying in phases and taking regular breaks to retain more. “I prioritised sleep as well. I would study for one and half hours and then take a half-hour break,” she said, adding that her parents and teacher played a major role in this journey. “My parents are both doctors and they understand the different phases and difficulties that come in the preparation period. Additionally, I really want to thank my physics teacher, as he was a great support at every step of the way,” she said. Aggarwal is also the only female candidate in the top 10 students of the NEET (UG) results....

title: Inaugurado «Mundial de Clubes» en Estados Unidos
creator: rhondudiario
content: *** Los 32 clubes de todo el mundo competirán en el torneo en 12 estadios de los Estados Unidos.Este sábado se inauguró el mundial de clubes de fútbol, con el encuentro del Inter de Miami y el Al Ahly, en un torneo en el cual suman 32 equipos, distribuidos en ocho grupos de cuatro que competirán en 12 estadios de los Estados Unidos, a partir de la fecha.Los equipos que participarán en este mundial de clubes se clasificó a los mejores de cada confederación del mundo del fútbol y donde el Inter de Miami, es el equipo anfitrión.Por la CONCACAF, participan; Monterrey (México), LAFC (Estados Unidos), Pachuca (México) y el Seattle Sounders FC (Estados Unidos)De la UEFA, Manchester City (Inglaterra), Real Madrid (España), Bayern de Múnich (Alemania), el París Saint-Germain (Francia), Chelsea (Inglaterra), Borussia Dortmund (Alemania), Inter de Milán (Italia), Oporto (Portugal), Atlético Madrid (España), Benfica (Portugal), Juventus (Italia) y Red Bull Salzburgo (Austria)Por la CONMEBOL, el Flamengo (Brasil), Palmeiras (Brasil), River Plate (Argentina), Fluminense (Brasil), Boca Juniors (Argentina) y el Botafogo (Brasil)De la AFC; están el Saudí Al Hilal (Arabia Saudí), Ulsan HD (Corea del Sur), Urawa Red Diamonds (Japón) y Al Ain (Emiratos Árabes Unidos)De la CAF, participan el Al Ahly (Egipto), Wydad AC (Marruecos), Espérance de Tunis (Túnez) y el Mamelodi Sundowns (Sudáfrica)Por la OFC, únicamente el equipo de Auckland City (Nueva Zeland).Los estadios...

title: West Bengal Rain Update: উত্তর বঙ্গোপসাগরে সক্রিয় ঘূর্ণাবর্ত, প্রবল বৃষ্টিতে ভিজবে এই জেলাগুলি, রইল বিরাট আপডেট
creator: Moumita Poddar
content: WB Weather Alert: গত কয়েকদিনে তীব্র গরমে একেবারে হাঁসফাঁস অবস্থা আমজনতার। উত্তরবঙ্গে বৃষ্টি হলেও, দেখা নেই স্বস্তির বৃষ্টি দক্ষিণবঙ্গে। রবিবার ছুটির দিনে কেমন থাকবে আবহাওয়া? বিস্তারিত জানুন। দেখুন সম্পূর্ণ ফটো গ্যালারি... দক্ষিণ বাংলাদেশ ও সংলগ্ন উত্তর বঙ্গোপসাগর এলাকায় তৈরি হয়েছে ঘূর্ণাবর্ত। এই ঘূর্ণাবর্ত থেকে একটি নিম্নচাপ অক্ষরেখা বিস্তৃত রয়েছে দক্ষিণ ওড়িশা পর্যন্ত। পশ্চিম মধ্য বঙ্গোপসাগর ও উত্তর অন্ধ্রপ্রদেশ উপকূলে রয়েছে একটি ঘূর্ণাবর্ত। যার প্রভাবে বৃষ্টির সম্ভাবনা রয়েছে বলে জানিয়েছে আলিপুর আবহাওয়া দফতর। আলিপুর হাওয়া অফিস সূত্রে খবর, দক্ষিণবঙ্গে শনি ও রবিবার বজ্রবিদ্যুৎ সহ ঝড় বৃষ্টির সতর্কতা রয়েছে। শনিবার ঝড়ের গতিবেগ ৩০ থেকে ৪০ কিলোমিটার প্রতি ঘন্টায় থাকলেও রবিবার ঝড়ের গতিবেগ বাড়বে ৫০ কিলোমিটার পর্যন্ত। উত্তর ও দক্ষিণ চব্বিশ পরগনা পূর্ব ও পশ্চিম মেদিনীপুর, কলকাতা, হাওড়া, হুগলী, বীরভূম, মুর্শিদাবাদ ও নদীয়া জেলাতে ঝড় বৃষ্টির সম্ভাবনা বেশি থাকবে।সোমবার থেকে বিক্ষিপ্তভাবে ভারী বৃষ্টির সম্ভাবনা বাড়বে। ভারী বৃষ্টির পূর্বাভাস রয়েছে দক্ষিণ ২৪ পরগনা পূর্ব ও পশ্চিম মেদিনীপুর জেলাতে বেশি। এছাড়াও ভারী বৃষ্টি হবে পূর্ব ও পশ্চিম বর্ধমান, ঝাড়গ্রাম, পুরুলিয়া ও বাঁকুড়া জেলাতে। বৃহস্পতি ও শুক্রবারেও বীরভূম মুর্শিদাবাদ জেলাতে ভারী বৃষ্টির আশঙ্কা। বাকি জেলাতে বজ্রবিদ্যুৎ সহ হালকা থেকে মাঝারি বৃষ্টির সঙ্গে দমকাঝোড়ো হওয়া থাকবে বলে খবর। দক্ষিণবঙ্গে সোমবার থেকে ভারী বৃষ্টির সম্ভাবনা বাড়বে। উত্তর ও দক্ষিণ চব্বিশ পরগনা পূর্ব ও পশ্চিম মেদিনীপুর, ঝাড়গ্রাম, পুরুলিয়া, বাঁকুড়া, পশ্চিম বর্ধমান, পূর্ব বর্ধমান এবং বীরভূম, মুর্শিদাবাদ জেলায় ভারী বৃষ্টির সম্ভাবনা...

title: Del penal de Saltillo lo mandan al Hospital General y ahí fallece
creator: NOTICIAS DE HOY
content: J esús Antonio Cedillo Rodríguez, quien se hallaba recluido en el penal de Saltillo, dejó de existir ese sábado por la tarde en el Hospital General, a donde fue llevado por dolores en el estómago, pero su salud se complicó y el problema desencadenó en su muerte. El hombre, de 26 años permanecía preso por el delito de posesión de narcóticos, era originario de Saltillo y pasó sus últimas horas convaleciendo debido a una sepsis abdominal , según informaron las autoridades. TE PUEDE INTERESAR: Ramos Arizpe: hombre encuentra su final en plena calle, se desploma y ya no despierta De acuerdo con el escueto comunicado de la Secretaría de Seguridad Pública del Estado (SSPE) , Jesús Antonio fue llevado al citado centro médico desde el pasado 9 de junio. ¿DE QUÉ FALLECIÓ CEDILLO RODRÍGUEZ? La permanencia del interno se dio debió a una sepsis abdominal, la cual no logró superar. Hechos de los que fue informada la Agencia de Investigación Criminal (AIC). Se trata de una infección grave que comienza en el abdomen (la zona del estómago) y que se extiende al resto del cuerpo. Puede empezar por un problema como una apendicitis, una perforación en el intestino o una infección en algún órgano dentro del abdomen. Cuando esa infección entra a la sangre, el cuerpo reacciona de forma exagerada, y eso puede afectar a varios órganos (como los pulmones, el corazón o los riñones) , haciéndolos dejar de funcionar correctamente. A eso se le llama sepsis. Hasta la tarde...

creator: 이수진
이수진 (abc123@etoday.co.kr)
content: 기아가 네덜란드 비영리단체 '오션클린업'과 맺은 파트너십의 목표와 성과를 강조하는 글로벌 커뮤니케이션 캠페인으로 '2025 PR 어워즈 아시아-퍼시픽'에서 환경 부문 금상을 수상했다고 15일 밝혔다. 이는 기아가 오션클린업과 전 세계 바다의 플라스틱 폐기물을 제거하기 위한 기술을 개발하고 홍보 및 커뮤니케이션 캠페인을 적극적으로 펼친 결과다.

title: Woman on e-bike hospitalized with fractures in collision with vehicle
creator: Anna Ashcraft
content: SAN DIEGO (FOX 5/KUSI) -- A woman riding an e-bike was seriously injured after colliding with a vehicle's mirror in San Diego Saturday afternoon, San Diego Police report. Officers were called to the scene around 12:40 p.m. Saturday at Fairmount Avenue and Montezuma Road in the Talmadge neighborhood of San Diego. Motorcyclist hospitalized after crash in Encanto neighborhoodA 54-year-old woman was riding an e-bike north on Fairmount Avenue when San Diego Police say she left the bike lane "prematurely" and entered the lane to transition onto Montezuma Road while a vehicle being driven by a 66-year-old man was driving on the ramp from Montezuma Road onto Fairmount Avenue. Police say the e-bike rider struck the vehicle's driver-side mirror. The woman suffered a fractured hip, a fractured wrist, and was taken to a San Diego hospital.The San Diego Police Traffic Division is handling the investigation and is asking anyone with more information to call the listed San Diego Police or Crime Stoppers at 888-580-8477.

title: ¿Inició un romance? Vania Bludau IMPACTA al ser captada junto a chico reality tras ABANDONAR Lima
creator: Antuane Calderón
content: La conocida influencer Vania Bludau está en boca de luego de que se expusiera una polémica fotografía de ella junto a Mario Irivarren en plena celebración de la boda de Alejandra Baigorria . Sin embargo, nadie se imaginó que la chica reality decidiera abandonar Lima en medio de este escándalo, pero dejó en shock a muchos al ser captada con popular ' guerrero '. Vania Bludau viajó junto a famoso chico reality A través de su cuenta oficial de Instagram, la misma Vania Bludau reveló que se tomó un vuelo hacia el interior del país, exactamente a Chiclayo . No obstante, el portal de espectáculos Instarándula puso en evidencia que el famoso Austin Palao también viajó a la misma ciudad. Inclusive, las 'ratujas' lograron captar el preciso momento cuando ambos habrían estado comiendo en un conocido restaurante, Urumanka. Cabe señalar que los populares influencers fueron captados bastante cariñosos en la boda de Alejandra Baigorria. Aunque tanto como Vania Bludau y Austin Palao han negado que haya existido un beso en el matrimonio, los dos se luces bastante cercanos demostrando que tienen un cercano vínculo. ¿Oficializarán una relación sentimental en medio de la polémica? ¿Cuáles eran las intenciones de Vania Bludau con Mario Irivarren en la boda de Alejandra Baigorria? Recordemos semanas atrás, Flor Ortola salió en defensa de Vania Bludau ante los rumores de un posible acercamiento con su expareja Mario Irivarren en la boda de Alejandra. La exchica reality...

title: Jammu-Kashmir: पुलिस की सख्त कार्रवाई, कुख्यात ड्रग तस्कर गिरफ्तार
creator: Renuka Sahu
content: Jammu-Kashmir जम्मू-कश्मीर: किश्तवाड़ पुलिस ने समाज को नशे की लत से बचाने की मुहिम को आगे बढ़ाते हुए एक कुख्यात नशा तस्कर को गिरफ्तार किया है। पुलिस ने आरोपी को पब्लिक सेफ्टी एक्ट के तहत गिरफ्तार कर जिला जेल उधमपुर भेज दिया है। एसएसपी किश्तवाड़ नरेश सिंह (जेकेपीएस) ने बताया कि आरोपी का नाम इमरान हुसैन गिरी है, जो कि मछगरी पोचल, तहसील व जिला किश्तवाड़ का रहने वाला है। पुलिस जांच में पता चला है कि इमरान किश्तवाड़ कस्बे में युवाओं को नशा सप्लाई करने में अहम भूमिका निभा रहा था। उसके खिलाफ पहले भी कई बार नशा तस्करी के मामले दर्ज हो चुके हैं। नशे की बढ़ती समस्या को देखते हुए पुलिस ने उसे प्रभावी पदार्थों के अवैध व्यापार की रोकथाम के तहत गिरफ्तार किया है, ताकि युवाओं का भविष्य सुरक्षित रहे और समाज को नशे की लत से बचाया जा सके। एसएसपी नरेश सिंह ने बताया कि किश्तवाड़ पुलिस नशे के खिलाफ "जीरो टॉलरेंस" की नीति पर काम कर रही है।न केवल कानूनी कार्रवाई, बल्कि स्कूलों, कॉलेजों और अन्य क्षेत्रों में जागरूकता अभियान भी चलाए जा रहे हैं, ताकि लोग नशे की लत के खतरे को समझ सकें। पुलिस ने आम जनता से अपील की है कि नशे से जुड़ी कोई भी जानकारी गोपनीय तरीके से पुलिस के साथ साझा करें। इसके लिए आप 9906154100 और 9103454100 पर कॉल कर सकते हैं या किश्तवाड़ पुलिस के फेसबुक और ट्विटर हैंडल के जरिए भी संपर्क कर सकते हैं। आपकी पहचान पूरी तरह गोपनीय रखी जाएगी।

title: 仏 アニメ映画祭 青木康浩監督「ChaO」に長編部門審査員賞
content: フランスで開かれた世界最大級のアニメーション映画祭で、日本の青木康浩監督の作品「ChaO」が長編部門で最高賞に次ぐ審査員賞を受賞しました。 フランス南東部で毎年開かれる「アヌシー国際アニメーション映画祭」では、世界各地から出品されるアニメ作品が長編部門や短編部門などで最高賞の「クリスタル賞」を競います。 最終日の14日は各部門の授賞式が行われ、このうち長編部門では、青木康浩監督の「ChaO」が最高賞に次ぐ審査員賞に選ばれました。 また、特別賞にあたるポール・グリモー賞には、東京出身でフランスなどを拠点に活動する瀬戸桃子監督の「Dandelion’sOdyssey」が選ばれました。 日本の作品では、2017年に長編部門で湯浅政明監督の「夜明け告げるルーのうた」が最高賞のクリスタル賞を受賞したほか、片渕須直監督の「この世界の片隅に」が審査員賞を受賞しています。 ことしの長編部門のクリスタル賞には、フランスの作品「Arco」が選ばれました。 「ChaO」とは 「ChaO」はアニメーターの青木康浩さんが監督を務めた長編アニメーション作品です。 人間と人魚が共存する未来の社会を舞台に、主人公のサラリーマンが人魚の王国のお姫様「チャオ」と結婚することになり、困難に直面しながらも関係を深めていく恋愛模様を描いています。 青木監督は1980年代からアニメーターとして数多くの作品に参加し、2008年には人気ヒーロー、バットマンのオムニバスのアニメ作品『バットマン ゴッサムナイト』の1編で、監督を務めました。

title: «اكتشاف صادم» دمر البشر الحياة على المريخ دون قصد نظرية تثير الجدل - موقع رادار
اعتقال 18 عنصرا داعما اعلاميا للعدوان الصهيوني على البلاد في أصفهان وكرمان
content: وأعلن مكتب العلاقات العامة في منظمة الاستخبارات التابعة لقيادة شرطة أصفهان فجر الأحد: أن من بين جرائم هؤلاء الأفراد دعم ومساندة الأعمال العدوانية للكيان الصهيوني، وإثارة الرأي العام في الفضاء الإلكتروني، والأنشطة الدعائية ضد النظام، والإساءة إلى مكانة الشهداء، ونشر الشائعات. ووفقًا لتقرير المنظمة، تم اعتقال المجرمين خلال عمليات فنية واستخباراتية على مدار الساعة من قبل القوات الامنية، وبعد تنسيق قضائي خلال عمليات مباغتة. بدوره أعلن قائد شرطة محافظة كرمان جنوب شرق ايران انه في أعقاب العدوان الوحشي للكيان الصهيوني البغيض على أجزاء من البلاد، اعتقلت شرطة الأمن العام في المحافظة شخصين في عملية واسعة النطاق بتهمة دعم الأعمال الوحشية للكيان الصهيوني، وإثارة الرأي العام في الفضاء الإلكتروني، والأنشطة الدعائية ضد النظام، وإهانة مكانة الشهداء، ونشر الشائعات. وبموجب المواد 6 و7 و8 و10 من قانون مواجهة الأعمال العدائية للكيان الصهيوني، فإن أي تعاون استخباراتي مع الموساد، أو تفاعل أو تبادل للمعلومات مع شخصيات رسمية وغير رسمية في الكيان ، وأي أعمال ثقافية أو إعلامية أو دعائية أو مساعدة تهدف إلى تأكيد أو تعزيز وترسيخ الكيان، تعد جرائم يتم الحكم على مرتكبها بأشد العقوبات القانونية. انتهى ** 2342

title: US-Australia defence alliance alive and well, insists expert
content: An expert on US-Australia alliances says AUKUS is not dead and, in fact, will never die. Australia says it is "very confident" in the future of the pact to equip it with nuclear-powered submarines, despite the Pentagon putting it under review. It said it had been aware for a while about the review, which media only revealed publicly on Thursday . Professor Alan Tidwell, who directs the Centre for Australian, New Zealand and Pacific Studies in Washington, said he was a firm believer the pact was "perpetual". "I'm a firm believer that AUKUS is one of those things that will probably never die," said the researcher, who will be in Wellington on Tuesday for the Institute of International Affairs national conference. "No-one will ever issue a press release that says AUKUS is dead, it certainly won't come out of Washington. "They may change the shape of AUKUS, they may change the delivery schedule, but I think it's kind of built in." Ever since the US, Australia and UK signed the pact in 2021, critics have expressed doubt that the Americans would actually deliver any subs in the 2030s. Their contention that the US needed all the subs it could build for itself was echoed by top Pentagon official Elbridge Colby - now leading the review - after President Donald Trump began his second term. "In principle, [AUKUS is] a great idea, but I've been very sceptical in practice," Colby said last year. However, Tidwell believes the outcome of the review won't be to stop AUKUS, nor would it be...

title: Missouri governor signs Chiefs, Royals stadium bill
creator: ProFootball Talk on NBC Sports
content: Missouri has done its part to keep the Chiefs (and Royals) on the right side of the border with Kansas. Now, it all comes down to whether one or both teams will choose to stay put.Via the Associated Press, governor Mike Kehoe signed on Saturday the bill that will provide hundreds of millions in state money toward a $1.15 billion renovation of Arrowhead Stadium and a new venue for the Royals.Kansas has made the Chiefs and Royals an offer on a new stadium, which would have a dome — and which would be much more expensive. The deadline for accepting is, supposedly, June 30.The ball is now in the both teams' court. For the Chiefs, it's a simple proposition: Stay in a renovated iconic venue at Arrowhead Stadium, or build a facility that could potentially host a Super Bowl.

title: Live updates: Trump praises Army’s ‘legacy of unmatched courage’ at military parade
creator: Canadian Press
content: A massive military parade to celebrate the U.S. Army’s 250th anniversary, requested by President Donald Trump to coincide with his birthday, rolled through Washington D.C. on Saturday, as opponents of the president’s agenda rallied in hundreds of cities nationwide for “No Kings” protests . Rain didn’t stop the parade but forced an early start. Despite concerns about lightning and thunderstorms, the rain held to a slight drizzle during the march of soldiers and machinery. Heavy cloud cover and low visibility in the Washington area did, however, seem to contribute to less of an aircraft presence in the parade. As the parade was underway, police in Los Angeles fired tear gas and flash bangs to try to disperse demonstrators challenging immigration raids. Clouds of gas wafted toward a family-friendly demonstration that has been going for hours outside City Hall. Here's the Latest: Fireworks, music and testimonials There have been several bursts of fireworks above the crowd that had gathered for Saturday’s events, with several songs with patriotic undertones playing alongside. There have also been videos with military members giving testimonials about what their service means to them. That’s it for the Army’s birthday parade There have been troop formations, heavy artillery displays, flyovers, musical performances and a presidential address. But now the Army’s birthday parade is drawing to a close. Fireworks are the last thing on the official schedule. Another round of tear gas in...

title: Sharon Faye Walls Hovatter
creator: Submitted to The Dominion Post
content: Sharon Faye Walls Hovatter, 77, of Morgantown, passed away Tuesday morning, June 10, 2025, in Mon Health Medical Center, Morgantown. Born July 25, 1947, in Morgantown, Sharon was a daughter of the late Curtis Wayne and Leona Pearl Whitehair Walls. Sharon is survived by two sons, Bradley A. Johnson and wife Cathy, and Doug Johnson and wife Karen, all of Morgantown; four grandchildren, Bradley Johnson, Jr., Desiree Johnson, Cody Johnson, and Michaela Johnson; her siblings, Bertha Hadden and husband Jeff of Morgantown, and Lee Walls and wife Debbie of Clifton Mills; as well as her nieces and nephews. In addition to her parents, she was preceded in death by her husband, John; and a brother, Wayne Walls. Sharon enjoyed knitting, crocheting, and crafting, along with attending Bingo on a regular basis. She was an excellent mother and adored her grandchildren. At her request, there will be no public services held, and Sharon will be cremated. Smith Funeral & Cremation Care of Westover (304-292-9494) is providing compassionate professional services to the family. Condolences and other gifts of comfort may be offered to the family at www.smithfcc.com

title: Scottie Scheffler is fighting his swing at the U.S. Open. He's hanging around anyway
content: OAKMONT, Pa. — Scottie Scheffler arrived at Oakmont with his swing in a good place. Wherever that place was, it's gone. Temporarily, at least. While world's top-ranked player put together his best round of the week at the U.S. Open on Saturday by firing an even-par 70 to remain at 4 over, he knows tracking down good friend and third-round leader Sam Burns eight shots ahead might require the kind of crisp, clean golf Scheffler has struggled to produce over 54 holes. “Am I in the position I had hoped to be after three days? Obviously not,” Scheffler said. “But for the way I’ve swung it and played the last few days, I feel like I could be a lot worse.” Such is the level that the 28-year-old star finds himself at that, during feels like an “off week," he will head to the course on Sunday on the front page of the leaderboard, albeit at the bottom. “For me to be sitting where I am this week, not having really my best stuff, I think is pretty good,” Scheffler said. It's not like Scheffler hasn't been searching for it. He hit the practice range shortly after a 71 on Friday, then proceeded to have an animated session with longtime coach Randy Smith. Scheffler waved his arms at times, clearly frustrated by the results. Asked about it, Scheffler shrugged and called the whole thing “pretty regular," and it should be pointed out that the practice range at most tournaments doesn't sit next to the media center as it does at Oakmont. Scheffler admitted the session ended without much...

title: Jacksonville Jaguars' QB Trevor Lawrence with high praise for offseason addition
creator: Jaguars Wire
content: In a Jacksonville Jaguars' wide receiver room that features Brian Thomas Jr. and Travis Hunter, free agent addition Dyami Brown has caught quarterback Trevor Lawrence's attention with his play during OTAs and minicamp.“Man, I've been super impressed with him," Lawrence said after Thursday's final practice. "His speed. Obviously, he is a threat down the field, which is important as a receiver who can stretch the field. But also, he's a really, really smart football player."With his speed, Brown adds another vertical presence to the Jaguars' offense. This not only creates big play potential, but his presence also frees up Thomas to attack other levels of the field while Brown stretches the field to help create spacing underneath and over the middle.Liam Coen has also been impressed with Brown's route-running ability with some of the "daggers and in-cuts" he's been tasked with, not to mention that speed also makes him a threat near the line of scrimmage, where his YAC ability can be on display."He's picked up the system really quickly," said Lawrence. "He's always in the right spot. I think that's something about him, I don’t know if you guys watched plenty of practices, he's gotten the ball a lot because it seems like he's always in the right spot."The Jaguars signed Brown to a one-year, $10 million deal in free agency. His 308 receiving yards during the 2024 regular season were the most of his career, although he added another 229 yards to that total during Washington's three...

title: Siliguri students raise funds for special children
content: Class XI students from various schools in Siliguri have set an inspiring example of social responsibility by raising funds for children with special needs through a cultural event. Demonstrating remarkable leadership and compassion, students from 13 schools came together to organise Sanskriti, a vibrant cultural showcase held at Dinabandhu Mancha on Tuesday. With support from the North Bengal Handicapped Rehabilitation Society (Uttaran), the students raised Rs 40,000, which they donated to the organisation to aid children with disabilities. The programme featured over 35 artistes and volunteers, and included traditional and contemporary dance performances, soulful solo and group songs, a cultural fashion show, and a live band segment. Advertisement The event was led by festival director Raika Sarkar, a Class XI student of Delhi Public School, Siliguri. Speaking about the motivation behind Sanskriti, she said, “The idea was to help the needy and bring about small but meaningful changes in their lives. The event sought to celebrate culture through youth leadership and support fund-raising efforts for children with disabilities.” Advertisement The funds were raised through ticket sales and generous contributions from well-wishers in the community. Reflecting on the journey, Sarkar added: “When we first decided to take on Sanskriti, I didn’t fully realise what I was stepping into. I simply knew I wanted to create something that would unite people, honour our culture, and support...

title: Vote: Mississippi High School Baseball Player of the Year (6/14/2025)
content: The Magnolia State continuously produces elite baseball talent who end up showcasing their skills at the collegiate ranks and in the MLB. The 2025 high school baseball season was no different. There are numerous players that will take their talents to the Division 1 level, and some might possibly make it all the way to The Show . With that being said, there are 18 players that stood out above the rest who have been nominated for the High School on SI Mississippi high school baseball player of the year. As always, we ask you, the fans, to vote on who you think is the player of the year. Voting concludes July 6 at 11:59 p.m. PT. Here are the nominations: Jacob Parker, Purvis Parker, who is listed as the 107th best prospect in this year's MLB Draft, showed just how skillful he was this season. He batted .525 with an OBP of .678 and an OPS of 1.846 this season. He finished with 53 hits, 17 home runs, two triples, 10 doubles, 54 RBIs, 39 stolen bases and 63 runs scored. Parker also pitched 35 total innings where he recorded an ERA of 2.80 with 56 strikeouts. He finished with 46 hits, 13 home runs, two triples, 11 doubles, 35 RBIs, 30 stolen bases and 70 runs scored. title: Zelenski asegura que Ucrania frenó avance ruso en la región de Sumi
content: El presidente de Ucrania, Volodimir Zelenski, ha asegurado que las fuerzas militares ucranianas han conseguido frenar la ofensiva rusa sobre la región de Sumi, en el noroeste del país, donde se están manteniendo fuertes combates."Los combates allí (en la región de Sumi) se desarrollan a lo largo de la frontera. Hay que entender que el enemigo está siendo frenado allí", ha asegurado el mandatario ucraniano en declaraciones a los medios recogidas por el periódico 'The Kiev Independent'.Te puede interesarGeopolíticaRusia presentará un proyecto de acuerdo de paz tras intercambio de prisioneros, dice LavrovVideoEl Kremlin abierto a un encuentro Putin-Zelenski si hay acuerdo previoVideoUna delegación ucraniana, sin Zelenski, rumbo a Estambul para negociaciones con RusiaEn concreto, Zelenski ha cifrado en 53,000 el número de efectivos desplegados por el Ejército de Rusia en la región, en una ofensiva en que habrían conseguido avanzar unos siete kilómetros en territorio ucraniano.Sumi es una de las varias regiones en las que las fuerzas rusas se siguen mostrando especialmente activas y los ataques se suceden en varias ciudades como la capital del mismo nombre, Sumi, o otras localidades como Andreievka, que el Ministerio de Defensa ruso anunció haber tomado hace unos días y que habría sido liberada este sábado por la fuerzas ucranianas, según Zelenski."Nuestra más profunda gratitud a los combatientes del 225o Regimiento de Asalto Separado, en particular por sus...

title: Após 8 anos, Cléo Pires volta a usar o sobrenome da mãe
creator: IstoÉ News
content: Cleo Pires anunciou que voltou a usar o sobrenome de sua mãe, a atriz Gloria Pires. Ao longo dos últimos oito anos, ela solicitou diversas vezes que fosse chamada apenas por “Cleo”. A novidade foi tornada pública num vídeo publicado pela influenciadora Maya Massafera no Instagram. “Gente, olha, detalhe: [A Cleo] voltou pro Pires!”, comentou, ao lado da cantora e atriz. “Voltei, porque eu tive um sonho muito importante. Eu sonhei com meu avô, Antônio Carlos Pires, que era ator, também. Ele escrevia ‘Pires’, na areia. E eu via. Enquanto isso ele ia falando: ‘É sua ancestralidade. Você tem que carregar a sua ancestralidade’. Eu acordei enlouquecida”, relatou. Em seguida, Cleo continuou: “Mandei para todo mundo, falei: ‘Gente, vai voltar o Pires agora!’. Sempre quis ser só Cleo, porque eu sempre achei o meu nome único. Desde quando eu me imaginava artista, imaginava só Cleo. O Pires foi uma homenagem à minha família, à minha mãe, principalmente.” A artista deixou de usar o sobrenome Pires em 2017. No carnaval de 2025, ela chegou a interromper um repórter da RedeTV! que cobria o carnaval após ele tê-la chamado de Cleo Pires: “É só Cleo”, disse, algumas vezes.

title: Héctor Rodríguez propone cinco ideas para el debate a los candidatos a alcaldes y concejales
content: El ministro de Educación, Héctor Rodríguez, anunció este sábado una propuesta para el debate a los candidatos a alcaldes y concejales.A través de su cuenta en Instagram, el ministro Rodríguez difundió cinco "ideas para el debate y la futura gestión de los nuevos gobiernos comunales".De acuerdo con la información suministrada por el ministro Rodríguez, las cinco ideas son las siguientes:Alcaldías para la democracia protagónica y participativa: las alcaldías deberían ser espacios democratizadores que fortalezcan el Poder Popular, los movimientos sociales y la concienci colectiva.Alcaldías para la producción: nuestro país cuenta con la materia prima para cubrir las prioridades básicas de nuestra gente; alimento, ropa, calzado, medicinas, materiales para la construcción. También tenemos la voluntad, el método, la técnica y la ciencia. En cada territorio debemos asumir la responsabilidad de desarrollar esas potencialidades para dejar de depender de la importación y ser un país productivo.Alcaldías para la felicidad social: la justicia es la columna vertebral del proyecto bolivariano. Garantizar sistemas de salud, educación y una red de cuidados para nuestros adultos mayores y personas con alguna discapacida, que sean públicos y de calidad son determinantes.Alcaldías para la ciudad: garantizar ciudades planificadas, organizaas, funcionales y bellas donde todas nuestras familias tengan una vivienda digna, con servicios eficientes y sustentables...

title: Kao发布《Kao 2025年综合报告》
content: 东京--( BUSINESS WIRE )-- (美国商业资讯)--Kao Corporation(TOKYO:4452) 已在官网发布《Kao 2025年综合报告》,向股东、投资者及所有利益相关方全面阐述企业举措与战略方向。 《Kao 2025年综合报告》 为实现中期经营计划“K27”,Kao致力于成为全球不可或缺的独特存在,并且持续推进 Global Sharp Top(全球聚焦) 战略。2024财年,通过强化投资资本回报率(ROIC)管理和战略性投资布局,Kao成功超额完成目标,构建起更具韧性的业务体系。 本报告详细介绍了Kao在K27计划下取得的进展,重点介绍了敬业的Kao员工通过 Global Sharp Top 战略与敏捷开发团队模式,正在积极创造新价值,推动产生重大影响力。报告还介绍了Kao依托独特的科技优势,不断努力解决重大挑战,积极应对全球性社会课题,并推动实现所有生命和谐共生的 Kirei 美好世界。 Kao期待本报告能增进利益相关方的理解,促进深度对话与合作。公司致力于积极采纳不同合作伙伴的反馈意见和见解,不断提高对社会的积极贡献和企业价值。 相关信息 《Kao 2025年可持续发展报告》 关于Kirei生活方式计划 在130年的发展历程中,Kao始终致力于提升人们的生活品质,助力实现更具可持续性的生活方式——Kirei生活方式。日语"Kirei"一词寓意洁净、有序与美好三重境界。对Kao而言,Kirei不仅是外在之美,更是一种生活态度——一种为自我、为他人、为自然创造美好的热忱追求。为实现更可持续的生活方式,Kao Group于2019年4月制定了名为"Kirei生活方式计划"的ESG战略。到2030年,Kao目标赋能至少10亿人享受更美好的生活,并确保100%产品在全生命周期内的环境足迹不超过地球可承载的科学阈值。 请访问 Kao可持续发展网站 ,了解更多信息。 关于Kao Kao是日本知名个人护理、家居用品、化妆品及特种化学品制造商,致力于研发高附加值产品与服务,呵护并丰富人类生活与地球环境。旗下品牌如 Attack 洗衣液、 Bioré 和 Jergens 护肤品、 Laurier 卫生用品、 Curél 、 SENSAI 和 MOLTON BROWN 化妆品以及 Oribe 护发产品等,已融入亚洲、美洲、欧洲、中东及非洲消费者的日常生活。结合服务于多领域工业客户的化学品业务,Kao年销售额达1.63万亿日元。集团全球员工约32,600名,拥有逾130年创新历史。作为提供日常消费品的企业,Kao Group始终秉持产品全生命周期环境责任,这一理念已纳入2019年启动的ESG战略"Kirei生活方式计划"。 有关更多信息,请访问 Kao Group官网 。 免责声明:本公告之原文版本乃官方授权版本。译文仅供方便了解之用,烦请参照原文,原文版本乃唯一具法律效力之版本。

title: Kao lança o Relatório Integrado Kao 2025
content: TÓQUIO--( BUSINESS WIRE )-- A Kao Corporation (TÓQUIO: 4452) publicou o Kao Integrated Report 2025 (Relatório Integrado Kao de 2025) em seu site, oferecendo aos acionistas, investidores e todas as partes interessadas uma visão geral abrangente das iniciativas e da direção estratégica da empresa. Kao Integrated Report 2025 Para alcançar seu Plano de Médio Prazo “K27”, a Kao pretende se tornar uma presença única e indispensável para alguém no mundo e está avançando em sua estratégia Global Sharp Top . No ano fiscal de 2024, a Kao superou suas metas ao fortalecer a gestão do Retorno sobre o Capital Investido (ROIC) e investir estrategicamente para construir negócios mais fortes e robustos. Este relatório oferece uma visão aprofundada do progresso da Kao no âmbito do K27, destacando como os dedicados funcionários da Kao — por meio da estratégia Global Sharp Top e da abordagem ágil da equipe scrum — estão criando ativamente novos valores e gerando um impacto significativo. Ele também descreve os esforços contínuos da Kao para enfrentar desafios ousados, aproveitando sua expertise científica única para abordar questões sociais globais e ajudar a concretizar um mundo Kirei , onde todas as formas de vida coexistam em harmonia. A Kao espera que este relatório aprofunde a compreensão das partes interessadas e promova um diálogo e uma colaboração significativos. A empresa está comprometida em incorporar ativamente o feedback e as percepções de...

title: Kao發表《Kao 2025年綜合報告》
content: 東京--( BUSINESS WIRE )-- (美國商業資訊)--Kao Corporation (TOKYO:4452)已在其網站發表《Kao 2025年綜合報告》,為股東、投資人及所有利害關係人全面概述公司的措施與策略方向。 《Kao 2025年綜合報告》 為實現其中期計畫「K27」,Kao立志成為對全球消費者不可或缺的獨特存在,並推進其 Global Sharp Top 策略。2024會計年度,Kao強化投入資本報酬率(ROIC)管理並進行策略投資以建構更強大、更穩健的業務,從而超額完成目標。 本報告深入解析Kao在K27架構下的進展,重點呈現敬業的Kao員工如何透過 Global Sharp Top 策略與敏捷的Scrum團隊模式,積極創造新價值並推動深遠影響。報告還概述了Kao持續致力於迎接大膽挑戰的努力——利用其獨特科學專長解決全球社會問題,協助實現所有生命和諧共生的 Kirei 世界。 Kao希望該報告能加深利害關係人的理解,並促進有意義的對話與合作。公司致力於積極納入各方回饋與洞見,持續提升對社會的積極貢獻與企業價值。 相關資訊 《Kao 2025年永續發展報告》 關於Kirei Lifestyle Plan 130年來,Kao始終致力於改善人們的生活,協助實現更永續的生活型態——Kirei Lifestyle。日語「kirei」一詞兼具「潔淨、有序、美麗」之意。對Kao而言,「kirei」的概念不僅指外觀,更代表一種態度:即為自己、為他人以及為我們周遭的自然世界創造美好的願望。為實現更永續的生活型態,Kao Group於2019年4月制定了被稱為「Kirei Lifestyle Plan」的ESG策略。Kao的目標是到2030年賦能至少10億人享受更美好的生活。Kao還努力確保100%產品的全生命週期環境足跡達到科學界認定的自然可安全吸收標準。 更多資訊請造訪 Kao永續發展網站 。 關於Kao Kao是日本個人護理與家居用品、化妝品及特種化學品製造商,致力於創造高附加價值產品和服務,為全人類和地球的生活提供關懷與滋養。透過 Attack 洗衣粉、 Bioré 和 Jergens 護膚產品、 Laurier 衛生用品、 Curél 、 SENSAI 和 MOLTON BROWN 化妝品以及 Oribe 護髮產品等品牌,Kao深度融入亞洲、美洲、歐洲、中東及非洲地區人們的日常生活。結合其為眾多產業貢獻力量的化工業務,Kao的年銷售額約達1.63兆日圓。Kao全球員工約32,600人,擁有130餘年的創新歷史。身為提供日常用品的企業,Kao Group肩負積極減少產品全生命週期環境足跡的責任。這在2019年啟動的ESG策略「Kirei Lifestyle Plan」中得到了明確闡述。 更多資訊請造訪 Kao Group網站 。 免責聲明:本公告之原文版本乃官方授權版本。譯文僅供方便瞭解之用,煩請參照原文,原文版本乃唯一具法律效力之版本。

title: The UK's incredible 'abandoned' airport where you can now walk along the runway
creator: Rebecca Robinson
content: The UK is home to an airport that has been left largely abandoned and is now used as a filming location, allowing people to walk up its runways. Blackbushe Airport, an operational general aviation airport located in Yateley, Hampshire, has a history dating back to the Second World War . Its southern side was used for aircraft maintenance, utilising hangars built during the war. Today, only the section of the airfield north of the A30 between Camberley and Hook remains in active use. Constructed in 1942, Blackbushe boasts an active runway , two disused runways, and numerous service roads. It was once a significant hub for passenger and cargo charter flights serving the London area before being overshadowed by the growth of Heathrow and Gatwick. The airport is still home to several corporate jets, two flying schools, a helicopter training facility, and Aerobility, a charity that provides disabled people with the opportunity to fly. It's open to the public, making it a popular spot for walks around its perimeter and wildlife spotting in Yateley Common and Castle Bottom National Nature reserve. Now, the space is used as a filming location as its close to London and many of England's renowned studios such as Pinewood and Shepperton. On July 31, 2015, a tragic accident occurred when an Embraer 505 Phenom 300 HZ-IBN overshot the runway on landing and crashed into the British Car Auctions site. All four passengers on board were killed, including three members of the bin Laden family.

Cierran Capitolio de Texas tras amenaza a legisladores
creator: Antonio Villarreal
content: Austin,Texas.- El Departamento de Seguridad Pública de Texas (DPS) identificó una “amenaza creíble” dirigida a legisladores estatales que tenían previsto asistir a una protesta en el Complejo del Capitolio Estatal.“Por precaución, el Capitolio y sus terrenos fueron evacuados alrededor de la 1 p.m. y ambos permanecen cerrados temporalmente. El DPS continúa trabajando con nuestros socios de las fuerzas del orden para abordar la amenaza”, indicó.Como esta investigación está en curso, añadió, no hay información adicional disponible.El Departamento aseguró que tiene el deber de proteger a las personas y bienes de Texas y está monitoreando continuamente los eventos que ocurren hoy y su impacto en la seguridad pública en todo el Estado.“El DPS colaborará con todas las agencias del orden locales, estatales y federales para garantizar la seguridad de nuestros ciudadanos y de la propiedad estatal, así como para proteger a las personas que ejercen sus derechos constitucionales de reunirse y expresarse libremente”, apuntó.La entrada Cierran Capitolio de Texas tras amenaza a legisladores aparece primero en El Mercurio de Tamaulipas.

Live updates: Trump praises Army’s ‘legacy of unmatched courage’ at military parade
creator: By The Associated Press
content: A massive military parade to celebrate the U.S. Army’s 250th anniversary, requested by President Donald Trump to coincide with his birthday, rolled through Washington D.C. on Saturday, as opponents of the president’s agenda rallied in hundreds of cities nationwide for “No Kings” protests . Rain didn’t stop the parade but forced an early start. Despite concerns about lightning and thunderstorms, the rain held to a slight drizzle during the march of soldiers and machinery. Heavy cloud cover and low visibility in the Washington area did, however, seem to contribute to less of an aircraft presence in the parade. As the parade was underway, police in Los Angeles fired tear gas and flash bangs to try to disperse demonstrators challenging immigration raids. Clouds of gas wafted toward a family-friendly demonstration that has been going for hours outside City Hall. Here's the Latest: Fireworks, music and testimonials There have been several bursts of fireworks above the crowd that had gathered for Saturday’s events, with several songs with patriotic undertones playing alongside. There have also been videos with military members giving testimonials about what their service means to them. That’s it for the Army’s birthday parade There have been troop formations, heavy artillery displays, flyovers, musical performances and a presidential address. But now the Army’s birthday parade is drawing to a close. Fireworks are the last thing on the official schedule. Another round of tear gas in...

title: Scottie Scheffler is fighting his swing at the U.S. Open. He's hanging around anyway
creator: The Canadian Press
content: OAKMONT, Pa. (AP) — Scottie Scheffler arrived at Oakmont with his swing in a good place. Wherever that place was, it's gone. Temporarily, at least. While world's top-ranked player put together his best round of the week at the U.S. Open on Saturday by firing an even-par 70 to remain at 4 over, he knows tracking down good friend and third-round leader Sam Burns eight shots ahead might require the kind of crisp, clean golf Scheffler has struggled to produce over 54 holes. “Am I in the position I had hoped to be after three days? Obviously not,” Scheffler said. “But for the way I’ve swung it and played the last few days, I feel like I could be a lot worse.” Such is the level that the 28-year-old star finds himself at that, during feels like an “off week," he will head to the course on Sunday on the front page of the leaderboard, albeit at the bottom. “For me to be sitting where I am this week, not having really my best stuff, I think is pretty good,” Scheffler said. It's not like Scheffler hasn't been searching for it. He hit the practice range shortly after a 71 on Friday, then proceeded to have an animated session with longtime coach Randy Smith. Scheffler waved his arms at times, clearly frustrated by the results. Asked about it, Scheffler shrugged and called the whole thing “pretty regular," and it should be pointed out that the practice range at most tournaments doesn't sit next to the media center as it does at Oakmont. Scheffler admitted the session ended without much...

title: The U.S. Open leaderboard feels random. Oakmont does that
content: J.J. Spaun, Sam Burns and Adam Scott will duke it out Sunday at Oakmont. Getty Images OAKMONT, Pa. — A funny conversation broke out at the back of the driving range Saturday afternoon. Talker No. 1 was a numbers-inclined swing coach. Talker No. 2 was a golf statistician. They riddled their way through the 36-hole data report. What was Oakmont rewarding most? Distance? Accuracy? What was Si Woo Kim doing so well to hang around? It’s possible Si Woo didn’t even know himself. How about Sam Burns? Are guys clubbing down more than normal? Does the rough accentuate or equalize skill? And what kind of player is J.J. Spaun, really? Each question seemed to beget another, until we had bird-walked so far we forgot where we had started. The bottom line? Oakmont is confusing more than just the players and caddies. Everyone is puzzled about this place. As a result, it has properly created a very confusing leaderboard. And this ain’t the first time. Up top is one of the best putters in the world. Three back is one of the worst chippers on Tour, currently third in the field in short game stats this week. There is just one major winner in the top 10, and he’s 44 years old. A few strokes back is a 25-year-old who hasn’t won anything. Craziest of all might be the pro who has missed 12 of his last 15 cuts. How the hell is he doing it? At Oakmont, the difficulty is cranked to 11, the slopes are harsh, the rough is horrific — U.S. Opens can turn in weird report cards with all that randomness. A...

title: Duro llamado de la Procuraduría a las autoridades ambientales para que cumplan con fallo
content: Por medio de un comunicado de prensa publicado en la tarde de este sábado 14 de junio, la Procuraduría General de la Nación informó que recibió una serie de quejas por demoras acerca de la entrega de certificaciones ambientales que deben expedir, necesarias para aprobar nuevas propuestas de proyectos mineros. (Lea también: “Nos usaron para llegar al poder”: primera línea rompe con Petro y denuncia abandono ). En esa medida, el Ministerio Público informó que emitió una circular dirigida a entidades ambientales con el fin de que cumplan con las órdenes del Consejo de Estado en un caso que se conoce como ‘Ventanilla Minera’. De acuerdo con el ente de control, “dicha sentencia del 4 de agosto de 2022, busca una mejor coordinación entre las entidades del medio ambiente y del sector minero, que permita saber con claridad en qué zonas del país se puede hacer minería, y en cuáles no, para proteger la naturaleza y al mismo tiempo brindar seguridad jurídica a quienes quieran desarrollar proyectos mineros dentro del marco legal”. Ante esta situación, la Procuraduría advirtió que las autoridades ambientales deben utilizar la información y los mapas disponibles una vez se radican solicitudes de proyectos mineros o cuando necesiten de la debida certificación ambiental. “Estas entidades cuentan con un plazo máximo de 15 días hábiles para responder dichas solicitudes y deben publicar las certificaciones a fin de que tanto los ciudadanos, como las demás entidades...

title: फल-सब्जी विक्रेता बनकर 50 लाख की ठगी, 9 सिम कार्ड के साथ दो गिरफ्तार
creator: Nilmani Pal
content: यूपी।�जनपद मुजफ्फरनगर में थाना साइबर क्राइम पुलिस को शनिवार को बड़ी सफलता हाथ लगी। सोशल मीडिया के माध्यम से करीब 50 लाख रुपए की ठगी करने वाले शातिर ठगों को गिरफ्तार किया गया।�पुलिस ने फेसबुक के माध्यम से फर्जी फल व सब्जी विक्रेता कंपनी के नाम से पेज बनाकर ग्राहकों से लगभग 50 लाख रुपए से अधिक की ठगी करने वाले दो शातिर ठगों को गिरफ्तार किया है। पुलिस ने पकड़े गए आरोपियों के कब्जे से चार पासबुक, तीन चेक बुक, 9 सिम कार्ड, तीन मोबाइल और एक लैपटॉप बरामद किया है। मुजफ्फरनगर एसपी क्राइम इंदु सिद्धार्थ ने पुलिस लाइन स्थित सभागार में प्रेस वार्ता करते हुए फल व सब्जी के नाम पर 50 लाख रुपए से अधिक की ठगी करने वाले दो शातिर गिरोह का खुलासा किया। उन्होंने बताया, "थाना साइबर पुलिस के द्वारा फल व सब्जी के नाम पर ठगी करने वाले दो आरोपियों अहमद नवाज पुत्र मोहम्मद उमर और अमन पुत्र मोहम्मद चांद को खतौली से गिरफ्तार किया गया है। जिनके कब्जे से पुलिस ने 4 पासबुक, 3 चेक बुक, 9 सिम कार्ड, 3 मोबाइल फोन और 1 लैपटॉप बरामद किए हैं।" एसएसपी ने बताया, "पकड़े गए आरोपियों ने फेसबुक पर फ्रूट ट्रेडर्स कंपनी, अमन फूड्स कंपनी, सईद ट्रेडिंग कंपनी होलसेल, फ्रूट एंड वेजिटेबल राइस पोर्टल एएफसी फ्रूट बनाना होलसेल आदि के नाम से पांच कंपनियों के नाम से पेज बना रखे थे, जिसके माध्यम से 2020 से अब तक लगभग 50 लाख रुपए से अधिक की ठगी कर चुके हैं।"दोनों आरोपियों के ऊपर महाराष्ट्र में भी मुकदमे दर्ज हैं। आरोपी सब्जी-फल बेचने के नाम पर अपने खाते में कुछ रकम जमा करवा लेते थे और फिर उसके बाद अपने नंबर को बंद कर देते थे। ऐसे पैसे देने वाले व्यक्ति उनसे संपर्क करते तो संपर्क नहीं हो पाता था। जो कि लगातार लोगों से ठगी करते रहे...

title: Dodgers’ Emmet Sheehan will Join Starting Rotation Next Week
creator: Katherine Wacker, Last Word On Sports
content: The Los Angeles Dodgers starting rotation is on the verge of getting reinforcements, as right-hander Emmet Sheehan will make his first start in 13 months next week, according to Fabian Ardaya of The Athletic. Sheehan missed all of the 2024 season recovering from Tommy John surgery. Manager Dave Roberts said that the right-hander will throw a bullpen session tomorrow and they will figure out where he goes in the rotation. Right now, he is built up to four innings and around 60 pitches. Dave Roberts stopped short of saying a day where Emmet Sheehan would start and be activated. They want to wait until after he throws his next bullpen session. https://t.co/sB5NtyZmvN — Fabian Ardaya (@FabianArdaya) June 14, 2025 Dodgers Get Emmet Sheehan Back to Boost Rotation Fine Tuning On his way back to the big leagues, the right-hander has made four rehab outings. The first three appearances were crisp. Sheehan gave up only one earned run over eight innings pitched, including 14 strikeouts. His latest outing was a bit of a hiccup. The right-hander went three and a third innings at Triple-A Oklahoma City, giving up four earned runs with seven strikeouts. However, he didn’t walk anyone, and two runs came on one swing—a home run in the thin Albuquerque air. Help Wanted Right now, the Dodgers will take all the help they can get . They have 14 arms on the injured list as it is, and a weary bullpen that’s carried more than their share of weight so far this season. Even staff ace Yoshinobu...

title: Зрители военного парада в США пожаловались на организацию мероприятия
content: ВАШИНГТОН, 15 июн - РИА Новости. Зрители, пришедшие на парад в Вашингтоне, посвященный 250-летию армии США, недовольны его организацией, в частности длинными очередями на входе, передает корреспондент РИА Новости с места событий. Пришедшие на парад люди жалуются, что организаторы оказались не готовы к большому количеству посетителей, что привело к огромным очередям. "Они (организаторы - ред.), очевидно, перегружены в связи с количеством нас тут", - сказал агентству один из посетителей парада. В очереди то и дело происходили стычки между теми, кто отстоял около четырех часов, и теми, кто пытался пройти без очереди. Одна женщина даже была арестована за то, что не пропустила полицейского, который пытался пройти через толпу. Парад, который проходит в субботу вечером вдоль Национальной аллеи, стал кульминацией праздничной программы, приуроченной к юбилею американской армии. В нем задействованы танки, артиллерия, исторические и современные военные самолеты, а также тысячи военнослужащих в парадной и исторической форме. Стоимость парада, по оценками армии, составит от 25 до 45 миллионов долларов. Мероприятие совпадает с днем рождения президента США Дональда Трампа в субботу: ему исполнилось 79 лет. Белый дом утверждает, что это совпадение, а сам американский лидер ранее окрестил парад "незабываемым праздником", пригласив всех желающих присоединиться к торжеству. Как сообщила газета Washington Post со ссылкой на источники, после одного из первых совещаний,...

title: Declaran a los premios Bonche de Oro como evento cultural e institucional de Córdoba
creator: El Heraldo Colombia
content: La Asamblea Departamental de Córdoba declaró, a través de una ordenanza, el ‘ Festival Bonche de Oro-Córdoba danza y canta sus tradiciones’, como evento cultural institucional del departamento. Leer más: Nadadora denuncia que perdió parte de su cuerpo tras contraer una bacteria en las playas de Santa Marta La iniciativa, que asegura su realización anual durante la Feria Nacional e Internacional de la Ganadería en el mes de junio, fue del gobernador Erasmo Zuleta Bechara y la gestora social Valeria Vega. Con la institucionalización del evento este gobierno reconoce el valor del patrimonio inmaterial cordobés y consolida el festival como un escenario permanente de promoción de las músicas, danzas y saberes tradicionales que conforman la identidad del territorio. “Estamos construyendo un legado cultural que reconoce y enaltece el talento de nuestras comunidades. El Bonche de Oro es más que un evento: es una política pública que dignifica nuestras raíces y estimula la economía creativa del departamento”, expresó el gobernador. Por su parte la gestora social Valeria Vega, indicó que con esto “la cultura de Córdoba gana un lugar permanente en la historia. Este no es solo un reconocimiento a nuestras danzas, músicas y tradiciones , es un acto de amor y de justicia con nuestras comunidades, nuestros artistas y nuestros saberes. El Bonche de Oro nace del corazón del pueblo y ahora, gracias a esta decisión, seguirá latiendo cada año con más fuerza. Me llena...

title: RGIII sends unbelievable message to Indiana Fever's Caitlin Clark after Liberty upset | Sporting News
creator: Zain Bando
content: It’s only June, and the debate regarding who the WNBA’s best player is can be put to rest after Saturday afternoon saw the Indiana Fever knock off the defending champion New York Liberty 102-88. Former Heisman Trophy winner Robert Griffin III shouted out Iowa Hawkeyes legend Caitlin Clark on social media after Clark scored 32 points to send the Liberty packing from the unbeaten ranks. Griffin III took to 'X' immediately following the game to give Clark her flowers. "Caitlin Clark is the greatest Women’s 3-point shooter ever, and it’s only her 2nd year in the WNBA," Griffin said. Griffin took it one step further, however. "Caitlin Clark just went CRAZY on the best team in the WNBA," Griffin added. "First game back, 7 three’s, 32 points, 9 assists, 8 rebs and a win over the top ranked New York Liberty to give them their first loss of the season. There is NO DOUBT who the most exciting player in the WNBA is." 📲 Follow The Sporting News on WhatsApp The win could perhaps give the Fever the confidence they need as the season progresses. After all, Clark is the face of the WNBA, whether one appreciates it or not. Clark appears to be 100 percent following her injury, and as the playoff push approaches, anything is possible. What Clark does next remains to be seen, but for now, it remains majestic. Only time will tell.

title: Sigue en Tiempo de Juego este domingo desde las 17:00h el PSG - Atlético y la final por el ascenso a Primera
content: El Atlético de Madrid se enfrentará este domingo (21.00 horas) al Paris Saint-Germain en el Estadio Rose Bowl de Pasadena (Los Ángeles, Estados Unidos) durante la jornada 1 de su grupo en el Mundial de Clubes, sin caras nuevas por parte de ninguno de los dos equipos, que han preferido aparcar los fichajes oficiales hasta acabar este torneo. A caballo entre los cursos 2024/25 y 2025/26, la FIFA pone en marcha un remozado Mundial que no parece contentar a muchos representantes de Europa por su calendario sobrecargado. De hecho, el PSG rubricó de la mejor forma posible su inolvidable temporada el pasado 31 de mayo con el título de la Liga de Campeones de la UEFA, el primero de su historia. Con su goleada por 5-0 frente al Inter de Milán sobre el césped del Allianz Arena de Múnich, la 'Orejona' al fin llegó a las vitrinas del equipo parisino, después de muchos años en balde pese a las inversiones millonarias de Nasser Al-Khelaïfi como cabeza más visible de la empresa Qatar Sports Investments (QSI); el magnate catarí cumplió así su sueño. Solo dos semanas más tarde, el plantel entrenado por el español Luis Enrique Martínez lucirá su estatus 'orejeado' en compromiso oficial. Por su reciente participación en el desenlace de la Liga de Naciones, quizá los franceses Désiré Doué y Ousmane Dembélé descansen de inicio para medirse ante el Atlético, dando una oportunidad a Gonçalo Ramos. El delantero portugués, toda una irrupción hace dos años militando...

title: Military parade rolls through DC as 'No Kings' protesters across US decry Trump
creator: Lolita C. Baldor And Michelle L. Price, The Associated Press
content: WASHINGTON (AP) — The grand military parade that President Donald Trump had been wanting for years barreled down Constitution Avenue on Saturday with tanks, troops and a 21-gun salute, playing out against a counterpoint of protests around the country by those who decried the U.S. leader as a dictator and would-be king. The Republican president, on his 79th birthday, sat on a special viewing stand south of the White House to watch the display of American military might, which began early and moved swiftly as light rain fell and clouds shrouded the Washington Monument. The procession, with more than 6,000 soldiers and 128 Army tanks, was one Trump tried to make happen in his first term after seeing such an event in Paris in 2017, but the plans never came together until the parade was added to an event recognizing the Army's 250th anniversary. “Every other country celebrates their victories. It’s about time America did too,” Trump declared in brief remarks at the parade's end. The president praised the strength of the military's fighting forces and said U.S. soldiers “fight, fight fight and they win, win win” — putting a new twist on a line that Trump regularly delivered during his 2024 campaign rallies after he survived an assassination attempt. Early in the evening's pageantry, the Army’s Golden Knights parachute team descended from overcast skies toward the reviewing stand. The team had been scheduled to appear at the end of the parade, but jumped earlier than planned in the...

title: Штраф до 300 рублей грозит за незаконное изъятие паспорта гражданина РФ
content: МОСКВА, 15 июня. /ТАСС/. Административный штраф в размере от 100 до 300 рублей грозит за незаконное изъятие паспорта гражданина РФ, за его принятие в залог - предупреждение или штраф в размере 100 рублей. Об этом ТАСС сообщили в пресс-центре МВД России в ответ на соответствующий запрос агентства. "За незаконное изъятие должностным лицом документа, удостоверяющего личность гражданина (паспорта), предусмотрена административная ответственность в виде административного штрафа в размере от ста до трехсот рублей (п. 1 ст. 19.17 КоАП РФ)", - сказали в пресс-центре. В МВД добавили, что принятие паспорта в залог влечет предупреждение или наложение административного штрафа в размере ста рублей (п. 2 ст. 19.17 КоАП РФ). Изъятие у гражданина РФ действительного паспорта не допускается в соответствии законом "О гражданстве РФ". Выявление и пресечение административных правонарушений возложены на территориальные органы МВД России. В частности, это входит в обязанности участковых уполномоченных полиции и сотрудников патрульно-постовой службы.

title: Former royal insider breaks down Trooping the Colour
Princess Kate pays tribute to Diana with iconic turquoise look at Trooping the Colour
creator: Shweta Singh
content: Kate Middleton finally returned to the public eye and made her 13th appearance after becoming a part of the royal family in 2011 at this year's Trooping the Colour. True to form, the Princess of Wales didn’t disappoint, coordinating elegantly with her daughter, Princess Charlotte, and capturing the attention of royal watchers with her poised presence and timeless style. Princess Kate and Princess Charlotte delighted royal fans with their matching outfits at this year’s Trooping the Colour, offering a heartwarming mother-daughter moment during the royal procession up the Mall. Kate wore a striking turquoise and white Catherine Walker coat dress paired with a matching hat by Juliette Botterilll Milliner, while Charlotte echoed the look in a high-neck, long-sleeved dress in the same vibrant hue, as reported by The Mirror. The two shared smiles and laughs as they waved from their carriage, joined by Prince George and Prince Louis. Meanwhile, Prince William took part in the parade on horseback, riding alongside other senior members of the royal family. Kate’s outfit appears to be a thoughtful nod to Princess Diana, closely mirroring a turquoise and white Catherine Walker suit Diana wore during a 1992 visit to New Delhi, India. The subtle tribute may carry added significance in light of the recent Air India plane crash in Ahmedabad on June 12, suggesting Kate’s choice was not only a gesture of remembrance for Diana but also a quiet show of solidarity with those affected by the...

title: Migrantes estadounidenses protestan en la CDMX contra las políticas migratorias de Trump
creator: NOTICIAS DE HOY
content: Norteamericanos que viven en México marcharon desde la Glorieta de Insurgentes , el metro Hidalgo y el Ángel de la Independencia rumbo a la Embajada de Estados Unidos en Paseo de la Reforma para exigir a Donald Trump un alto a las redadas masivas y el uso de fuerza militar contra migrantes en Los Ángeles, California. En el marco de la movilización ‘ No Kings ’, cientos de mexicanos, extranjeros y centroamericanos unieron sus voces desde la Ciudad de México para alzar la voz contra el avance de las políticas del presidente estadounidense, mismas que, según dijeron quienes protestaron, no solo violentan a los migrantes viviendo en aquel país sino a los americanos quienes viven las consecuencias de la militarización. TE PUEDE INTERESAR: Convocan a 2 mil protestas contra ‘autoritarismo’ de Donald Trump ‘ America has no kings! ’, corearon los manifestantes mientras avanzaban por la Avenida Juárez , la calle Génova y Florencia, rumbo a Paseo de la Reforma con banderas de Estados Unidos en mano, mismas que ondeaban tras colocarlas al revés para mostrar su descontento con las políticas que ha implementado el gobierno trumpista. ‘ Es un país violento que muchos americanos viviendo en México ya no reconocemos. La violencia no es el camino. La violencia está acabando con el estado de derecho, democracia, respeto y los valores de América. (...) Los migrantes en Los Ángeles también son nuestros hermanos y levantan la economía del país ’, dijo un hombre originario de...

title: Man held for killing 27-year-old in hit-and-run in south Delhi
content: The Delhi Police arrested a man on Friday for killing a 27-year-old man in a hit-and-run in Vasant Kunj, south Delhi on June 7, officers said on Saturday. Police said that the car was identified as a Renault Triber, and its owner told them that her driver was alone in the car when the accident took place. The victim was identified as Ashish Kumar. The accused was identified as Jinender Jain, said police. “Kumar was riding his bike home when he was hit and run over by a car on National Highway 8 near Shiv Murti at 10pm. Passersby called us, and we rushed Kumar to Medanta Hospital in Gurugram and then to Safdarjung Hospital in Delhi, where he was declared dead,” said a police officer associated with the case. “The car was unidentified because of heavy traffic and there were no nearby CCTV cameras. So, we examined all vehicles along NH8 from Mahipalpur to the Gurugram border on CCTV and narrowed the probe to 20 vehicles. We then identified the car through CCTV footage at IFFCO Chowk in Gurugram,” said Amit Goel, deputy commissioner of police (southwest). Police said that they served a notice to the car owner who said that it was her driver who alone in the car at the time of the accident. “We tracked down Jain and arrested him from Jasola on June 11, and also seized the car,” he added. Police said that Jain is being interrogated and has been sent to police custody.

title: Commanders Trade Of Terry McLaurin Would Be Major Step Backward
creator: Athlon Sports
content: Commanders Trade Of Terry McLaurin Would Be Major Step Backward originally appeared on Athlon Sports.Let's be clear: The contract-dispute solution for a Super Bowl contending team like the Washington Commanders is not to dump one of their best players.The solution is to sign him ... and that very much applies to Terry McLaurin.McLaurin has been a holdout as he seeks a contract extension for his desired price. ... which we bet is in excess of $30 million per year.A deal is not immediately forthcoming.What is?Media trade speculation.Bleacher Report is offering up a doozey as they believe the Commanders could entertain a blockbuster trade idea to replace McLaurin with another "star.''The centerpiece idea? Washington loses its No. 1 receiver ... and gets running back Breece Hall from the New York Jets.And we can't figure out why anyone would hit the "like button'' on that.Hall in in the final year of his cheap rookie deal, and when healthy has shown explosiveness. But as they usher in a new era of Jets football, word is he's going to be part of a "committee'' approach at running back.That means he's semi-expendable to them ... Something that isn't the case with McLaurin here.B/R writes, "McLaurin could be particularly valuable to Fields, who has shown himself to be an elite scrambler ..''That's true - and it's exactly what Washington thinks about the McLaurin/Jayden Daniels pairing.In this fantasy swap, Washington gives a fifth-round pick and gets a second-rounder. ... and they...
