title: Goa’s ‘taxi mafia’: What tourists need to know
creator: Kaustubh Naik
content: On Friday, after a fortnight of intense debate about draft guidelines on app-based taxis notified by Goa’s transport department, Chief Minister Pramod Samant said that external cab giants such as Uber and Ola would not be allowed to operate in the state.Though the Goa Transport Aggregator Guidelines, 2025, offers a regulatory framework for app-based taxi and bike taxi operators, Samant said that it is “meant to regulate the existing taxi system, not to permit new companies”.The controversy about the guidelines brings into focus the polarised opinions about the taxi system in a state that earns just over 16% of its revenues from tourism.The guidelines have been welcomed both by residents and tourists. They cite a variety of reasons for supporting app-based taxis: unregulated, inflated fares by Goan taxi operators, a shortage of vehicles when they are needed, the seemingly whimsical behaviour of taxi operators, among them.In fact, some have fixed the blame for what they believe is the decline of Goan tourism on the so-called taxi mafia.But the state’s taxi drivers are up in arms. They oppose the idea of a business that they have built and sustained over years being handed over to large corporations.The Goa taxi mafia is behind this.They are just looting tourists.I was staying at a hotel in Varca,...Read more

title: 女子ゴルフのイ・ボミ、さわやか白ミニ丈ゴルフウェアでナイスショット 「とてもお似合い」「超可愛い」
content: 韓国出身の女子プロゴルファーで、2023年限りで日本ツアーを引退したイ・ボミさん(36)が2025年6月6日、自身のインスタグラムを更新。白基調のミニ丈のゴルフウェア姿で、ナイスショットを披露した。 イ・ボミさんのインスタグラム(@bomee.lee)より イ・ボミさんのインスタグラム(@bomee.lee)より イ・ボミさんのインスタグラム(@bomee.lee)より イ・ボミさんのインスタグラム(@bomee.lee)より イ・ボミさんのインスタグラム(@bomee.lee)より イ・ボミさんのインスタグラム(@bomee.lee)より 「ウェアのおかけでちょっと可愛く見えた気がする」 イ・ボミさんは、「きょうはウェアのおかけでちょっと可愛く見えた気がする」といい、ミニ丈のゴルフウェア姿を披露。動画では、ナイスショットも披露した。 インスタグラムに投稿された写真では、ウエストの部分と見にスカート部分がカラフルな色合いの白基調のウェアを着用。1枚目は、スマホを片手にした自撮りショットとなっている。 この投稿には、「いつも可愛いよ~」「ちょっとだけでなく超可愛い」「とっても可愛くて素敵なウェア姿ですね!」「とてもお似合いですね」「素敵です」といったコメントが寄せられていた。

3 करोड़ की कार से चलेंगे 'छोटे सरकार' अनंत सिंह, लैंड क्रूजर की बड़हिया मंदिर में पूजा-अर्चना
content: पटना: बिहार के बाहुबली नेता और पूर्व विधायक अनंत सिंह ने बेहद खास बुलेटप्रूफ लैंड क्रूजर कार खरीदी है। यह लग्जरी कार पटना पहुंच चुकी है और इसके आगमन के साथ ही सोशल मीडिया पर बधाइयों का सिलसिला शुरू हो गया है। बड़हिया जगदंबा मंदिर में पूजा-अर्चना भी की गई। इस अत्याधुनिक कार की कीमत 2.50 करोड़ से 3 करोड़ के बीच बताई जा रही है। Land Cruiser ZX कार अपने पावर, सेफ्टी और लग्जरी के लिए मशहूर है। ये देश की सबसे सुरक्षित और ताकतवर SUV में से एक मानी जाती है। क्या है लैंड क्रूजर की खासियत? अनंत सिंह द्वारा खरीदी गई ये नई टोयोटा लैंड क्रूजर सिर्फ एक महंगी गाड़ी नहीं, बल्कि सुरक्षा का एक अभेद्य किला है। सफेद रंग की ये गाड़ी अब 'छोटे सरकार' को सफेद कपड़ों में जनता से मिलने के लिए सुरक्षित रूप से सड़कों पर उतारेगी। बताया जाता है कि ये गाड़ी बुलेटप्रूफ है और इसकी क्षमताएं आपको चौंका देंगी। इसकी एक्स-शोरूम कीमत 2.50 करोड़ से 3 करोड़ के बीच है और इसमें 3346 सीसी का शक्तिशाली इंजन लगा है। ये भी कहा जा रहा है कि इस गाड़ी को न तो कोई बम, न कोई गोली, न ही कोई रॉकेट लॉन्चर और न ही कोई हैंड ग्रेनेड नुकसान पहुंचा सकता है। हालांकि, एनबीटी ऑनलाइन इसकी आधिकारिक पुष्टि नहीं करता है। अनंत सिंह के पास कारों का शानदार कलेक्शन अनंत सिंह की सपनों की गाड़ी पटना पहुंच गई है। बड़हिया के जगदंबा मंदिर में इसकी पूजा-अर्चना भी की गई। सोशल मीडिया पर उनके समर्थक लगातार उन्हें बधाई दे रहे हैं। अब अनंत सिंह के शानदार कार कलेक्शन में ये चमचमाती नई लैंड क्रूजर भी शामिल हो गई है। उनके पास पहले से ही एक से बढ़कर एक लग्जरी और महंगी गाड़ियां मौजूद हैं। पिछले दिनों चर्चित गैंगस्टर लॉरेंस बिश्नोई गैंग से धमकियां मिलने के बाद...

title: スプーンひとつで老化対策?! 「糖尿病」「高血圧」にも効く今が旬のすごい果物とは[見逃し配信・6月第3週] - 書籍オンライン編集部から
creator: ダイヤモンド社書籍オンライン編集部
content: 先週(金~木)の「書籍オンライン」で、特に読者の反響が大きかった「人気記事BEST5」をご紹介します。 【週間人気記事1位】 スプーンひとつで老化対策?! 「糖尿病」「高血圧」にも効く今が旬のすごい果物とは Photo: Adobe Stock 週間ランキング1位は>>> こちらの記事 です。 料理が面倒、忙しくて料理をする暇がない、そもそも料理が苦手......でも、野菜はちゃんと食べたい! そんな人におすすめなのが、書籍 『生産者さんだから知っている そのままおいしい野菜の食べ方』 。 旬の時期や、新鮮なものの見分け方、栄養、長持ちする保存方法、おいしく食べるためのコツなど、なるべく料理せず、ラクにおいしく野菜を食べる方法を多数紹介しています。 今回は、そのなかから今が旬の果物について紹介していきます。 googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('gpt-dol-article-middle'); }); >>>記事を読む 【週間人気記事2位】 「なぜか子供がどハマりしている!」との声も。異例のビジネス書で紹介されている問題『消えた1000円』を、AIは解けるのか? 問題文は書籍『頭のいい人だけが解ける論理的思考問題』より 週間ランキング2位は>>> こちらの記事 です。 「ビジネス書なのに、なぜか子供が夢中で読んでます!」 こんな感想が寄せられているのが、 2024年の年間ベストセラー4位(ビジネス書単行本/トーハン調べ) となった話題の書 『 頭のいい人だけが解ける論理的思考問題 』 だ。 論理的思考問題とは、知識や難しい計算はいっさい不要で、「考える力」のみが問われる問題を指す。 小中学校の受験問題、就職試験問題、Google、Apple、Microsoftといった超一流企業の採用試験 などでも出題され、これまでの正解が通用しない時代に必要な「思考力」を鍛える“最高の知的トレーニング”でもある。 ではこの論理的思考問題、人間よりも賢いと言われる 「AI」は解くことができるのだろうか? この記事では、本書から1問を選んでAIに出題し、思考の過程と、導き出した回答を紹介しよう。 >>>記事を読む 【週間人気記事3位】 免疫力アップ&ダイエットにも! 余分な塩分を排出してくれる今が旬のすごい野菜とは Photo: Adobe Stock 週間ランキング3位は>>> こちらの記事 です。 【週間人気記事4位】 イラッとすることを言われたら、三流は「怒る」、二流は「論破する」。一流はどうする? Photo: Adobe Stock 週間ランキング4位は>>> こちらの記事 です。 いまシリコンバレーをはじめ、世界で「ストイシズム」の教えが爆発的に広がっている。 日本でも、ストイックな生き方が身につく 『STOIC 人生の教科書ストイシズム』 (ブリタニー・ポラット著、花塚恵訳) がついに刊行。 佐藤優氏 が「 大きな理想を獲得するには禁欲が必要だ。この逆説の神髄をつかんだ者が勝利する 」と評する一冊だ。 同書の刊行に寄せて、ライターの小川晶子さんに寄稿いただいた。 >>>記事を読む 【週間人気記事5位】 【京都大? 大阪大? 神戸大?】関西の国公立大学の序列はどうなった?【2025年最新版序列マップ付き】...

title: Leroy Merlin: leitora cobra ressarcimento por dano provocado na residência durante entrega
creator: Renata Okumura
content: Patrícia Manoel relata que fez uma compra pelo site da Leroy Merlin. A entrega foi realizada, mas no dia o entregador danificou o portão da sua empresa. Ela cobra ressarcimento pelo prejuízo.Leitora cobra ressarcimento por dano provocado na residência durante entrega. Foto ilustrativa.Reclamação de Patrícia Manoel: “No dia 3 de fevereiro deste ano, eu fiz uma compra para a empresa pela loja virtual da Leroy Merlin com a promessa de entrega em três dias, mas a entrega só foi feita dia 12 de fevereiro. Esta foi feita por um motorista terceirizado, o mesmo quando adentrou no recinto dando ré no caminhão danificou meu portão (novo, pois fazia dois meses que eu havia colocado). Liguei para a Leroy Merlin e o atendente me informou que nos passaria um e-mail com as solicitações necessárias. No dia 14, recebi o e-mail com a solicitação para que enviássemos três orçamentos e a foto do portão. Fiz os orçamentos (houve uma demora, pois os profissionais de serralheria tiveram que agendar as visitas para poder avaliar os danos no portão e nem todos podiam vir no mesmo dia e horário), pois bem, dia 5 de março, enviei os orçamentos e a foto, mas até o presente momento não houve nenhum retorno do meu e-mail, se estão analisando, se falta alguma coisa, se irão resolver ou não. E ficamos aqui com o portão todo torto, e correndo o risco dele parar de vez, pois está forçando bastante para fechar e abrir. Este portão é o único meio que temos para fechar a...

title: Kelly Clarkson Says Her Mom Would Glue Her School Picture on Scenic Backgrounds to Recreate Vacation Photos — Here’s Why
creator: People
content: NEED TO KNOW Kelly Clarkson is sharing a surprising childhood anecdote. During the June 12 episode of her daytime talk show, the 43-year-old host was doing an impromptu Q&A session with her audience members when a woman — who shared that she has two sets of twins — asked Clarkson about her favorite summer vacation as a kid. "Oh, we were poor. We didn't do vacations," the American Idol alum replied. "We, you know, went and played in the backyard." Clarkson then revealed her mom's hilarious summer vacation hack. "So well, one thing that is funny, though, is our mother would take my school picture and she would cut it out and then she would post me in like the desert," she said. "She would paste me, she would glue me onto like a desert scene or in the mountains or the Swiss Alps. Oh, she's on a grassy knoll." "Like, you know, she would just post me somewhere as if, I guess, we had gone [there]. You're welcome, Mom," she continued, laughing. "And it was like an artsy thing I think she did, too. But also, yeah, we don't have vacation pics." Clarkson then said that she didn't think her family was alone in not having room in the budget for summer trips. "I don't think everybody can afford to vacation," she said, asking the original audience member, "How do you afford a vacation with two sets of twins?" "I'm going to be posting pictures of them at the Swiss Alps," the woman joked in response. Clarkson then laughingly said, "You should take the advice. You can go anywhere really. You...

title: 唯一無二 極北のトナカイ肉 幌延で飼育 ソーセージ、丼に 牧場に年間4万5千人
content: 「真っ赤なお鼻のトナカイさんが~♪」。クリスマスソングにも登場するサンタクロースのそりを引くトナカイは誰もが知る存在ですが、なかなか実物を目にすることはありません。もともと北極圏周辺に生息し、北米や北欧では肉用に飼養されています。日本国内で唯一、北欧などと同様にトナカイを家畜として飼育する牧場が北海道にあります。 札幌から北に約270キロ、北方領土を除いて日本最北端のまち稚内市にも近い宗谷管内幌延町です。幌延町ではトナカイの牧場が人気の観光地で、その肉が町の特産品の一つとなっています。なぜ幌延にトナカイがいるのでしょうか。幌延とトナカイの出合いは1987年。1人の移住者の挑戦が始まりでした。 人口約2千人の幌延町で、年間4万5千人が訪れるのが、町中心部から北に3キロ離れ、第三セクターが運営する「ほろのべトナカイ観光牧場」です。来場者4万5千人は幌延町を1年間訪れた観光客数の約4割にあたります。 広さ8クタールの牧場では約30頭のトナカイが草をはむ牧歌的な風景が広がっています。観光牧場で飼育するトナカイはエゾシカよりもひとまわり小さく、オス、メスともにイラストなどでおなじみの立派な角が印象的です。大阪市から旅行で訪れたという会社員平田千恵さん(33)は、観光客向けに販売しているエサをトナカイに与えながら「目が大きくてかわいい」と大喜びです。 1人の移住者というのは岐阜県出身の恩田猛さん(65)。大学卒業後、愛媛県で造船エンジニアだった恩田さんが、配合飼料など人工的なエサを食べて育つ家畜の肉ではなく、「自然のものを食べさせる畜産をしたい」との思いから、北欧などで家畜として飼われ、自然のコケなどを食べて育つというトナカイに着目。会社を辞めて、1986年にフィンランドに渡り、現地の牧場で1年間、飼育方法や加工技術を学びました。 恩田さんは「寒くて広大な土地がある北海道ならできるかもしれない」と考え、1987年に帰国し、トナカイの畜産計画を携え、北海道の中でも冷涼な北部や東部の自治体を回りました。...

title: Hämeen Sanomat ottaa kantaa | Aika on ajanut ohi Turuntien katukiveyksestä
ベール脱いだ中国新興の半導体装置メーカー 背後にファーウェイの陰
content: 中国が 半導体 産業の強化を急いでいる。きっかけは、米国による厳しい輸出規制だ。素材や製造装置で世界にまたがるサプライチェーン(供給網)を必要とする半導体で、米国の包囲網にあらがいながら「自立自強」にひた走る中国に、勝機はあるのか。 中国・ 上海市 で3月末に開かれた半導体分野の国際展示会「セミコン・チャイナ」。前年を3割ほど上回る約1400社の参加企業が集う会場に、ひときわ人だかりができるブースがあった。設立わずか4年の半導体製造装置メーカー「新凱来技術(SiCarrier)」のブースだ。 シリコンウェハーに素材を張る「成膜」や表面加工を施す「 エッチング 」など、半導体の回路を形成する「前工程」に必要な装置の模型がずらりと並んだ。製品ラインアップの幅広さに、来場者は驚きを隠さなかった。 新凱来は、ハイテク産業が盛んな深圳市の政府系 投資会社 が出資する国有企業だ。こうした展示会への出展は今回が初めて。それにもかかわらず大きな注目を集めたのには理由がある。業界内で取りざたされてきた、中国を代表する企業である 通信機器 最大手「 華為技術 ( ファーウェイ )」との関係だ。 ともに深圳市に本社を置く新凱来とファーウェイの間には、資本上の直接的な関係はない。ブースで説明していた社員も「ファーウェイとは関係ありません」。 だが新凱来が所有している特...

creator: Doug Ferguson, The Associated Press

title: Sam Burns holds steady on soggy Oakmont to lead U.S. Open
creator: Doug Ferguson, The Associated Press
content: OAKMONT, Pa. (AP) — Sam Burns only wobbled twice on a soggy Oakmont course Saturday and held his nerve with a great lag from just inside 60 feet on the final hole for a 1-under 69, leaving him one round away from a U.S. Open title and no margin for error. Burns, who has never contended in his 20 previous majors, next takes on the Sunday pressure of golf's most stringent test alongside Adam Scott, the 44-year-old Australian and the only player among the top 10 with experience winning a major. Scott, whose lone major was 12 years ago at the Masters, didn't make a mistake since a soft bogey on the opening hole and looked far younger than his 44 years down the stretch with brilliant iron play and enough putts for a 67, leaving him one shot behind. This was shaping up to be a wild chase to the finish, with only four players under par. That starts with Burns at 4-under 206. He has five PGA Tour titles, the last one more than two years ago. He is coming off a playoff loss last week in the RBC Canadian Open. J.J. Spaun, who lost in a playoff at The Players Championship in March, kept pace with Burns throughout the back nine until the end, when he couldn't save par from a bunker and shot 69. He joined Scott a shot behind. “It seemed like we were kind of back and forth,” Spaun said. “He would take the lead, I would take the lead, I would fall back, whatever. But it was fun. You can’t really play against your opponent; you got to play this course. There’s just so much on demand with...

title: Walls, Diaz lift Rays to 8-4 victory, series win over Mets
creator: CBS New York
content: Taylor Walls and Yandy Díaz had two hits and two RBIs apiece and the Tampa Bay Rays remained hot with an 8-4 win over the New York Mets on Saturday.Junior Caminero homered to lead off a five-run fourth inning for Tampa Bay, which has won eight of its last 11 games and leads the majors with a 17-6 record and 134 runs scored since May 20.Josh Lowe and Brandon Lowe each finished with two hits and an RBI.Drew Rasmussen (6-4) won his fifth straight decision despite allowing seven hits and four runs in five innings. He struck out three. He had allowed two runs over 29 innings in his previous five starts.Brandon Nimmo had three hits and two RBIs while Brett Baty and Ronny Mauricio each homered for the Mets, who lost consecutive games for the first time since a three-game skid from May 18-20.The series loss is the first for New York since it dropped two of three against the Boston Red Sox from May 19-21.The Mets are one of three teams who have not been swept in a series this season, along with the New York Yankees and Cincinnati Reds.Tylor Megill (5-5) gave up six runs (three earned) in 3 2/3 innings. He struck out five.Key momentWalls laid down a safety squeeze to score Jake Mangum with one out in the fourth and put the Rays ahead for good at 3-2.Key statMegill has a 5.79 ERA in his last eight starts after opening the season with a 1.74 ERA in his first six starts. Overall in his five-season career, Megill has a 2.45 ERA in March and April and a 5.01 ERA thereafter.Up nextThe...

title: Rahm no saca partido del Oakmont más vulnerable y pierde sus opciones
creator: Hugo Costa
content: Más de un jugador esta semana habrá invocado a los dioses de la lluvia buscando algo de clemencia deportiva en el fin de semana del US Open. Los de arriba debieron tener overbooking de plegarias y, desde la tarde de ayer, el agua descargó con fuerza en Oakmont, dando al traste a las maquiavélicas intenciones de la USGA. No solo no habrá un ganador sobre par, hoy sábado fueron varios los jugadores que aprovecharon las condiciones más accesibles del recorrido para firmar tarjetas bajo el par y posicionarse para la victoria el domingo. Si llegamos al sábado con tres jugadores bajo el par, la jornada nos ha dejado una unidad más y un liderato, el de Sam Burns, en -4. Lamentablemente, Jon Rahm no será de ese grupo de escogidos, pese a un inicio prometedor. El ganador del torneo en 2021 finalizó la tercera ronda con 73 golpes para acumular un resultado de +7, que le deja a 11 golpes de la cabeza del torneo. Rahm empezó con par en el hoyo uno y un gran birdie embocando un putt desde seis metros en el dos . "El campo estaba bastante más sencillo, un poco más blando y con el viento que favorecía en los primeros hoyos. Luego ha empezado a cambiar el viento, pero en general el campo estaba más fácil", analizaba el jugador español. Pero la alegría no duraría mucho, el primer bogey llegaría en el hoyo 3 tras enviar su salida al bunker. Precisamente, la falta de precisión desde el tee de salida (5 de 14 calles) fue uno de los problemas en los 18 hoyos del sábado...

title: Luiz Henrique dá detalhes de negociação com o Botafogo após proposta do Flamengo
creator: Gávea News
content: Luiz Henrique revelou detalhes curiosos sobre sua chegada ao Botafogo em 2024, decisão que, segundo ele, foi tomada em apenas dois minutos. O atacante contou que, após se despedir de Rodolfo Landim e Marcos Braz — ex-dirigentes do Flamengo —, foi surpreendido por uma visita inesperada de John Textor, proprietário da SAF do clube carioca, que o convenceu a fechar com o Alvinegro logo após a saída dos representantes rubro-negros. O jogador relatou que o Flamengo desejava contratá-lo por empréstimo, o que não era do interesse do Real Betis, clube espanhol ao qual ele pertencia. "Me prometeram várias coisas, o presidente do Flamengo foi embora. Dois minutos depois, chega o Textor", disse Luiz Henrique, revelando ainda que seus empresários haviam preparado a visita do norte-americano sem seu conhecimento. Durante o encontro, Textor tomou café, comeu bolo de cenoura e demonstrou interesse genuíno não apenas pelo talento do atacante, mas também por sua personalidade. "Me convenceu a vir pro Brasil, porque é um cara super gente boa e mostrou que queria muito", afirmou o atleta, que se referiu ao dirigente como alguém "muito humilde". A contratação foi fechada em fevereiro de 2024 por 20 milhões de euros — valor que, à época, representava cerca de R$ 106,6 milhões —, tornando Luiz Henrique a maior contratação do futebol brasileiro em valores nominais. No mesmo ano, ele foi um dos destaques do Botafogo, conquistando o Brasileirão e a Libertadores, além de ser...

title: ВИДЕО. Не тот Трезеге: Аль-Ахли не забил с пенальти в ворота Интер Майами
content: В ночь на 15 июня проходит матч 1-го тура группы А клубного чемпионата мира 2025 между командами Аль-Ахли Каир (Египет) и Интер Майами (США). Коллективы играют на стадионе Хард Рок в Майами-Гарденс. Время начала встречи – 03:00 по Киеву. Все самые яркие моменты матча доступны в режиме LIVE в Telegram Sport.ua На 41-й минуте игрок цаплей Теласко Сегавия сфолил в своей штрафной и арбитр назначил пенальти для египетского клуба. К мячу подошел Махмуд Хассан, который также известен как Трезеге . Он не сумел реализовать 11-метрвый – голкипер Интер Майами Оскар Устари спас подопечных Хавьера Маскерано. ВИДЕО. title: Quatro edifícios críticos do complexo Nuclear de Esfahan, no Irã, foram danificados, diz AIEA
creator: Isabella Pugliese Vellani / Estadão
content: A Agência Internacional de Energia Atômica (AIEA) informou, em publicações no X, que quatro edifícios críticos no complexo nuclear de Esfahan, no Irã, foram danificados nos ataques de Israel contra o território iraniano, incluindo a Instalação de Conversão de Urânio e a Planta de Fabricação de Placas de Combustível. “As instalações nucleares de Esfahan foram alvo de vários ataques em 13 de junho. Nenhum aumento nos níveis de radiação fora do local foi relatado até agora. A AIEA permanece em contato próximo com o Irã”, escreve uma das postagens, que reitera que informações da Autoridade Reguladora Nuclear do Irã citam níveis de radiação inalterados. A AIEA também menciona que “não se espera aumento na radiação fora do local” em Natanz. “Com base nas informações disponíveis para a AIEA, nenhum dano foi observado no local da Planta de Enriquecimento de Combustível de Fordow nem no reator de água pesada de Khondab em construção. Nenhum dano adicional em Natanz desde ontem”, afirma o diretor-geral da agência, Rafael Grossi.

title: Burns grabs US Open lead with Scott and Spaun one back
creator: Jim SLATER AFP
content: Sam Burns outdueled fellow American J.J. Spaun down the stretch to grab a one-stroke lead after Saturday's third round of the US Open, setting the stage for a Sunday showdown at punishing Oakmont. Burns fired a one-under par 69 to stand on four-under 206 after 54 holes with Australian Adam Scott, the 2013 Masters champion, and Spaun sharing second on 207 and Norway's Viktor Hovland fourth on 209. Burns, whose most recent win came at the 2023 WGC Match Play, and Spaun each found the right rough at 18 but Burns made the green and two-putted for par while Burns found a bunker and two-putted for bogey. "I didn't drive the ball as well as I would have liked, but when I got out of position I did a good job of getting myself back in the fairway," Burns said. I was able to convert some of those and kept the momentum going. That was key to the round." Spaun, whose only PGA Tour win came at the 2022 Texas Open, shot 69 and was happy despite the setback at 18. "This is the best I've played in my career, for sure," Spaun said. "I'm just happy I'm still within shouting distance -- 18 is just a tough hole if you're out of position. Bogeys happen at Oakmont." Scott, the 2013 Masters champion, birdied three of the last six holes to fire a 67. The 44-year-old can be the second-oldest US Open winner after American Hale Irwin, who was 45 when he won in 1990. Scott would also have the longest gap between major titles. "It would be super fulfilling," Scott said. "I really haven't been in this...

title: Nashville program creates safe space for young men of color ahead of Father's Day and Juneteenth
creator: Kim Rafferty
content: NASHVILLE, Tenn. (WTVF) — "Do you think about how much you are valued? Where do you value yourself?" These questions create space for vulnerability among boys and young men of color in Nashville through the My Brother's Keeper initiative. "People feel brave enough to say these things. People feel safe enough and they feel empowered enough in this sacred space to say, 'Man, I need help. I need support,'" said Ashford Hughes, with the Nashville chapter of My Brother's Keeper. The organization helps both marginalized men and boys develop confidence and community. "We want to make them feel good, look good, but we also want to create critical thinkers," said Hughes. The nationwide My Brother's Keeper initiative launched to address opportunity gaps faced by boys and young men of color. Ahead of Father's Day and Juneteenth, a group of about 80 participants shared their backgrounds, favorite quotes, and what makes them proud. When asked what they were proud of, one young participant responded, "Being in advanced band." Hughes says the community they form for young men sets an example to build young leaders. "As we tell our kids, 'I see you and we see you' is vitally important to creating strong Nashville citizens," said Hughes. Watch our video to see how My Brother's Keeper is fostering confidence and community among Nashville's youth. To learn more about this initiative or other youth development programs in your area, visit mbk.gov for resources and information. This story was...

title: Skatista de 11 anos vive sonho com ídolo 'Mineirinho' no palco do João Rock; veja vídeo
content: Pietro, morador de , é campeão de categoria sub-11 em competição realizada nos Estados Unidos. Ele foi convidado a realizar sessões da modalidade ao lado de Sandro Dias, o ‘Mineirinho’, hexacampeão mundial do esporte, durante o festival, que conta com pista de skate entre as atrações. Também no palco, a lenda do esporte brasileiro, conhecido como ‘Rei do 540’, pediu uma salva de palmas a Pietro e foi prontamente atendido pelo público. Pietro Astolfi Gemignani, de 11 anos, realiza manobras de skate ao lado de 'Mineirinho' no João Rock 2025 — Foto: Arquivo Pessoal Para sempre Apesar da pouca idade, Pietro diz ser fã da banda carioca e conta ter ficado surpreso a ser convidado por Mineirinho para subir ao palco. Antes, ambos haviam participado de uma sessão na pista de skate do João Rock. Mãe de Pietro, Patrícia Astolfi Gemignani classifica como orgulho o caminho traçado até aqui pelo filho. Essa, no entanto, não é a primeira vez que Pietro é convidado pelo ídolo a participar de sessões no João Rock. O mesmo já havia acontecido há dois anos. VÍDEOS: Tudo sobre o João Rock 2025

title: Will Power: “I sent it” to snatch pole position for IndyCar WWTR oval night race
content: Will Power laid down a 49.9088s qualifying effort with a 180.329mph two-lap average to claim pole for the Bommarito Automotive Group 500. The result was Power’s fifth pole on the 1.25-mile oval and his 71st overall, extending his record for indy car racing poles. It was the two-time IndyCar champion’s first time topping the charts in qualifying since Aug. 2024 at Portland International Raceway. Power’s strategy was simple. “I sent it a lot,” Power said of his run. “I knew you would have to. You’d have to try to be flat in (turns) 3 and 4. Which I wasn’t quite flat, but very, very close. “Cool, man. Cool. It’s been a while since I’ve had a pole, so I’m really excited for the Verizon 12 car. Chevy did a great job, good power. Hopefully we can execute in the race. It’d be awesome to get a win here.” It’ll be an all-Team Penske front row, continuing a day of strength for the organization after Josef Newgarden led opening practice. Scott McLaughlin fell just .1515s shy of Power in an earlier run. Newgarden couldn’t match his teammates in qualifying, but ended up a strong fifth at session’s end. As qualifying unfolded The company is looking for its first win of 2025, hoping to break a season-long sweep for Honda drivers Alex Palou and Kyle Kirkwood . Chevrolet will have many frontrunners looking to break through at Gateway. The Bowtie brand claimed the top-five qualifiers on Saturday, with Pato O'Ward , David Malukas and Newgarden capping off the top-five. Meyer Shank Racing’s...

title: US Open 2025 tee times, groups, schedule for Round 4
creator: USA TODAY Sports
content: The U.S. Open concludes Sunday with the fourth and final round of the event at Oakmont Country Club in Pennsylvania. Sam Burns (4-under-par for the tournament) remains at the top of the U.S. Open leaderboard for a second straight day and will tee off Sunday afternoon. J.J. Spaun (-3) has remained competitive and enters the final day tied for second with Adam Scott (-3). Scott shot a 67 in the third round to move up two spots on Saturday. Spaun and Burns both shot a 69. Jordan Smith (+15), Matthieu Pavon (+16) and Cam Davis (+19) all sit at the bottom of the leaderboard. The trio will open the fourth round in the morning. The event will be back on schedule for the final day, after a weather delay suspended play in the second round on Friday and forced an early morning on Saturday to finish out the round. The third round was also pushed back from its originally scheduled start as a result, but finished on Saturday evening. US Open pairings: Round 4 tee times and groups *All times listed are Eastern Where to watch the US Open: TV channel, streaming Sunday The 2025 U.S. Open is being broadcast by NBC and USA Network, with the two networks splitting coverage for the third and final rounds. All rounds of the U.S. Open will be live streamed on Peacock, usopen.com, the USGA app and Fubo , which offers a free trial. Peacock will also broadcast U.S. Open All-Access, its whip-around style offering, for every round. Final Round: Sunday, June 15 Watch the U.S. Open on Fubo (free trial)...

Hospitalizan a Dr. Shenka, vocalista de Panteón Rococó ¿cuál es su estado de salud?
creator: andrea.hernandez
content: Este sábado 14 de junio se dio a conocer que Dr . Shenka , el vocalista de Panteón Rococó fue hospitalizado de emergencia previo a su presentación en San Juan del Río , Querétaro , por lo que se pospuso el concierto . ¿Por qué hospitalizaron a Dr. Shenka? De acuerdo con los primeros reportes, el vocalista de Panteón Rococó sufrió un microinfarto , también llamado preinfarto , por lo que servicios de emergencia lo trasladaron a un hospital ubicado en Río Moctezuma . De este modo, el grupo de ska mexicano Panteón Rococó anunció la suspensión de su presentación programada para este sábado 14 de junio en la Feria de San Juan del Río, Querétaro, debido a la complicación en la salud de Dr. Shenka . A través de un comunicado oficial difundido en sus redes sociales , la banda expresó su pesar por no poder llevar a cabo el concierto esta noche, señalando que la decisión fue tomada por razones médicas: Sin dar más detalles, Panteón Rococó aclaró que Dr. Shenka se encuentra estable y fuera de peligro, lo cual fue agradecido por sus seguidores, quienes expresaron apoyo y comprensión en redes sociales. En el mensaje, la banda también dejó en claro que ni la organización del evento ni el promotor son responsables de esta situación, la cual obedece estrictamente a causas de fuerza mayor. ¿Qué pasará con la gira de Panteón Rococó? En cuanto al resto de su gira, la agrupación que inmortalizó "La Carencia", señaló los demás conciertos de “...

title: RDC : au moins dix-neuf morts après des pluies torrentielles à Kinshasa
content: Au moins dix-neuf personnes sont mortes, samedi 14 juin, à Kinshasa, en République démocratique du Congo (RDC), dans des inondations survenues après des pluies torrentielles. « Ce soir, nous avons un bilan provisoire de dix-neuf morts : dix-sept dans la commune de Ngaliema, deux à Lemba et plus de 500 ménages ont été inondés dans la commune de Matete » , a détaillé, dans la soirée à l’Agence France-Presse (AFP), le ministre de l’intérieur provincial, Thierry Kabuya, faisant état d’ « importants dégâts matériels » et de routes « endommagées » . Plusieurs quartiers de Kinshasa se sont retrouvés samedi sous les eaux boueuses, après ces pluies tombées jusqu’au petit matin, d’après les images partagées par des habitants sur les réseaux sociaux. Dans cette mégalopole d’environ 17 millions d’habitants, pluies et inondations font régulièrement des victimes. Faute d’entretien et de réseaux adéquats, les voies d’évacuation des eaux sont généralement bouchées par des immondices. Une trentaine de morts en avril Les habitations de fortune et les rues non goudronnées sont particulièrement vulnérables aux intempéries dans les quartiers périphériques, pauvres et densément peuplés, qui s’étendent sur des milliers de kilomètres carrés. C’était le cas début avril dernier, quand une trentaine de personnes ont été tuées dans des inondations après des pluies diluviennes. Le réchauffement climatique est également en cause, selon les experts, qui...

title: Após 8 anos, Cleo Pires volta a usar o sobrenome da mãe; entenda o porquê
creator: Estadão Conteúdo
content: Cleo Pires anunciou que voltou a usar o sobrenome de sua mãe, a atriz Gloria Pires. Ao longo dos últimos oito anos, ela solicitou diversas vezes que fosse chamada apenas por "Cleo". A novidade foi tornada pública num vídeo publicado pela influenciadora Maya Massafera no Instagram. "Gente, olha, detalhe: [A Cleo] voltou pro Pires!", comentou, ao lado da cantora e atriz. "Voltei, porque eu tive um sonho muito importante. Eu sonhei com meu avô, Antônio Carlos Pires, que era ator, também. Ele escrevia 'Pires', na areia. E eu via. Enquanto isso ele ia falando: 'É sua ancestralidade. Você tem que carregar a sua ancestralidade'. Eu acordei enlouquecida", relatou. Em seguida, Cleo continuou: "Mandei para todo mundo, falei: 'Gente, vai voltar o Pires agora!'. Sempre quis ser só Cleo, porque eu sempre achei o meu nome único. Desde quando eu me imaginava artista, imaginava só Cleo. O Pires foi uma homenagem à minha família, à minha mãe, principalmente." A artista deixou de usar o sobrenome Pires em 2017. No carnaval de 2025, ela chegou a interromper um repórter da RedeTV! que cobria o carnaval após ele tê-la chamado de Cleo Pires: "É só Cleo", disse, algumas vezes. Relembre abaixo. GENTE? Cleo corrige repórter que a chamou de Cleo Pires no Carnaval: "É só Cleo". pic.twitter.com/eI15KExApq

title: سعر الذهب في الكويت اليوم الأحد 15 يونيو 2025 بالدينار والدولار الأمريكي
Mary Susan Dadisman
creator: Submitted to The Dominion Post
content: Mary Susan Dadisman, 83, of Morgantown, passed away Thursday, June 12, 2025. Mary Susan was born in Charleston, a daughter of the late Stanley E. Dadisman and Lucille Hymes Dadisman. A graduate of Morgantown High School, she dedicated her career to the Morgantown Public Library, where she was known not just for her love of books but for her congeniality, caring, and generous spirit she shared with patrons and colleagues. For many years, she was an active member of the Business and Professional Women’s Club (BPW) of Morgantown, where she held leadership roles that gave her the opportunity to travel throughout the state. Mary Susan was also a member of Wesley United Methodist Church in Morgantown. She is survived by her brother, George (Emily) Dadisman of Morgantown; and her niece, Sarah Elizabeth Dadisman of Cleveland, Ohio. She also leaves behind many friends from the library, the BPW, her church, and the wider Morgantown community. In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made to the Morgantown Public Library at https://www.mympls.org/get-involved/donate/ or by mailing a check to Morgantown Public Library, 373 Spruce Street, Morgantown, WV 26505. A private graveside service will be held at East Oak Grove Cemetery. A Celebration of Life will take place at a later date. Cremation arrangements have been entrusted to Hastings Funeral Home. Condolences may be sent to the family at www.hastingsfuneralhome.com

title: "Goliat", la tortuga gigante de Galápagos en el zoológico de Miami, se convierte en padre a los 134 años
creator: Jesús Bermúdez
content: La tortuga de las Galápagos "Goliat", el animal más longevo del Zoológico de Miami, celebrará doblemente el Día del Padre al cumplir su 134 aniversario y convertirse en padre por primera vez, anunció este viernes el zoológico.El animal fue testigo de la eclosión de su primer descendiente después de 128 días de incubación. El huevo, uno de los ocho puestos por la tortuga hembra "Sweet Pea" el 27 de enero, finalmente rompió su cáscara el 4 de junio, indicó un comunicado."Goliat", que pesa 235 kilos (517 libras), nació en la Isla Santa Cruz de Galápagos el 15 de junio de 1885 y llegó al Zoológico del Bronx en Nueva York el 23 de julio de 1929, antes de establecerse permanentemente en el Zoológico de Miami desde el 30 de julio de 1981.La madre, "Sweet Pea", debe de tener entre 85 y 100 años, habiendo llegado al antiguo Zoológico Crandon Park en Key Biscayne, Florida, en 1960, para trasladarse unos años después al zoológico de Miami.El padre primerizo más viejos del mundoAunque "Goliat" tuvo relaciones con varias hembras durante su estancia en el Zoológico de Miami, nunca logró engendrar crías, aclaró el zoológico.Tanto "Goliat" como "Sweet Pea" se encuentran bien en su hábitat público, mientras que la cría parece estar sana y ha sido retirada de la incubadora y colocada en un recinto separado, donde se mantiene activa y llena de energía.En la naturaleza, las crías están solas desde el momento en que emergen del huevo y sus padres ya no tienen...

title: ஜூன் 15: பெட்ரோல் விலை 100.80, டீசல் விலை 92.39 -க்கு விற்பனை!
content: சென்னை: பெட்ரோல் மற்றும் டீசல் விலை தினமும் மாற்றி அமைக்கப்படுகிறது. அதன் அடிப்படையில் இன்றைய பெட்ரோல் விலை லிட்டருக்கு 100.80 ஆகவும், டீசல் விலை லிட்டருக்கு 92.39 ஆகவும் நிர்ணயம், மற்றும் சிஎன்ஜி காஸ் விலை கிலோகிராம் 91.50 ஆக நிர்ணயம் செய்யப்பட்டுள்ளது. இந்த விலை இன்று காலை 6 மணி முதல் அமலுக்கு வந்தது.The post ஜூன் 15: பெட்ரோல் விலை 100.80, டீசல் விலை 92.39 -க்கு விற்பனை! appeared first on Dinakaran.

title: Senior leadership drives Dighton-Rehoboth's trip to claim back-to-back Div. 3 titles
creator: Taunton Daily Gazette
content: WORCESTER - If the Dighton-Rehoboth softball team's performance through five innings against Greater New Bedford Voc-Tech didn't secure them the Division 3 state championship already, Emma Horrocks' two-run homer in the bottom of the sixth certainly did.The senior cracked the ball over the fence in left field, a hit that warranted shouts of "that's outta here!" as soon as the bat made contact with the pitch.Around the bases she went, stepping across the plate for the Falcons' seventh and final run of the game.Dighton-Rehoboth is the Div. 3 state champion for a second season in a row, defeating No. 10 Greater New Bedford, 7-0, to claim its title once again.The two teams came into this matchup quite familiar with one another. The Falcons beat GNB Voc-Tech twice (4-0 on April 28, 15-1 on May 10) this regular season as members of the South Coast Conference. Even with the two wins under its belt against this particular opponent, Dighton-Rehoboth was not walking in overly confident. There was still plenty of competitive softball to be played. "We say every year, 'You hate to play a team three times.' It's really hard to beat a team three times and we knew that they have been having an incredible run this year and this postseason," Falcons' coach Katie Catarius-Holmes said of GNB Voc-Tech.Regardless, Dighton-Rehoboth adjusted and reacted well to its competition, only allowing one run over its three games played against the Bears. The Falcons played steady to defend their title. In...

title: Carrera IPD 5K el Papa es Peruano tiene más de dos mil inscritos
creator: Carlos Lara
content: La población se movió y se apuntó. La “Carrera IPD 5K el Papa es Peruano” que organiza el Instituto Peruano del Deporte (IPD) como parte de su 44 aniversario ha tenido una espectacular acogida al punto que en cuestión de horas ya hay más de dos mil inscritos, lo que augura un éxito total de esta jornada deportiva programada para el 29 de junio. “En cuestión de tres o cuatro horas tenemos más de dos mil inscritos. Nos emociona ser parte de este evento lleno de energía y fervor”, señaló Federico Tong, presidente del IPD . La “Carrera IPD 5K el Papa es Peruano” tendrá como punto de partida la puerta 4 del emblemático Estadio Nacional, desde las 6.00 de la mañana, en un recorrido por la avenida Arequipa y que culminará en la explanada sur, donde niños, jóvenes, adultos y familias enteras podrán disfrutar de muchas sorpresas preparadas para el fin del evento. Las inscripciones para la carrera es de forma gratuita y lo pueden hacer a través del siguiente link: https://appweb.ipd.gob.pe/ipd5k/web/ . La entrega de kits será el 28 de junio de 9.00 am a 5.00 pm en la explanada sur del Estadio Nacional. Esta jornada deportiva, que también coincide con el Día de San Pedro y San Pablo, tiene como objetivo promover el deporte, celebrar la peruanidad y la integración comunitaria. El IPD acaba de celebrar su 44 aniversario con el firme objetivo de masificar y desarrollar el deporte y paradeporte en el país; fortaleciendo el Sistema Deportivo Nacional con acciones...

title: Parade und Proteste: „No Kings“: Landesweite Proteste gegen Trump
content: Bei der bisher größten Protestwelle gegen die Politik von Präsident Donald Trump sind Menschen quer durch die USA auf die Straße gegangen. Die Veranstalter sprachen von mehr als fünf Millionen Teilnehmern in über 2.100 Städten am Tag von Trumps Militärparade in Washington. Die Demonstrationen liefen am Samstag unter dem Motto „No Kings“ (Keine Könige). Die Teilnehmenden warfen Trump autoritäres Auftreten vor und kritisierten seine Migrationspolitik mit den großangelegten Abschiebeaktionen. Tränengas in Los Angeles Die Proteste blieben überwiegend friedlich. In der Innenstadt von Los Angeles heizte sich die Lage aber zum Nachmittag auf. An einem Behördengebäude wurde Tränengas eingesetzt, um Demonstranten zurückzudrängen. Nach Angaben der Polizei wurden aus der Menge Steine und Flaschen geworfen. In New York wurden mehrere Protestierende festgenommen, wie der Sender CNN berichtete. Im Bundesstaat Minnesota wurde der Protest nach Attentaten auf zwei Politiker der Demokratischen Partei abgesagt. Trump ließ derweil am Samstag eine Militärparade in Washington veranstalten. Anlass ist der 250. Gründungstag des US-Heers. Doch es ist auch der 79. Geburtstag des US-Präsidenten. Umfragen zufolge ist ein Großteil der US-Bevölkerung gegen die Parade. Die Teilnehmenden warfen Trump autoritäres Auftreten vor und kritisierten seine Migrationspolitik mit den großangelegten Abschiebeaktionen. Tränengas in Los Angeles Die Proteste blieben überwiegend friedlich. In der Innenstadt von Los Angeles heizte sich die Lage aber zum Nachmittag auf. An einem Behördengebäude wurde Tränengas eingesetzt, um Demonstranten zurückzudrängen. Nach Angaben der Polizei wurden aus der Menge Steine und Flaschen geworfen. In New York wurden mehrere Protestierende festgenommen, wie der Sender CNN berichtete. Im Bundesstaat Minnesota wurde der Protest nach Attentaten auf zwei Politiker der Demokratischen Partei abgesagt. Trump ließ derweil am Samstag eine Militärparade in Washington veranstalten. Anlass ist der 250. Gründungstag des US-Heers. Doch es ist auch der 79. Geburtstag des US-Präsidenten. Umfragen zufolge ist ein Großteil der US-Bevölkerung gegen die Parade. In Trumps Republikanischer Partei dagegen findet sie Zustimmung. «So sieht Demokratie aus» Bei den Anti-Trump-Protesten trotzten in New York Tausende Demonstranten dem Regen. Laut ersten Schätzungen der Organisatoren...

title: Friends discover a bear in the back seat of their car ... and she wanted out
creator: Indianapolis Star
content: Nick Trout and Caden Sims heard a car horn honking a few times outside their cabin early Saturday morning, but they didn't think much of it. People honk their car horns. They had no idea .... Then, as they were in the kitchen ready to make breakfast for their crew -- nine former Pendleton Heights High School athletes who decided to take a summer trip together to Gatlinburg -- Trout tapped Sims on the shoulder. "Look, there's a baby cub out on this tree," he said to Sims. The two walked onto the balcony to get a better look at the miniature-sized grizzly. Still, they had no idea ... "Then I looked to my right, and I noticed that Trout's car is shaking. And so I'm thinking, 'What is going on?'" said Sims, 19, who will be a sophomore at Wabash University in the fall. "And then I hear the car horn go." What was going on inside Nick's car? Who was honking his horn? Who was big enough to make a car shake? From the balcony, Sims could see through the front windshield. Something was in the back seat of that car. He went down to check it out, and that's when he saw what seemed inexplicable. Unbelievable. A bear in the back seat. And she wanted out. "First off, I'm thinking, 'How did the bear get in there?' And then my second thought is, 'How am I going to get this bear out?' said Sims. He quickly shot a video of the bear to show Trout and the rest of the guys who, by this time, were all out of bed and going crazy. Unfortunately, Trout knew what he had to do. He had to get that bear...

title: Jean McKee
creator: Submitted to The Dominion Post
content: Jean “Allyson” McKee passed away Thursday, June 12, 2025, in WVU Hospital, following a brief illness. Born November 1, 1947, in Pasadena, Md., she was the daughter of the late John Ellison Stallings and Audrey Cooper Stallings. Family left to cherish her memory are her husband, Clark McKee; children, Lisa (Jeff) Wotring and Sean Mckee; grandchildren, Devan Moran (Erika), Tyler Moran (John) and Loryn (Alex) Mayle; her brother, John (Margaret) Stallings; and nephews, Ryan and Drew Stallings. She was preceded in death by her father (1960) and mother (2008). During her childhood, after her father’s untimely passing, her mother singlehandedly provided for the family and proudly guided Allyson through those challenges, ultimately instilling a sense of independence, grit and fortitude. A 1965 graduate of Severna Park High School, their close proximity to Ocean City spawned her love for seafood, which became a theme at many family gatherings throughout the years. Allyson completed her undergraduate in 1969 with a degree in Zoology from West Virginia University. The next year she and her husband, Clark married June 20, 1970, West Virginia Day. She later obtained a Master’s degree of Library Science in 1972 from the University of Pittsburgh and began her career at WVU libraries in acquisitions spanning over 40 years until her retirement in 2015. Upon retirement, she continued her passion of learning through OLLI programs and became fervently involved with many other charitable...

title: Woori Financial Chairman Faces Test of Organizational Culture Integration
creator: onej@chosunbiz.com (Han Jae-hee)
content: Woori Financial Group Chairman Lim Jong-ryong has realized his long-cherished goal of reentering the insurance business through the acquisition of Tongyang Life and ABL Life. Now, attention turns to whether he can complete the transformation of Woori into a fully-fledged financial holding company. With conditional regulatory approval granted, the group must implement internal control reforms and a long-term capital management plan—while tackling the significant challenge of integrating the newly acquired insurers. It typically takes two to three years for new affiliates to generate synergy within a financial group, a timeline that coincides with the remainder of Lim’s current term, further fueling interest in the outcome. According to financial industry sources on June 15, Woori Financial Group is set to finalize the integration of Tongyang Life and ABL Life as group affiliates on July 1. The final payment for the acquisition will be made, and the insurers will hold shareholder meetings to appoint new CEOs. Sung Dae-kyu, head of Woori’s insurance acquisition task force, will take the helm at Tongyang Life, while former Shinhan Financial Plus CEO Kwak Hee-pil will lead ABL Life. This marks the official entry of life insurers into the Woori Financial family. Chairman Lim’s strategy—long focused on diversifying Woori’s business portfolio and reducing its heavy reliance on banking revenue—is now materializing. Among Korea’s four major financial groups (KB, Shinhan, Hana, and...

title: Quedó eliminado del Mundial 2026, muchos lo repudiaron y ahora quiere volver a Argentina
content: Chile quedó fuera del Mundial 2026 y quien se vio afectado por los resultados fue Ricardo Gareca. El entrenador argentino fue despedido tras no conseguir la hazaña y rápidamente sus declaraciones pasadas sobre su deseo de regresar a Argentina salieron a la luz. Resulta que el experimentado DT había mencionado que le gustaría dirigir a Talleres de Córdoba, teniendo una nueva experiencia en el futbol argentino, al igual que Fernando Gago, DT que regresó a la Liga BBVA MX tras su paso por Boca Juniors. “Si en algún momento se da la posibilidad de volver a Talleres lo pensaría sin problemas. Tengo una historia fuerte en Talleres”, había mencionado Gareca en una charla que tuvo en ‘La Mesa del Fútbol’. Sin embargo, eso no es todo, ya que hace unos años atrás, el ‘Tigre’ había expuesto su deseo de dirigir Boca Juniors, equipo que hoy podría perder un refuerzo a manos de Toluca . ¿Qué había dicho Gareca al respecto? EFE Ricardo Gareca sueña con regresar a Argentina. “Si puedo llegar a Boca en un futuro puede ser muy difícil porque han pasado técnicos. Yo estuve 5 años en Vélez, ganamos 4 campeonatos, peleamos siempre arriba y nunca tuve la posibilidad de dirigir a Boca y a River”, había declarado el exentrenador de Chile con la prensa argentina, dejando la posibilidad abierta de llegar al ‘Xeneize’ en un futuro. No obstante, los argentinos recientemente ficharon a Miguel Russo, por lo que sería poco probable su llegada. TE PUEDE INTERESAR: Fue campeón en...

title: SEC Powerhouse Flaunts Multiple Lamborghinis During Recruiting Event

content: SEC Powerhouse Flaunts Multiple Lamborghinis During Recruiting Event originally appeared on Athlon Sports.College football programs pull out all the stops to gain an edge on the recruiting trail. No one signed a better class in the 2025 cycle than Texas, as head coach Steve Sarkisian and the Longhorns followed a second consecutive College Football Playoff appearance with the nation's No. 1 high school class. There is some ground to make up for the SEC power in the 2026 class, though, and this weekend serves as a key point in the cycle with multiple highly-coveted recruits on campus. The star-studded group of visitors includes a pair of uncommitted five-stars in offensive tackle Felix Ojo and EDGE Xavier Griffin. Additionally, four-stars like offensive lineman Zaden Krempin, cornerback Samari Matthews and wide receiver Jalen Lott are visiting the Longhorns, per On3's Chad Simmons. title: Realizan quinta megajornada médica en El Furrial
creator: Estrella Velandia
content: Este sábado 14 de junio, la alcaldesa del municipio Maturín, Ana Fuentes, estuvo presente en la quinta megajornada social realizada en la parroquia El Furrial, por orientaciones del presidente Nicolás Maduro, a través de la Vicepresidencia Sectorial de Política, Seguridad Ciudadana y Paz y el Ministerio del Poder Popular para las Relaciones Interiores, Justicia y Paz.Durante la jornada la Alcaldesa anunció que se han beneficiado 1.800 abuelos en todas las jornadas realizadas con atención médica, entrega de medicamentos y prótesis dentales.Más de 50 instituciones tanto nacionales, estadales y municipales se han sumado para llevar más beneficios a la comunidad de El Furrial.La megajornada se efectuó bajo la coordinación del coronel de la Fuerza Armada Nacional Bolivariana (FANB), Luis Fernández Abreu.La actividad contó con el despliegue de las Áreas de Salud Integral Comunitaria (ACIS), así como con servicios de alimentación, asesorías legales, recreación para niños y jóvenes, y protección para los adultos mayores.El Ministerio del Poder Popular para el Servicio Penitenciario (MPPSP) orientó a niños y jóvenes sobre ciudadanía, además de disfrutar de espacios recreativos, castillos inflables y recreación.La alcaldesa agradeció a Diosdado Cabello, quien en su responsabilidad como Ministro de Interior y Justicia y Paz ha contribuido al apoyo constante de la comunidad de El Furrial.«Agradecemos a Diosdado Cabello, quien ha venido dando todo el apoyo...

title: New wave of Iranian missiles intercepted in the skies above Amman
creator: Canadian Press Videos
content: A new wave of missiles were seen being intercepted in the sky above Jordan's capital early on Sunday, as Tehran unleashed a fresh barrage. Israel, meanwhile, launched an expanded assault on Iran on Sunday, with direct strikes targeting its energy industry and Defense Ministry headquarters. The simultaneous strikes represented the latest salvo since a surprise attack by Israel two days earlier aimed at decimating Tehran’s rapidly advancing nuclear program.(AP Video: Omar Akour)

title: Familias en crisis: un enfoque integral
content: Vivimos en un mundo competitivo, donde los problemas sociales adquieren una relevancia creciente en el ejercicio profesional de cada disciplina. Desde esta perspectiva, deseo compartir mi punto de vista sobre el enfoque del Trabajo Social en familias afectadas por la violencia doméstica y el consumo de sustancias ilícitas. El Trabajo Social, como profesión comprometida con el bienestar humano y la justicia social, desempeña un papel fundamental en la intervención con núcleos familiares que enfrentan esta situación. La violencia doméstica y el consumo de sustancias ilícitas son dos fenómenos que, aunque pueden presentarse de manera independiente, a menudo se entrelazan en muchas familias, generando un círculo vicioso de sufrimiento, desestructuración y vulnerabilidad. Desde mi perspectiva como estudiante de la Maestría en Trabajo Social Jurídico Forense, considero que nuestro rol frente a estas situaciones debe ser profundamente humano, ético y profesional, con un enfoque centrado en la familia como sistema y en la promoción de los derechos humanos. En primer lugar, es importante reconocer que el consumo de drogas no solo afecta al individuo que las consume, sino que sus repercusiones impactan directamente en todo el entorno familiar. Las adicciones alteran la percepción, el control emocional y la conducta, lo que puede desencadenar situaciones de maltrato físico, psicológico o económico dentro del hogar. La violencia doméstica, en estos casos, suele ser...

title: Ισραήλ-Ιράν: Η ΕΕ εκφράζει ξανά την «έντονη ανησυχία» της
creator: info@newsbomb.gr (Newsroom)
content: Η Ευρωπαϊκή Ένωση ανέφερε χθες πως είναι «πολύ ανήσυχη» κι επανέλαβε την έκκλησή της για αποκλιμάκωση και τήρηση του διεθνούς δικαίου χθες Σάββατο, τη δεύτερη μέρα της άνευ προηγουμένου επίθεσης του Ισραήλ εναντίον του Ιράν, που ακολουθήθηκε από αλλεπάλληλες ομοβροντίες πυραύλων από ιρανικής πλευράς . Σε ανακοίνωσή τους, οι 27 χώρες μέλη εκφράζουν «τη βαθύτατη ανησυχία τους μπροστά στην επικίνδυνη κλιμάκωση που απειλεί να αποσταθεροποιήσει τη Μέση Ανατολή μετά τα ισραηλινά πλήγματα στο Ιράν και την ανταπόδοση του Ιράν». «Η ΕΕ επαναβεβαιώνει τη σθεναρή δέσμευσή της στην περιφερειακή ασφάλεια, συμπεριλαμβανομένης της ασφάλειας του κράτους του Ισραήλ», συνεχίζει το κείμενο, που δημοσιοποιήθηκε από τις υπηρεσίες της επικεφαλής της ευρωπαϊκής διπλωματίας Κάγιας Κάλας εξ ονόματος του ευρωπαϊκού συμβουλίου. Οι 27 καλούν «όλα τα μέρη να τηρήσουν το διεθνές δίκαιο, να ασκήσουν αυτοσυγκράτηση και να απέχουν από οποιοδήποτε νέο μέτρο που θα μπορούσε να οδηγήσει σε πολύ σοβαρές συνέπειες, όπως η έκλυση ραδιενέργειας». Διακηρυγμένος στόχος των στρατιωτικών επιχειρήσεων του Ισραήλ είναι να καταστραφούν οι στρατιωτικές και πυρηνικές δυνατότητες της Ισλαμικής Δημοκρατίας, ορκισμένου εχθρού του εβραϊκού κράτους. Προχθές Παρασκευή ισραηλινοί αεροπορικοί βομβαρδισμοί έπληξαν πάνω από 200 στρατιωτικές και πυρηνικές εγκαταστάσεις και σκότωσαν πολλούς ανώτατους...

title: Nick Sirianni holds back on naming the Eagles' next starting right guard
creator: Kelsey Kramer, A to Z Sports
content: The Philadelphia Eagles are in search of a new starting right guard after losing Mekhi Becton to free agency this past March. Tyler Steen has been taking first-team reps during open media sessions, but that doesn’t mean the job is his just yet. Head coach Nick Sirianni made that clear during the team's one-day mandatory minicamp, noting that they won't be able to truly evaluate until pads come on. "Yeah, again, just I know we talked yesterday too, don’t have to make any of those decisions quite yet," Sirianni said. "We have a lot of football to practice, a lot of football to play, and obviously, a big part of the offensive line and the evaluation of the offensive line comes in pads. That doesn’t mean we’re not evaluating them like crazy right now, but a big part of that’s going to come when we put the pads on." Steen was in the running for the starting right guard job last offseason but ended up losing out to Becton, who locked down the role heading into the year. Even with that setback, the Eagles still liked what they saw in Steen and used last season as a chance to let him develop and get more comfortable at the NFL level. Now, heading into Year 3, Steen is back in the mix, and this time, he's the early favorite. But nothing’s guaranteed. The former third-round pick out of Vanderbilt will need to show he’s taken that next step, especially with guys like Matt Pryor, Kenyon Green, and Trevor Keegan all gunning for the same spot. It’s shaping up to be a pretty competitive...

title: Kimmich about Sané's move to Galatasaray and Bayern's potential transfer plans
creator: Bulinews
content: Bayern Munich will play their first game in the brand new FIFA Club World Cup on June 15th at 6pm CET against Auckland City. Bayern were able to assemble their full squad on Friday - including Leroy Sané who will leave the Bavarians on the 1st of July, when he joins his new club Galatasaray Istanbul. Teammate Joshua Kimmich was surprised by the destination of his long-time colleague: “I was surprised that he's going to Turkey. I didn't expect that. But it's his decision and he'll have his reasons for it.” Kimmich also talked about Bayern's potential plans for the upcoming transfer window: “You'll have to ask the club about concrete plans; of course, you get the feeling that we could do something - with Flo (Wirtz) not coming, with Leroy (Sané) and Thomas (Müller) leaving...” Bayern are reportedly interested in bringing in a new winger for the 2025/26 season. The preferred candidates, according to Sky Germany, are Athletic Bilbao's Nico Williams, AC Milan's Rafael Leão and PSG's Bradley Barcola. Tom Bischof and Jonathan Tah are the only new Bayern Munich transfers so far - both are also included in the official squad for the FIFA Club World Cup and will most likely give their debut for Bayern in this competition.

title: Muere Violeta Barrios, primer mujer presidenta en América
creator: Cambio de Michoacán
content: San José, Costa Rica.- Violeta Barrios de Chamorro falleció este 14 de junio a los 95 años de edad en Costa Rica; en 1990 se convirtió en la primera mujer electa presidenta de Nicaragua y en el continente americano.De acuerdo con medios internacionales, Barrios sufrió una embolia cerebral en 2018, había abandonado la vida pública a causa de un tumor en la cabeza y dolencias posteriores. En octubre de 2023 y bajo permanente asistencia medica fue trasladada a Costa Rica, donde residen sus tres hijos exiliados: Cristiana, Pedro Joaquín y Carlos Fernando Chamorro Barrios.“Doña Violeta falleció en paz, rodeada del cariño y del amor de sus hijos y de las personas que le brindaron un cuido extraordinario, y ahora se encuentra en la paz del Señor”, informaron sus familiares en un comunicado. Asimismo, revelaron que se buscará regresar los restos de la expresidenta desde Costa Rica a su patria Nicaragua, pero no hasta que su “legado patriótico pueda ser honrado en un país libre y democrático“.Sus hijos agradecieron las oraciones y solidaridad de la gente en este momento de luto:¿Quién fue Violeta Barrios de Chamorro? Violeta Barrios nació el 18 octubre de 1929 en el departamento nicaragüense de Rivas, luego de realizar estudios en Estados Unidos, se casó con Pedro Joaquim Chamorro Cardenal, director del periódico ‘La Prensa’, desde donde se lanzaba constantemente una crítica a la dictadura de la familia Somoza, que la obligó a exiliarse en 1957 en Costa...

title: Antes e depois de Maya Massafera: influenciadora muda a cor dos olhos com procedimento e proibido no Brasil. 'Melhor que eu esperava'
creator: Purepeople BR
content: Maya Massafera não dispensa procedimentos estéticos para estar sempre de bem consigo mesma . Porém, a influenciadora que causou com uma opinião um tanto polêmica sobre magreza , resolveu apostar em uma técnica proibida no Brasil para a mudança da cor dos seus olhos . De acordo com informações do colunista Leo Dias, Maya Massafera apostou em uma cirurgia chamada ceratopigmentação , também conhecida como tatuagem da córnea , para trocar a cor dos seus olhos castanhos para verde. A influenciadora teria feito o procedimento há cerca de duas semanas e já estaria completamente recuperada . O procedimento foi realizado em Londres, na Inglaterra, onde Maya irá morar de agora em diante para completar um mestrado em moda, que é um dos seus sonhos. Muito comentada por seus looks em eventos , a famosa não anunciou a mudança em suas redes sociais. No entanto, segundo Leo Dias, a famosa comentou sutilmente sobre o procedimento, mas sem dar detalhes: " Esses dias atrás, fiz uma cirurgia plástica que queria muito. Já estou ótima e, assim que mostrar, vocês vão amar. Estava bem ansiosa e o resultado ficou melhor que esperava ", disse Maya Massafera, segundo o jornalista. Veja o antes e depois da famosa com o novo visual acessando a galeria! Muita gente não sabe, mas a cirurgia para a mudança da cor dos olhos, que teria sido realizada por Maya Massafera, não é permitida para fins estéticos no Brasil, onde apenas pessoas com cegueira permanente podem... Veja mais...

title: Aaron Judge gets stunning reception at Fenway Park
creator: Darryn Albert, Larry Brown Sports
content: Aaron Judge ’s aura is on a completely different level right now. The New York Yankees superstar Judge received a stunning reception during Saturday’s game against the Boston Red Sox. Judge stepped up to the plate in the first inning against Red Sox starter Hunter Dobbins at Fenway Park in Boston, Mass. and received audible “MVP” chants from the crowd. The loud chants could be heard on the FOX national television broadcast. Take a look at the hard-to-believe video below. MVP chants have broken out for Aaron Judge at Fenway Park pic.twitter.com/OVX3MSmXew Those were obviously traveling Yankees fans who had taken over Fenway Park rather than Red Sox fans. But that was still an absolutely flooring spectacle to witness at the home ballpark of the Yankees’ most hated rivals. Judge, now a two-time AL MVP winner, certainly deserves those chants and more right now. While he would go on to strike out during his first at-bat on Saturday, Judge entered play hitting a monstrous .390 on the year with a 1.265 OPS. His 26 home runs and 99 hits lead all major-leaguers, and Judge has rounded out his season-long stat line with an AL-leading 65 RBIs and 60 runs scored too. When it comes to the opposition, Judge continues to receive the Barry Bonds treatment as well . Now the six-time MLB All-Star Judge has managed to do something even more unbelievable by receiving “MVP” chants at Fenway Park as the star of the New York Yankees. This article first appeared on Larry Brown Sports and was...

title: 法國總統馬克龍今日訪問格陵蘭
content: 法國總統馬克龍今日將會訪問格陵蘭,是美國總統特朗普提出要得到格陵蘭的控制權之後,首位到訪當地的外國領袖。 馬克龍將會前往格陵蘭首府努克,視察一個由歐盟資助的水力發電站、參觀當地的冰川、以及與格陵蘭政府高層官員會面。 馬克龍的一名顧問被問到,會否藉此行向美國傳達明確訊息時表示,此行本身就是一個表態,但沒有點名美國或特朗普。 格陵蘭自治政府總理尼爾森早前表示,自從出現奪取格陵蘭控制權的言論以來,法國一直對格陵蘭表達支持,尼爾森認為這種支持是必須,並對法方表示感謝。

title: 馬時亨稱中東與東盟市場貿易增長迅速 香港要有新思維「走出去」
content: 貿發局新任主席馬時亨表示,美國總統特朗普的政策措施為全球經貿造成很大影響,減低營商確定性及投資意欲,不利經濟發展,但對香港有危也必有機。 馬時亨在一個電台節目說,香港對進出口貨品不設關稅,作為國家和全世界的超級聯繫人,角色非常重要,現時由香港出口至美國的商品逐漸減少,同時特區政府正開發中東與東盟市場,近年與這些地區貿易增長迅速,需要有新思維「走出去」,部署在新市場加大資源。 他指出,上任後隨即要求貿發局團隊根據現時香港貿易和出口貨品情況,研究發掘新興市場的方向,例如非洲人口多、部分國家經濟發展理想,可探討當地發展空間,為中小企的供應鏈及產業鏈提供協助。 馬時亨說,香港正發展烈酒貿易分銷中心,明年亞洲金融論壇將考慮舉行相關產業討論環節,與其他地區人士和業界持分者交流。

title: The women at the centre of Somalia's construction boom
creator: BBC
content: Construction is booming in Somalia's capital city and as Mogadishu literally rises from the ashes of its violent past it is also giving unexpected opportunities to women like Fathi Mohamed Abdi and Saadia Ahmed Omar. The two young female engineers have been overseeing the construction of a 10-floor apartment complex in Taleh in the city's Hodan District. Wearing hard hats they navigate their way through construction material, issuing instructions to a team of workers - all of whom are men. "When I started, people doubted me," 24-year-old Ms Abdi, the chief operating officer of Arkan Engineering Services, a Somali-owned construction company, tells the BBC. "They would ask, 'How can we trust a house built by a woman? How can I trust my money and property with a young female engineer?'" She and her colleague Ms Omar have been practising engineers for the last five years. "Mogadishu needs us," says Ms Omar, who is also 24. "When I was young, this city was in chaos. Now, we are part of its reconstruction." Somalia, a former Italian colony, has experienced a prolonged period of civil war after the government of President Siad Barre collapsed in January 1991. Even now, scars of decades of war are still visible - like in the central district of Shangani where there are bombed-out buildings. But the ruins are becoming hidden or replaced by tall office complexes and apartments, and a skyline dotted with cranes and scaffolding. Both young women were born during the civil war and grew...

title: Victoria Beckham dedica emotivo mensaje a su esposo tras reciente reconocimiento del Rey Carlos III
Dorival toma decisão que pode impactar futuro de Igor Coronado no Corinthians
creator: Gávea News
content: A ausência de Igor Coronado nas últimas partidas do Corinthians , aliada à indefinição sobre seu futuro, evidencia um cenário de incertezas para o meio-campista. Afinal, o jogador não entrou em campo nas últimas três rodadas do Campeonato Brasileiro e, embora esteja fisicamente apto, foi preterido por Dorival Júnior. A situação se torna ainda mais sensível com a proximidade da janela de transferências do meio do ano, que poderá ser a última oportunidade para o clube obter algum retorno financeiro com o atleta. Atualmente com 32 anos, Coronado tem contrato até 14 de fevereiro de 2026. Contudo, a sequência de lesões desde sua chegada ao clube impediu que ele se firmasse no elenco. Em 2024, uma lesão na coxa direita e uma infecção por dengue o afastaram do time, além de dores no quadril que o limitaram ainda mais. Assim, seu concorrente direto, Garro, consolidou-se como titular, diminuindo ainda mais as chances do camisa 77. Conforme relatado, Coronado iniciou 2025 como titular, mas perdeu espaço nos jogos decisivos do Paulistão e da Libertadores. Em março, uma lesão no tendão do músculo adutor da perna direita o deixou fora por quase todo o mês. Ainda assim, Dorival justificou sua ausência recente apenas por critério técnico, afirmando: "Foi uma opção minha, apenas isso, em razão dos trabalhos que estamos desenvolvendo". Aliás, mesmo em um cenário de desfalques, como na partida contra o Grêmio , quando Carrillo e Depay estavam fora, o...

title: Gennaro Gattuso será el nuevo seleccionador de Italia tras salida de Spalletti
creator: NOTICIAS DE HOY
content: La Federación Italiana de Fútbol (FIGC) se prepara para anunciar a Gennaro Gattuso como el nuevo director técnico de la selección absoluta, en sustitución de Luciano Spalletti. Así lo confirmó Gianluigi Buffon, jefe de la delegación del organismo, en declaraciones a la cadena estatal RAI . “Hemos trabajado, ahora estamos esperando los últimos detalles” , declaró Buffon durante su presencia en la Eurocopa Sub-21 , al ser cuestionado sobre la inminente llegada de Gattuso al banquillo azzurro. “El presidente y toda la federación han tenido días muy ocupados, pero creo que al final tomamos la mejor decisión” , añadió. La salida de Spalletti se produjo tras menos de dos años al frente del equipo nacional. Su último compromiso fue la victoria 2-0 ante Moldavia , aunque el contexto fue complicado: el técnico había presentado su renuncia un día antes, luego de la dura derrota 3-0 frente a Noruega en el inicio de las eliminatorias para la Copa del Mundo 2026. TE PUEDE INTERESAR: Daniel Suárez hace historia en México: remonta y gana la carrera de NASCAR Xfinity Gattuso , de 46 años, tiene una trayectoria reconocida tanto como futbolista como entrenador. Disputó 73 encuentros con la selección italiana y fue parte del equipo que conquistó el Mundial de Alemania 2006 . En su carrera como técnico ha dirigido a equipos como el Milan, Napoli y Valencia . Su etapa más reciente fue con el Hajduk Split de Croacia , club que dejó de manera consensuada tras finalizar...

title: កម្ពុជាជ្រើសរើសយកច្បាប់អន្តរជាតិ និង សន្តិភាព
creator: sopha kol
content: ថ្ងៃនេះ ទី១៥ មិថុនា ឆ្នាំ២០២៥ រាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលកម្ពុជាបានបញ្ជូនលិខិតជាផ្លូវការទៅកាន់តុលាការយុត្តិធម៌អន្តរជាតិ (ICJ) ដើម្បីជួយស្វែងរកដំណោះស្រាយពាក់ព័ន្ធទៅនឹងបញ្ហាវិវាទព្រំដែននៅតំបន់ប្រាសាទតាមាន់ធំ ប្រាសាទតាមាន់តូច ប្រាសាទតាក្របី និងតំបន់មុំបី។ គាប់ជួនផងដែរ កាលពី ៦៣ឆ្នាំមុន នៅថ្ងៃទី១៥ ខែមិថុនា ឆ្នាំ១៩៦២ គឺជាថ្ងៃប្រវត្តិសាស្ត្រដែលតុលាការយុត្តិធម៌អន្តរជាតិ (ICJ) បានសម្រេចឲ្យកម្ពុជាឈ្នះលើរឿងក្តីប្រាសាទព្រះវិហារ។ ទោះបីជាព្រឹត្តិការណ៍ទាំងពីរនេះកើតឡើង ៦៣ឆ្នាំខុសពីគ្នាក៏ពិតមែន ប៉ុន្តែស្មារតី និងគោលបំណងគឺដូចគ្នា÷ គឺកម្ពុជាជ្រើសរើសយកការដោះស្រាយ ដោយសន្តិវិធី ផ្អែកលើច្បាប់អន្តរជាតិ តាមរយៈយន្តការតុលាការយុត្តិធម៌អន្តរជាតិ ICJ សម្រាប់ការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាព្រំដែននៅតំបន់ដែលមានលក្ខណៈស្មុគស្មាញខ្លាំង និងមានហានិភ័យខ្ពស់នៃជម្លោះប្រដាប់អាវុធ ហើយដែលយន្តការទ្វេភាគីមិនអាចដោះស្រាយចប់ ដូចជានៅតំបន់ប្រាសាទព្រះវិហារកាលពីជាង៦០ឆ្នាំមុន និងតំបន់ប្រាសាទតាមាន់ធំ ប្រាសាទតាមាន់តូច ប្រាសាទតាក្របី និងតំបន់មុំបី នាពេលបច្ចុប្បន្ន។ កម្ពុជាត្រូវការតែយុត្តិធម៌ ភាពត្រឹមត្រូវ និងច្បាស់លាស់មួយ ក្នុងការកំណត់ខ្សែព្រំដែនជាមួយប្រទេសជិតខាង ដើម្បីកុំអោយកូនចៅជំនាន់ក្រោយនៅបន្តមានបញ្ហាមិនចេះចប់ជាមួយគ្នា។ សូមបងប្អូនជនរួមជាតិទាំងអស់ ផ្ដល់ការទុកចិត្តមកលើរាជរដ្ឋាភិបាល ក្នុងការខិតខំប្រឹងប្រែងធ្វើកិច្ចការងារនេះប្រកបដោយឆន្ទៈនិងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ ដើម្បីការពារបូរណភាពទឹកដី និងឧត្តមប្រយោជន៍របស់ជាតិនិងប្រជាជនកម្ពុជា៕ ដោយ៖ សូរិយា

title: చట్టసభ సభ్యులే లక్ష్యంగా అమెరికాలో కాల్పులు.. మిన్నెసోటా ప్రతినిధి, ఆమె భర్త మృతి
content: అగ్రరాజ్యం అమెరికాలో చట్టసభ సభ్యులను లక్ష్యంగా చేసుకుని దుండుగుడు కాల్పులకు పాల్పడ్డాడు. ఈ ఘటనలో మిన్నెసోటా స్టేట్ రిప్రజెంటేటివ్ మెలిస్సా హర్ట్‌మన్, ఆమె భర్త మార్క్ మృతిచెందారు. ఈ ఘటనలో మరో నేత జాన్ హఫ్‌మన్, ఆయన భార్య కూడా గాయపడ్డారు. ఈ కాల్పులను రాజకీయ హత్యలుగా అనుమానిస్తున్నారు. పోలీసు అధికారి వేషంలో వచ్చిన వ్యక్తి ఈ దాడులకు పాల్పడినట్లు భావిస్తున్నారు. ఈ ఘటనను రాజకీయ హత్యలుగా మిన్నెసోటా గవర్నర్ టిమ్ వాల్జ్ అభివర్ణించారు. నిందితుడి కోసం పోలీసులు గాలిస్తున్నారని ఆయన తెలిపారు. అటు, ఈ కాల్పులను ఖండించిన అమెరికా అధ్యక్షుడు డొనాల్డ్ ట్రంప్.. ఇది "భయంకరమైన సంఘటన అని అన్నారు. ఎఫ్‌బీఐ ఈ ఘటనపై దర్యాప్తు చేస్తుందని ఆయన తెలిపారు. డెమొక్రటిక్ నేత మెలిస్సా హర్ట్‌మన్ గతంలో స్పీకర్‌గా పనిచేశారు. ఆమె 2004లో మొదటిసారి చట్టసభలో అడుగుపెట్టారు. హర్ట్‌మన్ దంపతులకు ఇద్దరు పిల్లలు ఉన్నారు. వారు బ్రూక్లిన్ పార్క్‌లో నివసిస్తున్నారు. చాంప్లిన్, బ్రూక్లిన్ పార్క్‌లోని వారి ఇళ్ల వద్ద ఈ కాల్పులు జరిగాయి. స్టేట్ సెనెటర్ జాన్ హఫ్‌మన్, ఆయన భార్యకు తీవ్ర గాయాలయ్యాయి. వారిని ఆసుపత్రికి తరలించారు. పోలీసులు కేసు నమోదు చేసుకుని దర్యాప్తు చేస్తున్నారు. మెలిస్సా దంపతులు. మిన్నెసోటా స్టేట్ సెనేటర్ జాన్ హాఫ్‌మన్, ఆయన భార్యపై కూడా కాల్పులు జరిపిన వాన్స్ బోయెల్టర్ అనే అనుమానితుడి కోసం పోలీసులు గాలిస్తున్నారు. హాఫ్‌మన్ దంపతులు ప్రస్తుతం ఆసుపత్రిలో చికిత్స పొందుతున్నారని అధికారులు తెలిపారు. అనుమానితుడు బోయెల్టర్ కారులో దాదాపు 70 మంది పేర్లతో కూడిన ఒక జాబితా లభించిందని, అందులో ఇతర ప్రజాప్రతినిధులు, అబార్షణ సేవలందించే డాక్టర్లు ఉన్నారని ఒక పోలీసు అధికారి వెల్లడించారు. ఈ దాడుల్లో మరెవరైనా పాల్గొన్నారా? అన్న...

title: В международном конкурсе Рахманинова примут участие представители 16 стран
content: Москва. 15 июня. INTERFAX.RU - Более 500 заявок из 25 стран поступило на II Международный конкурс пианистов, композиторов и дирижёров имени Сергея Рахманинова, который стартовал в субботу в Москве, участие в конкурсе примут представители 16 стран, сообщила министр культуры РФ Ольга Любимова. "Приняла участие в открытии II Международного конкурса пианистов, композиторов и дирижёров имени Сергея Васильевича Рахманинова (...) Всего на конкурс поступило более 500 заявок из 25 стран, что подтверждает высокий международный интерес и статус проекта как одного из ведущих музыкальных событий современности. В смотре примут участие 65 талантов из 16 государств", - написала Любимова в своем телеграм-канале. Она отметила, что конкурс даёт возможность талантливым артистам реализовать свой творческий потенциал и получить признание на международном уровне. "Мы видим профессиональную востребованность лауреатов первого конкурса и радуемся их успехам. Они выступают в лучших концертных залах а разных странах, возглавляют как федеральные, так и региональные коллективы". - добавила министр.

title: Cowboys 'High Vibes' Extend All The Way to New York For Coach Schottenheimer
creator: Athlon Sports
content: Cowboys 'High Vibes' Extend All The Way to New York For Coach Schottenheimer originally appeared on Athlon Sports.FRISCO - All offseason, we have heard Dallas Cowboys head coach Brian Schottenheimer discuss relationships and the connection he wants to establish with everyone in the building. ... and his goal of overseeing "the greatest culture in sports.''Now we've been inside The Star, multiple times, to talk to the first-time head coach and to watch his practices and his players.And everybody who talked the talk is now walking the walk. ... and this goes well beyond buying everybody Whataburger to sending champagne at Osa Odigihizuwa's contract dinner, to going Greek dancing with the QBs.“I don't know if you ever get it all accomplished, but I feel really good about the offseason program,” Schottenheimer said. “The connection of the guys, offense, defense, special teams, coaches, players, new faces, new personalities, feel really good about that. "I feel like we've just spent time doing things in the building, away from the building, getting to know each other."I think there's been multiple events, all the coaches in different sides of the ball have gotten together away from the building, I think every position group has done that, and that's so important, so I think that's been amazing.”Yes, and the "amazing'' feel-good extends all the way from here in Frisco to New York City.Wait ... what?Schottenheimer looks to have already won over the Cowboys players, not to mention...

title: Walk-off hit in 8th inning gives Horseheads baseball team Class AA state title
creator: The Star Gazette
content: Jeff Limoncelli's coaching farewell after 27 years at Horseheads High School featured multiple star turns, a dramatic comeback, a father-son connection to his first state title, and a surprise twist.It all added up to the happiest of endings in the New York State Public High School Athletic Association Class AA championship game Saturday, June 14 at Binghamton University.Kegan Monahan delivered a moment that will endure in Horseheads with an infield single with two outs in the bottom of the eighth inning, scoring pinch-runner Ben Torgalski with the winning run in a 6-5 victory over Section 1's Fox Lane (21-8).Horseheads claimed the program's second state title. The other came in 1999, which was Limoncelli's second season as head coach. He retires having been on the winning side of 437 games."These kids are so resilient," Limoncelli said. "We got down 4-1 and they kept believing. Just chip away. We’re fine. We have enough pitching and defense. If we can somehow get a big inning, get some runs, and maybe tie this thing up, we’re going to win it."They believed it, they executed it and a lot of pressure executions with Monahan coming through, Trevor Reidy with a safety squeeze."Horseheads finished with a 21-2 record that included a 1-0, 10-inning victory over Wallkill in the state quarterfinals and Friday's 2-0 semifinal win against Webster Thomas.Mason Holloway, who posted a 0.11 ERA this season with 111 strikeouts and no walks, closed his prep career with a win on the same...

title: Mueren más de 100 personas a manos de grupos armados en el centro de Nigeria
content: MADRID 15 Jun. (EUROPA PRESS) - Amnistía Internacional Nigeria ha denunciado este sábado la muerte de alrededor de un centenar de personas en un ataque perpetrado por hombres armados en una aldea en el estado nigeriano de Benue, en el centro del país, y ha instado a las autoridades a frenar la "alarmante" escalada de violencia en la región. "El horroroso asesinato de más de 100 personas por parte de hombres armados que invadieron Yelewata, desde el viernes por la noche hasta la madrugada del sábado 14 de junio de 2025, muestra que las medidas de seguridad que el Gobierno dice estar implementando en el estado no están funcionando", ha alertado la ONG en una publicación en su cuenta en la red social X. La organización ha subrayado que "hay decenas de heridos que se han quedado sin poder recibir una asistencia médica adecuada" y que hay además un gran número de personas en paradero desconocido. Desde AI Nigeria han insistido en que las autoridades nigerianas deben terminar "de inmediato" con "la alarmante escalada de ataques en el estado de Benue", donde el "derramamiento de sangre (es) casi diario" y donde "masacres" como la de este sábado se perpetran "con total impunidad". "El fracaso de las autoridades nigerianas a la hora de frenar la violencia está costando vidas y medios de subsistencia a muchas personas, y sin una acción inmediata podrían perderse muchas más vidas", ha sentenciado Amnistía, recordando que estos ataques "han causado desplazamientos...

title: Sipe looks forward to playing basketball at Indiana Tech
creator: Pharos-Tribune, Logansport, Ind.
content: Mylie Sipe put in the hard work to make sure that the Lewis Cass girls basketball team would continue their success her senior season.That hard work has also led to her getting the opportunity to play at the next level, as she has signed to play at NAIA Indiana Tech in Fort Wayne.“I just feel blessed,” Sipe said. “I still am shocked that I’ve seen my hard work and dedication to playing basketball pay off, and it’s just an amazing opportunity for me. I’m just kind of speechless. Just my dream of signing came true and it’s just awesome to see that happen.”Sipe, a 5-foot-9 center, averaged 9.0 ppg and 4.3 rpg for the Lady Kings as a senior. She led the team in made 3-pointers (46) and 3-point percentage (33%).The Lady Kings went 19-7, won the Cass County Tournament and repeated as sectional champions.Sipe and the Lady Kings were prominent at the Pharos-Tribune’s second annual Sports Awards on Tuesday at McHale Auditorium. Sipe was nominated as the Girls Basketball Athlete of the Year and Girls Scholar Athlete of the Year. The Lady Kings won the girls Team of the Year.Sipe talked about her senior season.“It was awesome. I was a little nervous to be honest because we did lose some really good key players and I knew coming in that I would have to step up pretty tremendously if I wanted the success like we did last season,” she said. “And so I was like, I’m not going to let this team down. I’m going to go back-to-back in sectionals. And we ended up doing that. It’s just the girls...

title: 見過ごせない「調理コスト」と節約効果を最大化するコツ
content: まず、 を使った の1食あたりの費用を計算してみましょう。今回は、スーパーで手軽に購入できる一般的な価格帯の商品を想定します。 なお、使用する や の銘柄、購入するお店によって金額は前後しますので、以下はあくまで一例としてご覧ください。 用の は、1袋に6個入りで300円前後となります。1個あたりの単価は約50円です。 おかずA(唐揚げなど):2個(約100円) おかずB(ほうれん草のソテーなど):1個(約50円) おかずC(きんぴらごぼうなど):1個(約50円) おかずD(春巻きなど):1個(約50円) ご飯:1膳(約150g) おかずの合計は約250円です。続いて、ご飯のコストを確認していきましょう。総務省統計局の小売 統計調査(2025年5月・東京都区部)によると、 5kg(単一原料米,「コシヒカリ」以外)の平均価格は4769円でした。 1kgあたり約954円です。 1合(約150g)を炊くと、約330gのご飯になります。1膳分を150gとすると、生米換算で約68g、コストは約65円となります。おかずとご飯を合わせると、1食あたりのコストは約315円となりました。 次に、コンビニ弁当の価格を見てみましょう。最近では 高の影響もあり、500円~700円台の価格帯が主流となっています。ここでは平均的な価格として600円と設定します。 ・ 弁当: 約315円 ・コンビニ弁当: 約600円 1食あたりの差額は 285円 です。この差額が積み重なると、どれくらいの節約になるのでしょうか。1ヶ月に20日勤務すると仮定して計算してみましょう。 1ヶ月の節約額: 285円 × 20日 = 5700円 1年間の節約額:5700円 × 12ヶ月 = 68400円 年間で約6万8000円もの節約になる計算です。これは、 で少し豪華な食事に出掛けたり、欲しかった を購入したりできる金額かもしれません。結論として、「 だけの 」は、コンビニ弁当と比較して大幅な節約になるといえるでしょう。 作りには、食材費以外にも電気代などのコストがかかります。 の調理で使う電子レンジと、ご飯を炊く炊飯器の電気代はどのくらいでしょうか。公益社団法人 全国家庭電気製品 公正取引協議会の目安単価である「31円/kWh(税込み)」を参考に計算します。 ・電子レンジ:約0.93円 用のおかずを温める時間を1分30秒と想定し、一般的な電子レンジの消費電力(1200W)で計算しました。 電子レンジに表示される「600W」といった数値は食品を温める力(出力)のことで、実際の消費電力はそれより大きくなります。 ・炊飯器:約4.9円 近年の省エ イプの炊飯器で1回炊飯した場合の平均的な電気代です。(資源エネルギー庁「 性能カタログ2024年版」参考) ご飯は一度に炊いて冷凍保存し、おかずと一緒に電子レンジで温めれば、さらに電気代を抑えられます。これらの調理コストを合わせても、1食あたり数円程度であり、節約効果が揺らぐことはないでしょう。さらに節約効果を高めるためには、以下の工夫も有効です。 ・プライベートブランド(PB)商品の活用 ・大容量パックの ・スーパーの特売日や閉店間際の値引きを狙う また、 の最大のメリットの一つは「時短」です。忙しい朝に、火や油を使わずに数分で...

title: 受三號熱帶氣旋警告影響 「非遺無限∞」同樂日暫停舉行
content: 康文署表示,由於三號熱帶氣旋警告信號現正生效,今日在位於荃灣三棟屋博物館的香港非物質文化遺產中心舉行的「非遺無限∞」同樂日暫停舉行,提醒公眾人士暫停前往。 康文署表示,視乎天氣情況,「非遺無限∞」同樂日將在情況許可下重新開放。
